title: Sequoia Hotel
address: Block 2 Lot 15 Aseana City Business Park, Parañaque, 1701 Metro Manila
descriptions: Understated rooms in a relaxed hotel with an indoor pool & a restaurant/bar, plus Wi-Fi.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jireh Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qdx0CtChWdL4amzhVtedU6JgNzs3A9KzPS8K998c7-u-mDeTb-7WQwuTD-PPX6BcVA5wg=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"This hotel is undeniably one of the best in the city. Not only does it offer a reasonably priced stay, but its buffet breakfast is exceptional. The staff is incredibly accommodating and always fulfills our requests with great care. Additionally, the location is conveniently near malls and establishments.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam Acosta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWd8erRDTLTxaOb3WObExQ_l5O5q5WZ2lxc7SZJg6fxTbtIqGO7xA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sequoia Hotel in Manila Bay was a pleasant surprise. The food was simple yet satisfying, with generous portions that left us feeling full and content. The service staff truly stood out, their courtesy and promptness making us feel well taken care of throughout our stay. The rooms were a highlight, spotless and modern with a fresh, new feel. Overall, our experience at Sequoia Hotel was a comfortable and enjoyable one, thanks to the delicious food, attentive staff, and clean, inviting rooms. It's a great option for those seeking a hassle-free and relaxing stay in the Manila Bay area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAiiKVweV88LW0vOj1thPyepGgajAqNRYvw6e1"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"John Ernest Porras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7Fue_vVp7u47-Y9osGjUO6sbjfsD2xmAbmhZnQSpEybwofQJJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"During our 4-day stay, we encountered numerous cockroaches in the room, indicating a lack of pest control management at the property. It’s unfortunate because the location is convenient, with proximity to City of Dreams, Ayala Mall Manila Bay, and a nearby convenience store, all in a quiet area. The rooms are spacious and have a decent design.

However, the major downside is the cleanliness. The presence of cockroaches in the bathroom and work area made the place feel very dirty. Given this issue, it’s not worth the price. I hope this problem is addressed in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFbuaGnMDKuo4XuuwJJqKFH0npf9Cr4urCEfFM"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Joo Yeon Shin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJpGIf6BDApwNNQHwaGjVolOf8HuM21E3Q8c_a99jjQ4V5KA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to stay. title: Selah Pods Hotel Manila
address: 202-224, Selah Pods Hotel Manila, 2004-224 David St. cor PH, San Hose, 202-224 F.B. Harrison St, Pasay, 1305 Metro Manila
descriptions: Streamlined quarters in a contemporary hotel featuring a rooftop restaurant & an infinity pool.
complete_address: {"borough":"","street":"202-224, 2004-224 David St. cor PH, San Hose, 202-224 F.B. Harrison St","city":"Pasay","postal_code":"1305","state":"Metro Manila","country":"PH"}
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"explore_with_may","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QdDVsOCeofRZJ7E-5_OmGTopxhKLKgrRyRiBqSVIkkG6ZY8A0xH5cj33o1mJn3HSwPBIA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"The windowless room I stayed in was perfect for introverts like me who needed a break from people. The bed was comfortable, the water pressure in the shower and toilet was strong, the wifi signal was strong, fast, and reliable, airconditioning was good, service was good and the front desk was open 24 hours. There is a restaurant at the pool deck that had good and filling food. The decor was hip. The only problem I had was the noise coming from the corridors -- the room wasn't sufficiently noise protected.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carel Denaj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMuhL1jC8x33jxYG040Xt6QZRF6jFhKOH13LJEWAam4mMjEg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not enough parking space. They charge additional service fees including food we purchased outside. The pool is not accessible even if we rented a paid/booked a room for 22 hours because our rooms are not listed for pool access. Comfort room sizes are very Small with not functioning locks. Only 1 key guard provided even if we're 4 people booked for 1 room","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marlon Cinense","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkzFGhTupVSjB97od2QXtSD_civL64-URzChDLz2Htv4wt2_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The bar people don't treat their guests well., we booked here for 2 days. We were planning to hang out at their Roofdeck bar next to the pool., the close of their bar should be 12mn., we went at 10pm. when we arrived at the Bar they turned off the lights. Very rude. the hotel is beautiful, we can't say enough, this is our third time here. but this is the first time that they turned off the lights at the Bar. Management, please discipline your staff. that will ruin your reputation by chance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZLNLflXZEbM2s6NVdp5T4Kb9htvwep3Gmvvp2"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"Les Bo Flaneurs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXUABwVHG2C6jG75fCNarJx6bDUiJWk_c0oIFnjBeBOR0gZg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Really disappointed about it. The location and the room is ok but the unprofessional service and all the stupid rules will ruin your stay.

Some examples :
- if you want to enjoy the swimming pool, you will need a ticket to acces it, if you don't have it on you they wont trust that you are from the hotel... If you have the paper, you will have to fill a form and sign it, one per person. Of course, you can't access to the pool before the check-in, it means you have to wait along it even if your plane arrives the morning. If you want to check-in earlier it's between 500 to 1000 pesos.
- a girl from the hotel just entered in our room whitout knocking and I can't figure it out why... No excuse.
- the reception called on the phone to remind us that the chekout time was at 12:00 but it was 11:10 so we had still some time. First time I see this, we were packing.
- the payment machine didnt work when it came to pay the meal I had, and they insinuate it was my fault, I said it's probably the machine or the network, asked me one other card, didnt work neither. I proposed to add it to my room for a later payment at the desk, he didn't want to, but asked my room first so I dont know why, and I finally paid by cash, BUT they didnt have cash and told me they will give me the change later at my room lol... You cant trust this after all the things that happened. I have wait around 30 minutes for a solution and it's finally me who asked what was going on!!

In a general way, this hotel pretend to be a luxury one but even if the pool view is ok, the service is not at the level at all. Too much rules, too complicated, nothing was smooth. Unfriendly and unprofessional as possible. Not recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ajay Rawat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWC2J4DRBGTUf-JQ76YvrWDW5oF4Zm9XiH1rgJ-uH8B1GHJ3eDW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Hotel room was good,, only i have face issue with smoking because hotel is smoke friendly which i was not aware of it or either not mention even online,, even I tried to book smoking room so i can smoke,,i came to know this only check in time that i can’t smoke inside the room or full property otherwise i will be penalised with 10k peso, another there deposit policy with 1000 peso,, so make sure carry cash 1000 peso even if you paid fully online your booking,,","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Art Arriola","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4PkiI_wMsp_lp1ek7ErF0u_BlsiX5HVREQHgKTRlW-_DL4NdB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not a very pleasant experience. The room is dusty, the air-conditioning is not functioning, when you have your own bottled water there is a corkage, everytime you pass the reception you'll be asked for an ID. Everything you do needs to be paid. Totally worse experience ever!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Allaine Tolarba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcua_d0JcT3lmql6-wPE2gK9MG1inTmQIhF9ekrEcCr_74wHFH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I was quite disappointed when I checked in. We arrived after a lengthy flight and waited in the queue. When we were ready to ask where their manager was, they had only just started checking in. The front desk is ridiculous. The front desk should learn to communicate politely.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vanessa Ortam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLwhwQRmKlmxavbhz3gCXaQyh3g1bNTtmuhdHKQBv-RaGEyNV_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"the staffs are not that courteous… you’re booking for 6 days stay …they will book you for a day and when you ask the receiving area staff they will ask for full payment at once plus security deposit unlike other 5 star hotels …it may be 2 to 3 stars  rating they should improve even the security guards are a bit rude we are about to check in the security will push you away …they don’t even offer help for unloading your luggages …the receptionist have different ways to accomodate a client you will be confused …more hospitality service please I am a Hrm /tourism graduate …value every client treat them equally not just because we look plain and casual that does’nt mean we are not observing","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Oyster Plaza Hotel
address: Dr Arcadio Santos Ave, Parañaque, 1700 Metro Manila
descriptions: Unfussy rooms with minifridges in a straightforward hotel offering a bar & a free airport shuttle.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"kim jeyoon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJswlD2TjoA93qQZVBkwCDQGLbK8-_Xd0fMBokpnRMMvdwC2g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First room for staying 2days was good clean renovated.
Last day one room is not clean. Has bugs move around.  Hopefully they renovate all room","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Persephone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXt_sQVhJp_AMj6cVTve-moQHscJpE5qZeLvM9lL-bkyOzsSAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My experience here was a solid 30/100. I only stayed for a day and it was gross. The bed sheets had a stain, my sister swiped on a red speck and it spread like it was blood. The bed was uncomfortable and rock hard. The bathroom was gross and it looked dirty and the pictures weren’t actually the room.

Not to mention the fact there was a bug in my brothers rice. A dead and cooked one and it was disgusting.

The service was alright. It’s neutral.. the location was the best, though. It was only a few minutes away from the airport.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chelsey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjAWwR_ggXH7_Raow2plF0XLm-qkcnw4fwTRjOSYZ5OIilDlUj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My mother insisted on booking here as we had an early ride to the airport & Oyster advertised free 24/7 shuttle service to the airport when booking. Since there is only one person driving, they are unable to do that. Very understandable but false advertising.

Cons: It’s right beside a busy road so it is loud. There was also eyelashes left on the bathroom walls. The wifi doesn’t work… problematic for a person travelling.
Pros: AC worked well & the bed was somewhat comfortable with good sheets & blankets. Location for airport is great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNry0sPUzMTcyOLzrqVB4R32F3FAXqXgeP8O0kg"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"David Hasnip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2Fb1JwfI8-UWYcXA10jmFavOa3QlRu2vbeuzUyMGTZoEPXPuF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great place to stay. The beds are super comfortable the bathroom is good size and hot water is very hot. Many people posted that they didn't have hot water but each room has its own hot water heater if there is an issue just ask reception and they will reset for you. Towels were thick and soft. Aircon was very cold and tv has many channels. Wifi worked great in my room better than global.tge reception is very friendly and helpful. Breakfast is included in the price and is very delicious the restaurant also does lunch and dinner and room service is available. The restaurant also has beers at ok price san migual light 75 PHP.There is free shuttle to and from airport but l couldn't get it from the airport but booked it at reception for my return flight. It's close to airport,SM Mall is a 10 minute walk,if you want to travel further take a grab it only cost 350php to Malaki or fort santiago. Overall l would recommend this hotel price and service is great.Thank you Oyster Plaza Hotel","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlp6GMjdVxILVauDDrn9JJh1xv4Fr68wPPAwLg"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Kent Andres","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1mk1iUCe0Rgi6g0Vi0xxhYTxjhqT76nAwKLVLq67EaJjong=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The hotels location is only few minutes away to the airport. The room where I stayed  is clean, bed is comfortable and of good size. Staff very accomodating and helpful. They even allowed me to leave my luggages a day before I checked in free of charge. Highly recommended and will definitely come back again 🤩","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jilles Guzman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDZYYvzd9RStQpaeWh5aC__GMgdee48rrtdxz-qMhbCvv4Mg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Pros:

Location is very convenient if you want to be close to the airport. This is the type of hotel that is useful to you if you just need a place to crash after you arrive or before you depart Manila. Do not stay here if you wish to explore the city.

Neutral:

The staff was a 50/50 experience. The younger employees are truly kind and helpful. The older ones not so much.

Cons:

I can confirm the complaints of previous reviewers. The rooms don't look anything like they do in the pictures. They are not bad either, however, expect:

The Internet malfunctioning.
Rooms with no real windows.
Noise.
No water pressure.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wil N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUokH5TU_qQM-IqJuToEUMN1adjxihiHbgE3j4wP5L41FeWo8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to stay near Manila. The rooms are decent but the staff are great. They are friendly, honest, and super helpful. They are also some of the most beautiful hotel employees in the Philippines;) Overall 5 stars thanks to the staff","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maurice Deguelle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaoUGMbk_kMzbK_S9IktCQezBsteOnXJU7IiMkvZfGfbbnQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Booked a Deluxe room with windows. They said they where booked out and we would be upgraded. Didnt had windows, no wifi and no service. There is no sitting/lounge area. The streets behind the hotel are not very safe. They even told us we shouldnt walk alone, we might get robbed. Dont wanna lie it also felt like that when we went outside. Book on own risk","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Savoy Hotel Manila
address: 101 Andrews Ave, Pasay, 1300 Metro Manila
descriptions: Airy rooms in an informal hotel with a restaurant & an indoor pool, plus free airport shuttles.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gavin D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QdHDxxyBDO6igPA51sqxYAI1TTeuGvapT1sWSCJfPSgzOZltNlMhWmUDpj2A3v7zAw89g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I've had the pleasure of staying at the Savoy Manila several times, and one of the standout aspects of my visits is the incredible hospitality from Bone, the lifeguard. Every time I stay, he greets me with a friendly smile and makes me feel so welcome. Not only does he ensure the pool area is always safe, but he goes above and beyond by offering helpful advice on places to visit and local points of interest. He's also incredibly entertaining, making each pool visit a memorable experience. He truly is a credit to the hotel||Additionally, the pool bar staff are equally fantastic. Jerome, the barman, deserves special mention for looking after me during my latest visit. His service was impeccable, and his friendly attitude made my experience even better. The team here truly enhances the overall experience of staying at the Savoy. Looking forward to my next visit","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Waren S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QcKrc8e2JnTu8c7_hmoZKea10RMTDbKaR4QZbjFBwR43DXTBpqzkG_SGZrLD47rFdkvjQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Savoy Hotel is my favorite place to stay whenever I'm in the Philippine for a vacation.|Nice location and wonderful staff! I would like to commend the 2 frontdesk staff working today named ROCELLE AND PATRICK! Rochelle is a darling and very friendly and accommodating to me and so with other guests.|She deserves a promotion or pay raise because she's an exceptional hotel staff member. As a loyal client,  that's what we are looking for a hotel staff, especially the front desk! Thank you Rocelle/Patrick for a warm hospitality! See you again on my next stay!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Edwin Kwan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvIR7xdhvzZZtNU7-7YG6BjG5B74J5-XcJvurKE_vuh3XKSQsf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stayed here for a night during a stop over in Manila before heading off to Palawan and loved the location. It was close to the international airport and very convenient to walk to via the runway. The rooms were a little smallish, but sufficient and I like the gym and pool. Breakfast was good too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxZm2UatfPl1AWo0gkveHNANArsGgfy067DbVe"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"kevin chester timoteo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHOw2jIGAlu7xvCS3d5KZWYezugea2ZzNqlXFMvNoLRRM2fw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

**An Oasis in the City!**

The poolside at Savoy Manila is absolutely stunning! From the moment you step into the area, you're welcomed by a serene and relaxing atmosphere, perfect for unwinding after a busy day. The pool is crystal clear, and the surrounding lounge chairs are incredibly comfortable, making it an ideal spot to soak up the sun.

Special mention to Sunny, Bong, and Jerome, who provided exceptional service throughout my stay. They were always attentive, ensuring that we had everything we needed. Their warm and friendly approach really made the experience even more enjoyable!

The ambiance at night is particularly magical with the lights around the pool, creating a cozy and luxurious vibe. The drinks and snacks were delicious, too!

Overall, the poolside at Savoy Manila is a hidden gem in the heart of the city. Highly recommended for anyone looking to relax in style. Will definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxwbxo95o8VHD1NG4DoEftEPRhdS7OJJPRNL2N"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Doty S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qczn4VDfUM6-AtEt-6oaNazFa-i9Fy6kqPVfGIlPil6vJulEYyK8t930jZwOW4hD80mzw=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Lucas the pool attendant is very helpful and offered super service. Overall we recommend savoy manila. Good location near the airport and good food also. You can also bring your kids as there is an area for kids in the pool. Thank you and see you again","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Iphone Eleven","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZYcaXTgllkfpt8r8oVNm8cIVk-AY_hAFqBkHxMi7eavfvOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I LOVED EVERYTHING!
However, there's a door I do not know what for. A little disturbing cause it could be a 2 way mirror or whatever. Bathroom is small but it's clean. Would be much better if the table fits a laptop.
Overall it was very relaxing, It was a great stay here! I will come back! ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxITofQJFCX8l2K0u7e52rC3ZC6T0ZSJtCdWRd"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Starlyn M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeFH6dzZjd_ZFLhXHZKibEzXEy8hWzFB4Qa7PutLe3CnO2G7yVfjd4VSabiCQwQYo5W-g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I love their Boracay promotional food!! Please keep one of the menus which is the ENSALADANG PAKO OR TALBOS NG KAMOTE WITH DANGGIT!NOW IT’S MY FAVORITE! I also love their homemade vinaigrette! Staff are friendly and helpful. Klinton is the best in promoting foods!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trip.com Member","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeCck1CfANpZm9bBk3PHtP97Kh9k25HZfvq9yAWlN3BaIyjSHUPEfWkhAJmuYiJsH-_6g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Savoy hotel manila is abt 20 mins drive from T2 and about 20 mins walk to T3. There is security check at both front and back entrance of the hotel. This give you a sense of security while staying at this hotel.Checking in and checking out for a breeze. Checking in and checking out was completed in less than 5 mins. Staff was friendly and helpful. We booked a twin room with a late checkout package. We paid extra during check in to be upgraded to a double room. The room was a little small for the price we paid. The bathroom with standing showers was small too. Basic necessities is provided in the room.  The matress  and pillows were too soft to our liking.As smoking is no longer allowed in public place, the hotel provide a smoking room located at the 11th floor for their guest convinience.Apart from the walking distance to T3, there is a shuttle bus at the back of the hotel to bring you to Newport Shopping mall for free! Mall of Asia is also nearby abt 20mins drive away from the hotel.Breakfast is basic. There is not much variety for you to choose. Overall the stay was pleasant.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Bay Prime Hotel
address: GXHV+45P Bay Prime Hotel, Roxas Blvd, Parañaque, Metro Manila
descriptions: Modern hotel offering an outdoor pool & breakfast, plus a chic restaurant with a global menu.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"GN M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9IWs_JlH0biExoXu42Bp30o7I9fbU5A49TzlK1ZIxlgOOfy6k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The moment you reach the hotel you're greeted by the bellman and security. The lobby stench was so foul that it always leaves a disgust on my face, it's the same when you step out of the lift lobby. Majority of simple requests were not met. It's appalling how you request for sets of cutleries and the staff has no clue what a cutlery is. The ceiling in front of my room was leaking, leaving a puddle on my front door. No service recovery offered or whatsoever. The front desk trainees are left alone not knowing what to do. Do not bother asking them for simple information within their vicinity- they also have no clue what's surrounding them. Staff has no sense of urgency at all. The pool and gym facilities are so badly lit and or not lit at all. They do not prioritize your safety around the property. The manager is nowhere to be found when you ask for one. There is obviously no communication amongst them or they're simply not updating their alerts or comments in their system. Good budget hotel if you're looking to stay a night but not any longer. I will never come back again. I'm pretty sure there are better hotels out there with the same price range and friendlier staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Esther Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpUlVanNqPteRA9epXi-ALwS4Ck3Y29kJSWGx4hjYrYzjOUBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Receptionists do not know how to be polite and to be behave. They don’t even deserve to be one. When you ask questions, they act like they did not hear or see anything, whispering to each other even if you’re a foreigner who understands Tagalog. Please improve and train your staff. The hotel is so close to the airport , which you may accept a lot of international guests. Other than the interior, it does not deserve 4 Star at all. Totally over ranked.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joven Rubilla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsSuFaPaIcDmna9sFs3r-lgPVsA8LrjOnhgxqRyJzceHS36oUV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bayprime Hotel is a solid choice for travelers seeking a comfortable and convenient stay in Manila. It's particularly well-suited for those looking to explore the nearby attractions and enjoy the amenities the hotel offers. They also offer sumptuous Chinese style foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtYkPa06dgStW3X_8FSP0qaJ-q02c5ZuapUsBa"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"E P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QcHdm0oAuHtzPwzcwUtTqUfPbZXmYnyyN78cO7_Z2aHVLpBkIuu0olTbSpOuQZcPV9sYQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Overall good value for money friendly staff, comfortable rooms. Good breakfast for cost of the motel. They were a bit tight with giving us water family of x4 2 adults x2 teenagers they would sometimes only give x2 bottles and we would have to pay for extra 2 !! Same with toilet paper only providing 1 roll at a time.|Great pool, gym didn’t have a lot of equipment but was okay.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Caleb Glover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmomAFMB_Te_D_pGSe3drQ11ZyAVFGZ1jvEQd9m7w1c-7TMA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The rooms are great. We have no complaints with those.

The food, is quite possibly the WORST restaurant I've ever been to in my life. Lemonade tasted like it had alcohol in it. A total of 3 sips were drank and they refused to remove them from the check. Chicken was horribly overcooked and barely edible. Fried rice was mostly green onion and gross. McDonalds makes better and more edible food than this place. Avoid it like the plague and go quite literally anywhere else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6p14ArZ1gnz75b_4rUNYN_Lg4FBve3iq4G-BWdSVhCYwc27pe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing and extremely affordable compared to American hotels.

This hotel is beautiful from top to bottom and the service from the moment you walk though the door blows away hotels I've paid 2 or 3x more for in the states. They greet you at the door with a smile, help you with your bags, the elevator and halls are clean and beautiful, the rooms are emaculate and high-tech with modern TVs, lights and international power outlets.

A lovely pool and gym, a CLEAN 24 hour convenience store is right outside the front door and the inhouse cafe is beautiful, clean, and the food is good.

Not only is this better than many USA hotels for the price but even better than the few other local hotels I stayed in and only a few pesos more.

If you are looking for a 1st class experience or wanting to feel like you've been transported to another word right here in the Philippines I strongly recommend the Bay Prime Hotel.

10/10 Value
8/10 Location
9.5/10 Cleanliness
9.5/10 Amenities (no microwave)
10/10 Service","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shasha Apolinario K.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoQsy75pOyQVu_GAkcKYsX8NSaU5E06_Pt05Fp0DzAmov4Zznf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In the future this hotel is very nice and recommended except for the very strong smell in our room it’s because it’s new but they should put air fresheners to go the very strong smell of the room over all the staff friendly especially the guards and bellman it’s just dessapointing that they only accept credit cards they have 3 security deposit so prepare your cash or credit card that’s the only thing they accept and if you have kids with you like 3 years old up better bring their pass with you because front disks will ask for it. I don’t know why but that’s it the pool is nice good food","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOf6ghqk_j_S3tRkL_sh0l94MQvT0ViBrsVTdcG"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Inemeng Kinantot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPpHbG8EdFHlDMWWWDgTIhyY3gZVZ3smGp58mJToumiZZ6xw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"WORST!!!!! THE RECEPTION IS VERY EMBARRASSING!!!!!!!!! Very strict on visitors unlike other hotel. We were charged immediately 20dollars per pax for our 2 visitors even just a few minutes after 10pm. Even though we said that we are on our process of the wedding for tomorrow. The receptionist made us feel we were trespassing even though we were guests. They always saying because it is the rule of the management. Even extra bottled water is 2 dollars per small bottle of water. Some hotels you can get it for free. Buffet breakfast is very common and fewer options. Better get Jollibee! For the price and location, better check other hotels. Very few ammenities! They have better services than here.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Grand Westside Hotel
address: GXCJ+4J2 Grand Westside Hotel, Parañaque, Metro Manila
user_reviews: [{"Name":"doctorfoxtrot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QchZeuqqdsc2mxTzAL46o1Zp-eQpx0fXItgIlFx_-eADsDQzpyjY9GuirM6XH9EgCdepg=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"This new hotel has a massive scale with a huge room inventory. By the time we check in , only one tower was operational.  And the footbridge leading to the casino and shops were still on their finalizing stage. Lobby was impressive, high ceiling , looks minimalist. But rooms go for small cuts , typical of Andrew Tan owned non foreign franchise hotels . The family room I booked through Agoda is a mere 2 rooms interconnected. But I can sense the newness of the rooms. Functional, cold Ac, HD non smart Tv channels.  Gym, pool etc on the works. They have a restaurant, but several are soon to open as well. As for breakfast, they have a nice buffet selection, focusing on local and western cuisine.  It was worth the try. Regarding the staff service, they are ok , from front desk, restaurant personnel and even the security detail.  Noticed however the absence of convenience stores in GW and Kingsford that they encourage going to Okada. Perhaps the hotel should open a 24/7 pantry or something similar in the basement or lobby.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qf66pF81jsVXBxevYxxL5FsdlDsKAngAUpJVE-hAwai1rl8J0QnYqktKV3UGdpbmNlc_A=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"They have affordable rates considering that its within the vicinity of Okada and Solaire, the hotel offers great value for money. It’s convenient, and although the rooms are a bit small, they’re comfortable. The hotel staff is pleasant most especially the cleaner of our room Niño who took care of our needs throughtout our stay. the only downside is i noticed there is a smell, I don't know where it is coming from, either from the carpet or outside since my room is beside the creek. But overall it is highly recommendable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Frances Pendon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhGynf0KM-dQjXITn3UTuWRM9FvanLcrhj3t35Qyk3X5Gf8Kg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommended hotel. Will surely come back maybe after the construction and is 100% operational. Location is great. Loved all their amenities as well. We’ll be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHwzKeA0Dq6KkgKh7B_4xbSBfgkA4ZX0U5K9u-"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Jenn C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qdx0CtChWdL4amzhVtedU6JgNzs3A9KzPS8K998c7-u-mDeTb-7WQwuTD-PPX6BcVA5wg=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Event: business|Stay: function room||This is a new hotel. It’s very secured. The lobby is refreshing. Limited buffet breakfast menu. Their chairs at the resto is low; eating is not comfortable.||Customer service is great. ||They have very nice pool. The ambiance is refreshing and relaxing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Suzette C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeFH6dzZjd_ZFLhXHZKibEzXEy8hWzFB4Qa7PutLe3CnO2G7yVfjd4VSabiCQwQYo5W-g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"AIRCON IS NOT THAT COLD IN ALL ROOMS(25-27ONLY)|I booked three rooms (4adult 2kids)|-hotel was new and clean|-overall the ambiance and facilities was superb considering the price|-walking distance to okada||What i dont like|- service(maybe because they are new)|-i can see that they lack staff|- bed sheet are all rough|-all aircon are warm (its around 25-27 ONLY) it does not get any colder than that even though you can set it at 5degrees. ||Other than that for its price i think its OK, but we cant sleep all night due to the aircon tempt","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nav S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpjQs09SU-SZEjj3xh3cDrUNyJv_gI8JNhCIGnsWFyIKPGuXJySg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I would recommend avoiding this hotel. They do a full pat down of your body and inspection of everything, when small shopping bags every time you come in. There are timeshare people right by the entrance that harass you every time you walk past. They don't recognize faces and will keep trying to sell you a time share every time you walk down. The rooms themselves are very small, the 'room with a view' is of a dirty inlet between this and the next building. The breakfast buffet was that only nice thing. I would recommend avoiding this hotel as there are better places to stay.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pilar B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qd0Gzx7-o-W0qn7F-oHhorx-ann6UFYRniBmE7Ar1MhRFtO-x6vY7U2LNCPC1lcQidkpw=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I wanted to try for my 65th birthday this newest hotel of megaworld to celebrate my birthday . I am an club access member so i decided to book a family room for my family on Oct 4-6z I was very disappointed that their family room was a connecting room and the room they gave us  I can see workers from my window and they are very noisy. I called up the front desk if they can transfer us to another room. It took them a long time to decide.  I asked for their other rooms because their rooms are so small .  I  want a bigger room  because I was with my 2 granddaughters so I upgraded to an executive suite but I was also disappointed it was small compared to other suites. I was hoping to get a discount for upgrade since I am an club access member \u0026 no discount for seniors.   This hotel does not cater to big families .  Their buffet breakfast has wide variety of dishes . I hope they will have kids play area so they can attract more families to book at this hotel.   I would like to commend George for helping me with my concerns.  This hotel needs more improvements.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Herchell H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QdcKHisBXAOJmIugCgnKbcAscQkQI1t40WdQAMXk1g3ttzWj18FtKnHxNeSUm5OfHPMtQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"We had a delightful stay at the Grand Westside Hotel, perfect for our relaxing weekend escape. Despite the hotel being newly opened and still undergoing some construction, the facilities and room were both adequate and comfortable.||A special highlight was the breakfast, featuring an extensive and satisfying menu. We also want to extend our heartfelt thanks to Kim, for helping us book our room. Overall, it was a wonderful experience.","Images":null,"When":""}]

The highlight is definitely the pool area—spacious and well-maintained, providing a great spot to relax and unwind. The amenities are a nice touch, adding to the overall experience. However, the check-in process could use some improvement, as it was a bit slower than expected. Despite this, the hotel provides a comfortable and enjoyable environment for guests.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chang Yi-Fei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVr2VJqDgt335R1gttXo-THUeQShlibOq0QciUDfJyWHP0pveW7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Stayed in the Superior queen room, surprise to know that even with their superior room it’s facing another building where you can see everything.
We arrived very late & thought the soundproof & everything was perfect, but no. NO.
The room is clean but small, decor is nice.
The soundproof however is TERRIBLE.
At around 2 am there was another guest accidentally tried to beep into our room and the alarm of the door woke me up. From then I couldn’t get much sleep because you can hear EVERYTHING. From the kid next door singing/annoying his parents, to the family talking, to upstairs neighbors walking, to sneezing, to people talking in the walkway, and noise outside of the room, literally EVERYTHING.
This is our first-ever stay in Philippines, I guess even 5-stars hotel doesn’t offer you 5-stars soundproof… which is like the only thing I care about…
The breakfast was a 6/10. Edible but nothing impressive.

The shuttle to the airport was delayed 5 minutes, and the driver didn’t help us with our bags when we arrived at the airport, while he did help the other passengers who were a white + Filipino couple with their luggage. We wonder if this is a discrimination of our skin or the driver is simply just lazy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Diana Parayno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7AXiAaNNc8FYTKKLqKg-xekZlNVVh-bbgkm-tQTXgiYhAySJe5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently stayed at this hotel and had an absolutely amazing experience. The cleanliness of the hotel was exceptional, with every area meticulously maintained. The staff was incredibly helpful and attentive, going above and beyond to make our stay comfortable and enjoyable.

Moreover, the hotel offered a wide range of great amenities that enhanced my overall experience. The kids enjoyed swimming at the pool. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a clean, accommodating, and enjoyable place to stay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgpJXWO-IqlFqlbST1UTPoH8yz_XeMvIDjBZ15"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Enna Lee-See","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXJWLFewHVRjG-h-u78-rLEmf3X63zSI2k_8VasjzyTE2cdEKq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a best experience and a heart felt kindness from the staff. They even gave my son a Kingsford tiger to play with. Thank you for your service and kindness to my family! It was the most memorable time we've ever had.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Janette Silva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_Qs-Y7lKM0MAc_mxS_Vossxhe0dWh1n3uA3lE6ZhEFKhG2LYG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Conference room is very clean and spacious but quite cold. Some people may find the temperature perfect though.
Staff is amazing. Very helpful and polite. Commendation for Hannah, an intern who is very polite and professional in doing her tasks.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Solaire Resort
address: Entertainment City, 1 Aseana Ave, Parañaque, 1701 Metro Manila
descriptions: Plush quarters in a swanky lodging featuring a casino, dining & bars, plus a spa & an outdoor pool.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tine Sicat D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeCck1CfANpZm9bBk3PHtP97Kh9k25HZfvq9yAWlN3BaIyjSHUPEfWkhAJmuYiJsH-_6g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"It’s our first time to experience a 5-star hotel so I can say this is one for the books! Also, there was plentiful hot water in the shower, with excellent strong water pressure, which I always appreciate!||Special thanks to the VIP Sky Tower guest services officer named Calvin, who was supremely on-point and made me feel so welcomed upon my check-in. ||Also, they have a really nice gym / workout room, and a great warm-water jacuzzi in the locker room, which was so relaxing after a long workout in the gym, Special thanks to the wonderful gym attendant named Romeo, who made me feel special and welcome to the gym every single day. Romeo is fantastic and made me want to return every time. ||Overall, the facility is very well run, and on the ground level, there is a casino, which was fun ! ||5 stars all the way for Solaire. Wish I took more photos but next visit indeed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9Mr-rRg2G8o1GaXus0dMgyZzwO9MtzgSWIpL4"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"ANa G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfjHmZg8gr7jpDgKhrh5KsR_Mq7L6pkVedvpKQz-f3LMiOd3OjI90CK4uLtF3wE59zZgA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"This is ny third bday celebration and anniversary celebration at SOLAIRE! My sincere gratitude to Manager Harlie who gave me this room upgrade  and assisted me to all of my concern! I will surely see you again next yr the same month of July to celebrate again our anniversary and bday celebration. And this time will be three nights and four days! Soloire is a very wonderful hotel that I can call my home hotel— everything u need is at Solaire. I always enjoy their all restaurants and bar wpecially the Waterside restaurant! title: Hotel Sogo Macapagal
address: 1010 Diosdado Macapagal Blvd, Parañaque, Metro Manila
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cherokee pacete","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_CaZ2mEt6ylwx51zJYlE-hiYe8xRmuYY218FDpvJ_Ki_Ilg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I  don't usually give time and leave reviews but this one incident i just know i need to make an exception. I just wanted to share what a horrible experienced i had in this hotel branch. So my boyfriend booked me an executive room on the 4th of October for my stay on the 5th of October, so i'll have a place to stay for that night as i was going to attend a friends birthday and i came from Cavite and would have a hard time travelling late night. I was there around 3:30 pm 5th of October, and confirmed my booking at the front desk and they assured the room my boyfriend booked for me, I also informed them that i'll be coming back late night to get my room key as i might lose it. I got back at the hotel around 2 am as i am exhausted from the travel in Quezon city, went to the front desk and asked for my room key which unfortunately took them longer than it should be, the  supervisor asked me to follow him to this room that unfortunately they are still trying to prepare, when i got there i told him that, that's not the room my boyfriend booked me, and i showed him the picture of the room that they sent him, without any explanation the supervisor left me in the room along with the employee cleaning, and while i was waiting by myself the power turned off so i decided to go back to the front desk because its taking them so long and i'm exhausted and sleepy when i got there, surprisingly the supervisor was there  but then left again, while i still have questions. The front desk employee was apologizing on behalf of her supervisor. Again they gave me a wrong room and the supervisor was insisting it is the actual same room when its not. the supervisor was so unprofessional, other guests also complaining with their system and how they handle situations.I stayed there for the night, exhausted,extremely disappointed, and frustrated, I was also in a hospitality service,and based on how i got treated, it was so unacceptable and would absolutely never ever book on that hotel ever again and would never recommend it to my travelling friends.I highly suggest they train their hotel management  employee how to handle guests and certain situations professionally so things like this don't happen again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alec Yllan Penilla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLV9vYguBDe74DnUDdN5VQCbpo0atTb0ubLEz5cDMaxNWUJqw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommendable. Room is nice and very clean. Hotel staff are so accomodating and kind. Food was so delicious, yet at very affordable price. Great services!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zen Bonavente","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOXgp5Uks9-hpzVQYHXMeT5o0letm6V57Q6ipYYnbkzGm2Yw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great value for money. Hotel was very clean and approachable staffs.
Room have comfy bed and clean bathroom.
Would definitely stay again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mhae Bonavente","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURCLApIpHWoRCpk2bIEZ1BgSGy1PgHc_9So8N1TIXXuDz9Wg3S=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The hotel room was clean and nice! title: Golden Phoenix Hotel Manila
address: Oceanaire Bldg., CBP D. Macapagal, Sunrise Dr, Pasay, 1300 Metro Manila
descriptions: Modern hotel offering airy rooms & an outdoor pool, plus free breakfast & an airport shuttle.
complete_address: {"borough":"","street":"Oceanaire Bldg., CBP D. Macapagal, Sunrise Dr","city":"Pasay","postal_code":"1300","state":"Metro Manila","country":"PH"}
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jezer Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4JouTL051eKJKEVajl72y5QyU4X3yoV0DbtYwrpfEd6a4byvs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The room we booked was really amazing. Executive Suite - we really felt why it was rated 4 stars. Cozy, broad, and quiet.

Lobby: 10/10 (Accomodating staffs)
Room: 10/10 (Love the vibe but the TV is still not a smart TV)
CR: 10/10 (Clean and complete toilet set)
Breakfast Buffet: 8/10 (Too much processed food)
Swimming Pool: 5/10 (Needs renovation)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdt2-ACrWr1q9YnHyZdSoEbf06GVvw3qvOd0Bd"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"E O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgd14TEQRPTjDBt8-1OtmEOyFHxzQqzKCUJr2howuUJAtJiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"While this hotel’s location is great and highly convenient, the staff makes this hotel truly special. Everyone is accommodating, courteous and offers high calibre service.

The breakfast buffet is different everyday. Not only do they have a wide selection, the food and drinks are delectable, fresh and carefully prepared each time.

From the guards to reception desk to dining team, our experience has only been fun and easy. The Food and Beverage team is friendly. A special shoutout to Louie C who has been a great lead for the team and who has gone above and beyond our expectations.

Shoutout to other F&B staff such as Ned, Franco, Clark and the others I failed to get the names of; they do not get tired attending to all guests.

Thank you for the wonderful stay, Golden Phoenix! We’ll for sure rebook when we come back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doc B Lapa (skysenshi)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWF3S42T7n1rnlVP4avindqf2VuL8n-9AuSrj1s5vlZb11zdbjD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Needed to meet my physical therapist halfway, so my husband and I booked this hotel, which was surprisingly inexpensive if you consider what they have to offer.

Just to get it out of the way: the rooms are dated. You can see that the corners of the doors, furnishings, and wallpapers are on the verge of peeling off. The hallway carpet can use some changing, too.

The things we really liked:
- Location, there's a 7-11 and an Alfamart if you forgot to bring your toothbrush/toothpaste
- Their cafe. We were surprised that we only spent about ₱700+ for our meal when we were so full by the end of dinner. The vegetarian pizza is pretty good.
- Complete facilities inside the room. Coffee kit, soap and shampoo, hairdryer, bidet, lots of charging stations, and even a small round mirror for makeup needs (because the main bathroom mirror is too far from your face).
- Buffet is ok, but I like the ramen station (it's more like chicken and kikiam mami, but I really enjoyed this)

Parking is coordinated with the guards, because there's a slot assigned to each room. I wonder how it's going to be for events, though. Like, if we wanted to celebrate a party.

Overall, we're satisfied with the service, considering what a deal we got this for. We would like to go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4r1jaqrwbs_W-sXZq37lBL2NYsfAZvQIF5312"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"IREDAROG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfsnvlNO8mgROWsxiGYBmc-FMApm47le01WrNgEyYNYqUPw1j7nx-COV-HLlhXF8VUXQQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"This hotel was excellent.  We had two nights but the attention to detail  and the very attentiveness of all staff were a credit to the hotel.  The room was very clean  and the bed comfortable.  The location next to the Mall of Asia was also excellent.  Would I stay at this hotel again ? YES I WOULD","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"rizzi creative","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIydklcEK0y7e8QhEwQ7FO3ssoA3MXIW_7Mp0bMoy0SrAbOdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stayed here overnight I had no issues in this hotel. The staffs were nice and helpful with our luggages although I wish that they will be willing to help you with no exchange of monetary(tips) the staff didn’t ask for it verbally but I can tell the body language was sending signal. Our room was decent it was clean, the location was good it’s close to the airport, close to a mall which is pretty convenient.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONbDdG_IHHxA0NEksCuzgrRxl0VjH8dwr6Ptcc"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Giovanni Cipriani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4tlk8n2YOjkai684nyqDl6gtVaWNDr2eTeoHbIpZ12y_vho-7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Only place i stay when I need to go to Manila to the U.S. Embassy or VA.  They treat you like family from the time you step out of the taxi from Airport till you leave.  It's only 3.9 kilometers to Airport and you have a short walk to Mall of Asia.  The 3 restaurant's in the hotel are amazing and prices are very reasonable.  There are 7/11 around the corner and across the street is like a Circle K store both open 24 hours.  Plus their are 3 banks right next to the hotel BDO,  East West Bank and i forget the other ones name.  I'm telling you all now very clean and updated they keep this hotel.  Rooms are amazing and so is the swimming pool on 7th floor.  So please go their you won't be disappointed we are going back again in January.  Plus I did a YouTube video on our channel JenGioPhilippineJourney","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPy0hzYXsqKB4mfepwsd77XA_wkOzSHO9Uv52yr"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Jerson D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qdx0CtChWdL4amzhVtedU6JgNzs3A9KzPS8K998c7-u-mDeTb-7WQwuTD-PPX6BcVA5wg=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Has gone to this hotel a few times. It's the best value for money, world class amenities at a budget friendly rate. Special mention to Jun who helped with our luggages brought to the room. He was courteous attentive and friendly. The free breakfast is awesome by the way!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rene Thöne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAjjT0cHv8W2dElCo9_aypix6Mo89pJ812erChUOlSLxc7M1ok=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You get more than you pay for! The first Hotel in Manila with a good (very good) Price/Quality ratio. I read some comments here and in Agoda, and check them...
Smell in the aisle? No. We visit 3 storey, all clean, all carpets are clean.
30 Minutes for hot Water? No. First warm water after 5 seconds or more early, becomes hot after maybe 10 seconds. The Warm and Cold water is pumping, so the temperature pumps between OK and very warm or between "Little bit cold" and OK, but no problem to take a nice and good shower with good water pressure.
The Rooms are very spacious. We are upgraded because our booked room class was under renovation, and the room was great. OK, the style was 60th in germany, the wallpapers needs to be fixed, but thats all. Aircon: Clean. You smell, when a Aircon is not cleaned for long time. No smell here. Split type Aircon, very silent, good for sleep. Real Window, so you can get in fresh ocean air (in the morning, it is Manila...).
Location: Sea side of Makati, in front of the Mall of Asia. A lot of shops and restaurants (and Laundry shops, and massage, and...) around the corner or just in front of the hotel, 10 Minutes Walk to the MOA. In the night nice view to the lights of the MOA. You have a nice small rooftop pool, BBQ at the roof, a "more than good enough" Restaurant (Golden Spices) in the Hotel, a spacious Bar/Bistro (Amore) at the 2nd floor.
A little bit funny: You need to take the escalators (or elevator) to get to the 2nd floor and then walk to the guest Elevators, maybe not the first choice if you can not/hardly walk.
We would always book this Hotel again, the Service is so friendly, rooms are high and spacious, Price is affordable, environment is great... Fast check in: The registration form was already pre-filled, so the whole check in process needs something like 2 Minutes, that's very fast for the Philippines.
Room and shower (good for 2) are absolute clean, the bathroom mirror are 95% brilliant clean, the room mirror is 100% brilliant clean. to compare: In average, also in good hotels, the mirrors look like a child played on it with ice cream and a nutella bread...
Towels are fluffy, and the bedding and linen are super soft and smooth and silky. In a rainy season you can easy spend 2 Days only at the hotel because everything is wide and bright. I can not understand other complains here, but i am happy to become curious and test it for ourself.
Internet could have a bigger capacity, but Ping is very good (191 ms to denic/germany). One of the fastest possible pin gin the Philippines. Download is not that amazing, i think their Bandwidth is short for a lot of customers. But good enough for Video Calls!
6 elevators, but only 2 for the guest, means Apartment renter use their own elevators. Both guest elevators working, short waiting times, access only by keycard.
Breakfast is Asian style, no continental breakfast. But good enough for 2 or more days. Skip the "German Frank" or "German Sausage", they are horrible. Everything else was good and eatable, also a good Price/Quality (750 Pesos).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7Fzf286WUJVha45Qp-gQsa8gAertUdRpGyJbF"],"When":"2024-10-12"}]

title: Okada Manila
address: New Seaside Dr, Entertainment City, Parañaque, 1701 Kalakhang Maynila
descriptions: Stylish quarters in a cosmopolitan luxury resort offering a casino, multiple restaurants & a mall.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ryle Rafael Rival","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuK34URzpz-jhfFC0JEZ0RNBVxcsNuHMQs0d9F9SFu9B0Y1CAq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is more than just a resort or hotel to be honest. This place is majestic and breathtaking. Your rooms are splendidly designed, clean, and is like living as a king for 3 days. The jacuzzi is the best thing ever added in my room. Services are perfect! I like how room services are done every night so we don’t have to fix and clean everything ourselves as guests and it’s so comfortable staying there. The fountain display there is PERFECT! Especially the shopping center there. I even like how the rooms are digitally controlled. You don’t have to open the blinds yourself, get up and turn on the lights, etc. You can just control it by your tablet on your night table. It’s like living in 2100 with this hotel. Reception services are superb! Thanks to Daryl, one of the receptionists there during my checkout for being approachable and kind.

Do I recommend this place to people?
YES, absolutely. They’ll have the taste of living like a king and enjoying the atmosphere there.

-Ryle.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mobile50186600312","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qf66pF81jsVXBxevYxxL5FsdlDsKAngAUpJVE-hAwai1rl8J0QnYqktKV3UGdpbmNlc_A=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"We celebrated my birthday this October 15, organized by my fiancee Ms Crystal  Corpuz. We had a smooth check out attended by Ms Leslie that checked all our room|Charges and gave time to correct an mis charge,  We were most assisted by Sir KARL RAMCHAND whom kept us company upon waiting for valet and encourage us to visit this Christmas and avail more facilities. . So much more persons made our day special that we are melancholy leaving this place. Thank you very much and Hope to be back soon","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carol O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeYuXGoFc9HnT35lAJ46cKDIsHY7nNIKUKz_f8yINNlqyrU48jCx-4ctPzihRKgde030w=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Room is absolutely a five-star! You're the best Okada!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"airah fajardo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2BE8gnu8hK3XJJl1WrP7m9yVxMjNmrBmGzi4hS-_Oa_lxF3zz6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stayed here for 3 days and 2 nights, it is a nice hotel that has everything that we wanted for a hotel to have. Food in room and restaurants is very good 👍  will we visit next time...definitely!! |See you in December Okada!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Kroll","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDcSi6KHLf_kvDfHVicucjesB7VuVOZDUcUp8hDw_NteP-IwXMKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing place, the people at Okada are true heroes of hospitality. title: Hop Inn Hotel Aseana City Manila
address: Lot 9 Block 5, near corner of Bradco Ave and Macapagal Blvd Aseana City, Aseana Business Park, N Abueva St, Parañaque, 1702 Metro Manila
descriptions: Modern budget hotel offering bright simply furnished rooms with free Wi-Fi, plus parking.
complete_address: {"borough":"","street":"Lot 9 Block 5, near corner of Bradco Ave and Macapagal Blvd Aseana City, Aseana Business Park, N Abueva St","city":"Parañaque","postal_code":"1702","state":"Metro Manila","country":"PH"}
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"TJ Huntley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtLS1xwB-ijj9PVgqjj7nFkLXMTy0dCQboUr0m1iFJoA_9gn4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Stayed 3 nights.

Pros:
-The girls working at check-in are nice, friendly, professional, courteous, and informative.
-The rooms by Philippines standards are fairly clean.
-They have free water.
-The WiFi is ok for fb, TikTok, & surfing.
-The beds appeared to have fresh sheets.
-The air works great.
-Hot water and great water pressure in the shower.
-LOCATION! About a 10-15 min walk from MOA and a 5-10 min walk from Ayala Malls.

Cons:
-LOUD. All hours of the night. 9pm-2am and then from 5am-on, noise, noise, noise. I couldn't hardly sleep.
-The rooms need a deep cleaning, and it appears that whoever cleaned the room had hair fall. There were strands of hair everywhere but no other dirt and the floors appeared to be mopped.
-The TV is small and the sound was mono.
-They do not give you basic amenities like house shoes, toothbrushes, toothpaste but they do supply soap.
-The WiFi is not suitable for gaming as you lose connection every few minutes and get kicked off.

My suggestion to the owner/manager would be to stress to everyone the importance of staying silent in the hallways, especially at night, and stress to the workers the importance of being silent while working. (I'm not sure if it was people staying here or the workers that were loud.)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"K E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QdCjMUwIiBikRhCLHgN_0vyGAo1GvT8DEukiKQb1ujC_eFsFjYrQ0OvLoSxPtqmCdgvFA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I usually stay here before heading to airport, to avoid manila traffic. Very convinient location, once you exit hotel the road takes you direct to airport skyway so you will be in T3 in 10-15min. Hotel has 7/11 and coffee shop, very convinient to grab something in the morning. there is a new Parqal mall just outside, very nice outdoor shopping and restorants. Rooms are always well maintained and clean, very comfy sleep before the flight.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jefferson Tio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWw4i8--tfszT1e0enYN-TnwNAwfkuEhShuWcLxHNOzMkXpuzc-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hope Inn gives you a consistent value proposition. Good location, reasonable prices, good beds, hot shower, and cold Aircon. There always is a convenience store on the ground floor. In this location, there are coffee shops and restaurants nearby. Great for a night or two.  They don't have cabinets for long term stay. But generally there is a workspace within the room if you need to work. I would always consider this if I have to be in this area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Donna Gomez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIX-Nz3mfeXcQvumjJdsR46rIqmRZBVVi7kqpFbX9q-V38NSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I have been a fan of this hotel due to its affordable prices and cozy ambiance, from the lobby to the rooms. We usually stay in their Alabang branch, so this is my first time in this branch. My recent stay was quite disappointing. Upon checking in, I found the room to be very dusty and dirty. There was a significant amount of dirt under the bed, including a used cotton bud, and the floor seemed like it hadn't been cleaned for a long time. Additionally, the bathroom had hairs in the shower, indicating it had not been properly cleaned.

While the staff was accommodating and promptly addressed my concerns, the initial state of the room left a poor first impression. Despite this experience, I plan to continue staying at this hotel due to its convenient location for my personal events in the coming months. I sincerely hope to have a cleaner room during my next stay.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kavana Ramachandra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWN5BaCzpXXW7MVX8BxaP2muC7GC82mWOoqErF2K7FxrCdaXQ0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A decent room for a no-frills stay in Manila. The hotel offers simple amenities and everything you need for a comfortable night's rest. The room was clean, simple, and functional, making it a good choice if you're just looking for a place to sleep.
One of the biggest advantages of this hotel is its location. It's conveniently situated close to shopping centres and just a short drive from the airport, making it an ideal spot for those who need easy access to both. Hop Inn Hotel Aseana City is a good choice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mark Ian Espiritu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIokuO2uhcPu_q9TnueJHWkRz0c537x2naoC-TruIrYiswMtg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is a budget hotel so most toiletries are not necessarily available. However, the location is great with several malls and parks nearby. Staff were very friendly and they could accommodate early check-in when rooms are available, unlike most budget hotels that lets you wait for the official check-in.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"K E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgtX_XFrR905bz8JmvT5q4atk2kF0YXYZS3r0VcwTAGNCLhnqV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent hotel, always delivering good solid standard. Very attentive management and friendly staff. Nice views of the bay in some high floor rooms. Parking super easy and free. Parqal shopping is just outside with plenty of food. Good choice, keep on coming back here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLshFx6u0rQIu0BihivBQQB7b6Mx5iYcbMDmEjy6mv4H40sNRc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pro:
-Clean & Soft bed & blanket
-not big but not too small
-20 min walk to MOA
- no check out inspection by the hotel
***If you don't pay In advance, they email you to pay with a different credit card within 2 hours otherwise they cancelled your reservation. I received it 5am at the day of arrival and saw 8am.
Con:
-no hand soap / one liquid soap for body & hair
-no refrigerator

* After using my credit card at this hotel, my credit card was hacked.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: The Townhouse Hotel Manila
address: Villa Carolina Townhouse, Unit 32 Bayview Drive 3 Room Rates P500, P700, P1000/ night /1 or 2 persons Tambo, Paranaque City 1700, 199 Roxas Blvd, Parañaque, 1700 Metro Manila
descriptions: Unpretentious hostel offering a rooftop terrace & a lounge, in addition to Wi-Fi.
complete_address: {"borough":"","street":"Villa Carolina Townhouse, Unit 32 Bayview Drive 3 Room Rates P500, P700, P1000/ night /1 or 2 persons Tambo, Paranaque City 1700, 199 Roxas Blvd","city":"Parañaque","postal_code":"1700","state":"Metro Manila","country":"PH"}
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Grace v","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QdHDxxyBDO6igPA51sqxYAI1TTeuGvapT1sWSCJfPSgzOZltNlMhWmUDpj2A3v7zAw89g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"We stayed here for 1 night and I had no wifi to read the review first. What a disguisting hostel! After travelling for a month in the Philippines, this was by far the worst. The rooms were dirty, the shower still dont work! We had no water toe brush our teeth or even for the toilet. When we asked about it, the woman behind the counter said she would send the handyman the next day, but then we would be gone. Finally we could shower at another bathroom. There were bugs everywhere in our room, spiderwebs in our sink and even still towels from the previous visitors. The people working here are the most unfriendlies people i have ever met, every question was one to many and they could not even be a little polite to us. I would never stay here again and would strongly recommend people to spend there money elswhere. We're to afraid to try the food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Freda C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QcoKrjftg2H5FSPDgamEji1HcAj6KJIMYEaB28IfM5URISpFokTGJ4TKCMmdB7Et-p_0g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I stay here often when I visit Manila. The location is very close to the airport. The food is inexpensive and good, and there is always a fun vibe in here, You always meet people and learn new things just by being in the open room downstairs.||||The rooms range from a dorm with a shared bath (think YMCA) to a private suite with aircon and a private bath. I usually get a room with a simple bath and a fan for about $12. My room has always been amply comfortable and quiet. I've done the dorm a couple of times to, just to have a safe place to lay my head for a few hours at night in Manila. You're right on Roxas Blvd so you can get up to EDSA (Pasay) or over to the airport in a few minutes. I've even walked to the domestic airport from here in just 20 minutes.||||One drawback is there is no wifi here. So you'll need to disconnect for a while.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"CJ The Goofy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVp7jLolFl5cJyOdzS5SUuEAs2hHfm6IWw8IZg6rt2kuEnohIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"DO NOT BOOK THEIR DORM. The dorm is separated from the main building and we had to walk for a couple of minutes before getting there. It is completely inhabitable. The mattresses were centuries old, no pillows, one small fan barely working. You can't even sit because the bunk beds are so small and they're very very old. It even creaks when you sit on it. The room looked like a dungeon. There are even straps of napkins on the floor. How can the management offer this kind of dorm without even caring for the comfort of their costumers? I booked for 2 nights and I couldn't imagine staying their for the first night so I asked them to refund half of my payment but it was non-refundable. I totally understand their policy but they should make sure their \"bunk bed\" are worth \"non-refundable\". My experience was a nightmare!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Reda T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfnSFWXMd1oJu73a6IhdtgibYcjse2HKQTHeghNQd9Cyw8DYQQJZDCyh-TD68ehXuY-FA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Hello,||I am a frequent traveler and I am used to go to cheap hotels / hostels, as well as good ones, in SE Asia. |Since we only had few hours between two flights in Manila, we decided to stay in TownHouse hotel from 3am to 9am. It was the worst idea ever.|We choose a room with a private bathroom (the expensive one), and what can I tell you beside....run. Run as fast as you can. If you are thinking about booking a night there, then do not think about it any longer.|I am very sorry for the staff who was nice enough to open us the door at 3 in the morning but as a sign of respect to other travelers, they need to know how it really is.||The room was so dirty, just see the pictures. It has not been restored since the seventies or maybe even before! No flush and no paper at the toilet, not even water on the sink. The shower place was a simple sink with a bucket. No dustbin. |As you can imagine, we were very scared to get sick or to catch any disease from the bathroom or the mattress. So we couldn’t sleep at all.|Besides, we did not feel secure at all, considering the lock on the door of the room next to ours was “fixed” with tape roll.|It would have been better if we just stayed 6 hours at the airport.||Sorry again for the staff, I am sure they are doing what they can to run this place, but they should not show pictures that do not reflect the reality of the rooms.||This place was a nightmare...","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Peter E C H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qd0Gzx7-o-W0qn7F-oHhorx-ann6UFYRniBmE7Ar1MhRFtO-x6vY7U2LNCPC1lcQidkpw=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"The new aircon in the Townhouse hotel are totally useless! We stayed there for a week and the new Kepple aircon don't work. It only gives out a tiny fraction of air so slow that it is useless! We demanded a fan be put into our room to replace their useless air con;  and the staff said they will charge us 150 extra pesos per night for the use of the fan! Also the toilets in all the rooms that we inspected don't flush! We had to use a bucket of water every time to flush the toilet! Their toilets should be replaced. And there were dead bugs and heaps of piled up dust underneath all the furniture.  The room also regular ran out of water. We had to go to the reception nearly every day to request the staff pump more water for us.sometimes we had to wait up to 12 hours with nothing water in the room before the staff pumped more water into our rooms system.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniella S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qczn4VDfUM6-AtEt-6oaNazFa-i9Fy6kqPVfGIlPil6vJulEYyK8t930jZwOW4hD80mzw=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Before arriving at the hostel we sent an email to the owners just with some simple questions. It had been a while since we booked and we were worried about finding it. The owner emailed us back an extremely rude response about not reading their email carefully. I understand that it can be frustrating to answer customers questions if you think they are stupid but I don't think thy needed to be so rude. When we  arrived they were still so rude. The place was apparently \"renovated\"... I can't comment on what was but it certainly wasn't clean. Our room was so hot we didn't stay the whole night and left to stay at the airport instead. This may be a cheap place to stay, but your time is valuable and don't waste it here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"venger g","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QcLvGDdMkm_athQbRQtTYCQxjNUnlrxzopfUA8yGN0YYBZmB4uuNayh0HxTR0N7aNnuMg=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Very rude, unwelcoming, and inattentive staff. Rooms are real dirty and they stink. Bathrooms/Toilets are even worse! Used-toiletries were scattered. Cockroaches everywhere (dead \u0026 alive). Beware: They might say that your online booking (say you get the cheapest room) is not available when you check-in, so, you (tired and weary) are left with no choice but to get the expensive one. They can lie to you. They don't care about their business. They don't care about you or to anyone. They don't care at all. I wonder if they were really into business but one thing is for sure, they give the WORSE service to their clients. BE WISE. There are cheaper and comfortable places (hostels) to stay in Manila. Don't bargain with much less price for having a bad experience in terms of your place to sleep/stay. Don't aim for a nightmare if you like to dream about your wonderful travel to this beautiful country. YOU DON'T DESERVE TO BE TREATED OFFENSIVELY! Try to search for another place. This is not the right place for you. I tried WANDERERS HOSTEL (Adriatico St, Malate, Manila, Metro Manila) and MANILA PINK HOSTEL (Bautista St, Manila, Metro Manila); if not the best but these hostels were far better than Townhouse.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matt W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qf66pF81jsVXBxevYxxL5FsdlDsKAngAUpJVE-hAwai1rl8J0QnYqktKV3UGdpbmNlc_A=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Walked into main building which was dark, run down and foul smelling. Asked about dorm, price was cheap(!!!) but no wonder why. Staff seemed disinterested. ||||Walked down the road ~100m to a new building where it stunk of musty mouldy and wastewater, got to the room and it was like a 1950 torture house. Concrete floors and walls, no lighting, thin ripped curtain, no security in room, beds were filthy, and it stunk of sour milk/sweat. It was actually the worst hostel I’ve viewed. ||||Even though location is convenient and price is cheap it is NOT worth it. Do not consider staying here!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: RedDoorz near Tambo Quirino Avenue
address: ARIAS COMPOUND, 3384, Parañaque, 1701 Metro Manila
descriptions: Simple rooms, some with kitchenettes, in a modest budget hotel featuring a rooftop pool & a gym.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"L “WolfensteiN” A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBrsKCccRFXGgFuGD6hYq0XoNZMnvvfOfSKWOMIEK4WPC6oo-V=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It was after a typhoon week, so expecting that there were slight changes and additional rules for the rooftop/deck being not allowed to use/open.
