The Jacuzzi were kinda nice to stay though, keeping the water hot/warm at the very end. 🤍","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trip.com Member","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeCck1CfANpZm9bBk3PHtP97Kh9k25HZfvq9yAWlN3BaIyjSHUPEfWkhAJmuYiJsH-_6g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Good big place and easy to find.Great location, really pleasant and clean rooms, but the thing that makes this such a good place to stay are the staff. All of the people are incredibly helpful and generous with their time and advice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nam Malagueno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUv2xltQppAHmnRsVonF3KHhCPTlaTzsgkrYs3YQfzTT_VYfwSdwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Stayed for the night since it was near PITX. The room I booked was P1800. The location is not that nice since you have to walk a dark alley way to get there. The staff are accommodating and they'll give you a toothbrush, toothpaste, and soap once you check in.

The room was clean and spacious and the WiFi was strong. It takes a longer amount of time to cool the room. There is a sari-sari store at the entrance and they serve meals too. There are no nearby places to eat and tricycle drivers are asking for P100 just to get to PITX.

The walls are thin and I heard some people fighting, and playing loud mobile games at 3AM.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOItNwhzMrHO3lW1g511kRWlkP9vfr65CN1XiLd"],"When":"2024-3-9"},{"Name":"antoine Lassalle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZwDwo6tuPNhB_WCfYGq1RblFDTIgwUiVr4HLlfkErWfy49A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This hotel is in a great location near the airport.  You may need to use a grab or taxi to the airport. The view from the hotel is a city life ( not great ) . This hotel is located in a quiet way out. We had a quiet room. Downside, they have lights outside of our room. It was annoying.

The room was spacious. The room had a hot shower. We had good WiFi quality.

The management was professional and flexible. We managed to check out late.

We haven't tried the indoor swimming pool and jacuzzi.  It did look great !

Project : Midwives Around The World
#AlamaCare
#AntoineLphotos","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jean barcena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbytWPss1xWd9lJpgmcKaA62XHOC0R9ygSwDyG7Hd1WskQ83CB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The price of the hotel is affordable. A friend stayed here as well. There's a nearby restaurant just 150 meters away from the hotel. Had lunch in Baba's Cups and Bites. It was a great experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMO-YtlXKRmdwVd7KgoOb1vHLOg8eyGW_Go_csV"],"When":"2024-2-21"},{"Name":"Sam D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInsU_xedSGGfr_gvb2EOxvTH6r_N8tu8Jc46p4yU7gm3ETjHo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Not a great place to lay my head, only booked as had an early flight in the morning but regretted it big time. Rooms are basic, did have fridge and microwave. Had loud snoring neighbours with paper thin walls was not a good mix. I've given 2 stars as the staff were nice and food was great. Also why is there a picture of a pool? Absolutely not a pool there and no signs of ever one being there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"saify TeeVee (sai)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVygNiYkKhW-H3KyfmNGcEmLQwPd9pupg9DN4OmGY1T2ly2Eamu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I booked this via Agoda and I got a cheaper price from their regular rate of ₱1800 to ₱1196 only. The room is so basic but I was amazed that it has a kitchen with ref, microwave, heater and rice cooker. The room space is big. It’s like a studio type condominium. They also have TV, split type aircondition and a CR. I booked this because it’s the cheapest hotel near MNL 2 and MNL 1 for I have an international flight the next day. The hotel staff were so hospitable. I was a bit worried for they have to bring my luggage to the 3rd floor which were heavy. I don’t what the staff did in order to deliver it to my room quickly. 😂 For the location, it is near the airport but the road going here is a bit scary since the main road is still under construction. So I won’t dare to go outside at night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0WpjdLe_swrPSbYwguJpyjwD0fC8mExZ4-oEw"],"When":"2023-8-20"},{"Name":"David O'Brien","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMJuJw1TOfsTUx_1p0iQ-de0ikgdcO7Z-4xVB1QJeFtW8uGEN2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I booked a room with a queen size bed along with the jacuzzi tub in the room. I was charged more than what was on the website, when I arrived I was given keys, went upstairs to the room to find two twin size beds... Ohhhhh NO NO NO, I immediately went directly down stairs to the front desk to complain.  I was told that that's what I was getting...

I refused to accept their offer, they eventually gave me a room with a queen size bed, but without the jacuzzi tub.

The hotel was in a ghetto area, in a dark and dirty back alley.

Would I stay there again...
"NO NOT AT ALL"","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Belmont Hotel Manila
address: Newport Blvd, Newport City, Pasay, 1309 Kalakhang Maynila
descriptions: Contemporary property featuring a restaurant & a gym, plus a rooftop terrace with a pool & a bar.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marku Chi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWw55QERDE6xqPYHdOgRtSuSxAOx7Lm9-fFY5aLtdu3FSTQWB4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This hotel has the perfect location among others. There is a runway bridge which is connected from terminal 3 then head straight to the hotel. Terminal 3 has international and domestic flight at the same time. So I have really the excellent place to be during my flight both international and domestic. The room is tidy and clean. The bed is so comfy and I slept good. Service and security was excellent. They do had a rooftop bar and nice infinity pool above with a view of the airport. I had a chance to see and use the gym and sauna which is always ignored during a hotel stay. It was great time there too. Breakfast was also amazing with wide varieties of filipino food. I would definitely recommend this place to all travellers and staycationers.😇","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEGg-00ihbkLARO82tcAxhAnw8C5tHyc-ZVB-5"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"ged m","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qexe1uajF-TSqvbHLzgtUk80BSJEirwlZxdhwIhHVVewMbFHRaNf97WJ3b7Rq47i8M9nA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Perfectly adequate hotel, very convenient for T3 - across covered walkway, breakfast OK but a little busy when I was eating.|Surrounding area has most if not all of what you might need to do when staying at the Belmont (shops, restaurants etc).|Hotel staff were pleasant and efficient.|Minor criticism is that the rooftop bar doesn’t have any views, and is very noisy, planes taking off and landing. Not the hotel’s fault, but you should be aware if you want a quiet sundowner.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Parnell E. LaLonde IV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAztj-6MJF-eqrfggV_vB7sJ6cGGWQKKiBahnKXZRmfgtneSmm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The hotel is incredibly convenient, just a short walk across the “Sky Bridge” from Terminal 3 on the fourth floor. You descend to the ground level and find yourself less than 50 yards from the hotel entrance. The entire path is undercover, well-lit, and safe. No taxi or trike required.

By USA standards, the room is exceptionally clean, comparable to a nice Hilton. The staff is extremely friendly and welcoming. After a 21-hour flight, I walked from the airport, checked in, and was in my room within minutes. The lobby is open 24/7, so you can check in at any time.

The room offers bottled water, a hot shower, good air conditioning, a clean and comfortable bed, and room-darkening window coverings. There’s even a nice restaurant in the lobby if you arrive early enough. It’s exactly what you need after a long flight.

The room rates are very good especially when you consider how close to the airport you are.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bill Hensley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLvpXl8swmpn4omgUPFD3VUYPc2mQfslBYjobWReAoBxnAiaGY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hotel was very nice & clean. Our shower the water pressure was amazing and water was nice & hot. Bed was a little stiff for my liking but I still slept good. The staff very professional and polite. Breakfast buffet had a nice selection and was pretty good. Only stayed a night and didn’t have time to explore outside but it’s right near terminal 3 walking distance and a few mins to the other terminals. From the taxi ride in and out the area around hotel was pretty nice plenty of places to eat. When ever I have a short layover in Manila I’ll be staying at this hotel from now on. Highly recommend it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eloisa H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QcHdm0oAuHtzPwzcwUtTqUfPbZXmYnyyN78cO7_Z2aHVLpBkIuu0olTbSpOuQZcPV9sYQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Lights in room too dim. Hotel conveniently located across airport. Rooms quite small but very clean. Bathroom super tiny. ||Bell man Joseph Eman was awesome. Took our bags across the bridge to airport for us. Extremely polite and accommodating.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Conor Fleming","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKK6DOOXaZE8SRGo1BwU1uMWW5B1cfdzop46u4M-qbW-eyktQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can’t beat it for airport convenience. Eliminates having to deal with Manila traffic if you are just doing a stopover. Rooftop bar and food is good. Breakfast was decent but quite busy, expect to wait for a table. Rooms are basic and clean.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"richard “tienRNTV” salinda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhI9wdIKdjv5X5-OGe7rTiCQXZZ2LRTK3wPi_raRY8yNw5Ju9hpw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome stay. I got the corner room which i requested and i loved the view. overlooking the airport, planes taking off and landing was an amazing view. overall, our stay worth what you've paid for. staffs are all amazing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gaabje","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0E34A1WoiGGs_saGGKz_7wHEI2m39oj512A-r0JPBtiZs7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Overall my experience at this hotel has not been good. This has multiple factors, cleanliness of rooms, quality of food and dinner service.

The rooms have a nice layout and feel spacious. After a few minutes and wanting to shower we noticed that in the shower and bath room there was a lot of black mold which I feel like is a definite no go in a hotel. This has to be sorted.

We had drinks at the rooftop pool bar, these drinks were nice but not great. Regarding the food at the restaurant, we ate dinner there. The quality of the food was not what I expected from such a hotel. We had cold fries with the burger and a appetizer after the main course. Would not recommend to dine here.

We have communicated these issues to the hotel staff and offered a discount for the next stay and to clean our room at night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5_GYco_yTsSghUCyIRGd4dnLwwt43iTMS_8qK"],"When":"2024-7-16"}]

user_reviews:

However, we encountered some issues - the TV was nit working due to a missing remote, and the elevator seemed to require maintenance. Additionally, the reception was quite busy, leading to longer wait times. Furthermore, the scent used in the lobby was overpowering and not pleasant. Overall, our stay was satisfactory, but there were some aspects that could be improved for a better experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"NG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4OjyDouDcl-gAiuBbxn2rveokVMHq-ckt1QoN-LuFyc45LtzC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stayed there for 5 days and 4 nights. The room was fine, it included a separate shower and comfort room, a sink, a heater, and 2 bunk beds. I liked that the room have a long desk attached to the wall with 4 separate drawers with an outlet for each drawer. We also had a small private little drawer attached to the bed with another outlet and a small light for one's personal use. The room is good for students since it is a dormitory type place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gideon Brent Corpuz Juane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt3aTDqEvUslcd3hgOBuO07tQiF0BV0t0ZGdBbar-2ZuZEeJ9T=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an incredible 24-hour stay at this hotel. Everything from the friendly and efficient staff to the impeccably clean and comfortable room made my visit exceptional. The hotel’s location is ideal, with easy access to local attractions, and the amenities provided made my short stay both relaxing and enjoyable. The attention to detail and high level of service truly made a difference, and I would highly recommend this hotel for anyone looking for a top-quality experience, even if just for a day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSkAdTYf_vRcMK5eivDU0l3yfZI5Jy9j7AW8_x"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Lord Dresdan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICKZnWwXW3j7mzzQJOGxf_q_g8aeLPfYqOFSFaiKtyMlzFRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Good spacious rooms that are affordable, unfortunately there some glaring defects on each room that i tried to book and it seems they still havent resolved the roach infestation on each room.

It seems whatever room i booked i can always see those little critters hiding under the crevices of cabinets and they especially come out in numbers during the night. Maybe they should thoroughly do a quality control on their rooms or it would greatly hurt their image.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Augusto Kalingking","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoF6zyzPzTsVBnX-RqWBGwj_FxmFSb1SLprqVZEnpoy4XOsUN2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Reception staff is very helpful but limited in actions due to overload of tasks in the reception. Perhaps of being alone to attend to the guests. No Manager is available to speak to respond to customer's complaints. I have to come back personally Two times at GSquare to follow up my lost & found item. Mr. Wilbert help me out to investigate who disposed my lost item. How much more if you left behind your valuables. Integrity is completely missing in this property. Contractual housekeeping attendant requires a refresher training on how to handle Lost & Found items of the residence. They promised me a compensation but as of to date nothing has been received. Other bad stay experience; No hot water in the shower room, no complimentary water upon check-in and OMG overcrowded in the reception due to group departure.
Date of stay: 03 - 04 Aug24
Room 6P","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cristina Temena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI99CFXl71t2rJuI-UIZYpxu5P_oyacgRPGZ-Evc4SBfRAYMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stayed at 1 room 4 beds. Room is nice. I can say its a good price and budget friendly compare to other accomodations arround the area.
Good location, very accessible to public transportations. But expect noise can be heard from train and vehicles.
Toilet is ok. Room it self looks clean at first but i accidentallly look under the bed and it seems not swept for long time. (You can ask for cleaner anyway). There is small cockroach visiting from time to time.
Staffs are friendly. There is boiler, cups and bottled water which is very good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ask Aiza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP-oeSY4DA72jRi4H_1D7oe0jwX2XrSQ4MPbpit2NWyN52dB0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is a very reasonably priced nice clean room in an OK area.
Just so long as you don't mind staying in a deathtrap.
As a multiday tour manager I am in the habit of actually checking fire escape routes are safe. I check the routes are uncluttered, unlittered, properly lit free from slippery slicks etc.
Both fire escapes failed in every single way possible. Garbage or trash trundlers dumped out-of sight out of mind just behind almost every fire escape exit  on every floor. Some floors not properly lit. At least one floor had a large liquid spill likely to result in people slipping in an emergency situation.
While staff were initially very unresponsive, they were moved by the video walkthrough I showed them.
So either it is still a deathtrap or with any luck they have improved and if so, you're welcome.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Felicidad Ngayawon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJS99KhpPWtnqmVbR9xF1Sg0cxP6RJ5dd7HJEtIpV_wMx0rZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Bunk Bed room. 8F
Advantage:
1. Very accessible to vehicles
2. Affordable/Cheaper than other condo/hotel
3. Rooms good for 4 persons. Time-in the same to time out.
4. 7-11 beside the Loby entrace area
5. Many cabinets and outlet
6. 4 drinking bottles and have kettle for hot water

My experience;
5. So noisy when ever trains and car are passing by
6. When i enter the room, lots of hair are in the corner near the door(seems not finish cleaning)
7. Floors are wet (so slippery) need to be careful when walking (seems floors have moist)
8. TV not working.(no remote)  i inform twice the frontdesk at the lobby but she always said she already inform the maintenance but till then  i check out no body came to check or assist.
9. No telephone used to connect the lobby
10. Poor wifi connection
11. Hot water on the shower is not much functioning, just room temparature. No free bath soap and shampoo
12. Frontdesk are not approachable/friendly and seems unwillingly to grant simple guest request about the problem of the room. (Not well assisted) they give the room without checking the room status
13. Over all..i was disappointed and just spent 1 night which i supposed to recommend to my friend because it's affordable and accesible but i change my mind base on my experience","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: RedDoorz Plus @ Canley Residential
address: 331 Robinson's Cir, Pasig, 1600 Metro Manila
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"William T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVosCd9boqt69cC66oLr5r0FDzZ99FZT2GJbhcl_J3BH3zqPLAP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Perhaps the worst place I have ever stayed at the price I paid for. 3 roaches in just one night, no hot water, no TV (but a remote controller!) as advertised. The floors had dirt and debris and there were parts like door handles, toilet seat cover, and a random crutch in the corner. This place looked like a ransacked hotel.

At least the sheets and towels were clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-9vl8QI_2_In-Amr79XfzGqdj4Zk7oOGvH9hx"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"John Ivan Hurboda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-sWfnVBsyKyBbU6G7F_rD2L9nikkTHenDM2lU-f4ABXFyi_I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Based on my experience, I don't really recommend this place, especially when booking more than 24 hours stay. I had a really bad experience with this place.

The place is not sanitized, dusty, and the customer service is barely friendly. What scares us more is that there is no security, no convenient parking, no food service. The price itself? It is pricey based on the hotel quality.

It is not also safe, I can't take away the feeling of subtleness, we feel that we are being watched, and the place has a negative energy, I can't seem to shake what's the exact feeling we're having and we can't sleep.

We can't even stay about 3 hours with our 48 hour booking, jeez... No refund as well so better think twice before going to this place.

This is a true experience, no biased review, it's legit. If you want to book, Sogo would be better.

If you have family, I highly recommend not to book in this place, I feel I've been scammed, and don't fall by others review it's legitimately not a good idea to book in this place really.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ruth Alexandria Anne Luto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVb2BMbtNK3qkUN3rQcHfgLvtbYkvjRKW0WAX2cjGZox-ku8FA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you are someone born in the slums, I don’t think you’re gonna have a problem with this place. But if you have been living comfortably in a clean and healthy environment, I don’t suggest booking here. We booked for 3 days and 2 nights and we regret everything. The room smells. The floor is dusty. The comfort room will give you nausea no comfort at all. The airconditioner is moldy so it smells so bad. The bed is awfully used as well as the pillows. Everything in this unit smells. It’s so sad that RedDorz mission and vision is not even applied a little. Perks will be a fast internet connection and the customer service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"matt u.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtpFqzUuk3ROVXC_EplonXOd8J1XnIPt8SMR4bTWXoRYZBLuU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A LITERAL HORROR MOVIE EXPERIENCE

We booked for 3 days and 2 nights. Before checking in, they already had a problem with the reservation. I got emails that my slot got canceled literally hours before check-in. Good thing customer service was kind enough to confirm that it's just the system malfunctioning. Other customers also experience the same.

On the day of the check-in, my mom and younger sister were let in only by saying my name. No IDs. No confirmation from my end. Which is a big red flag! They might be letting in strangers!! I arrived a little late that day. Upon arriving, the place looks like a normal house in a residential subdivision. Entrance was barely lit. The hallways are reminiscent of dark alleys in horror movies; you wouldn't dare to walk alone. Upon entering the room, it's got a unique smell. There are two single beds as booked but only one has a mattress. The pillows are also stained. But what caught our attention is what seems like another sketchy door in the room with an empty bed in front of it. The bathroom also has a scary hole in the ceiling, atop the toilet bowl itself. What made us decide to leave that night was when we heard screeching noises and scratches. Also, the weird vacant room was really unsettling. We're tired but we went home instead. We don't wanna stress ourselves anymore!

As we leave the premises, people at front desk just took our keys. No questions. Didn't even check our room and just let us go. Totally a horrible experience. Can't forget the unlit hallways leading to the elevator. We're scared for life we thought we'd never get out of there alive. Would never book in any RedDoorz ever!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chona S Chuy Darm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVPuYXEYAIOSigTwQBSDJmAWAga9ZJmZB26kegGh-rBiglgJlK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not a very comfy room. Vet big space no proper ventilation. Smells like public c.r and I don't know where the smell coming from. All the smell from the kitchen, hallway (like smoke), and c.r packed in 1 room. Being in the room is suffocating and haunting.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christian Rico Mangaoil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVE04vM-_E4JdKs2iPpuR2dFHvUKtWoJv_K4UYQu1l4qKphisyTfg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The unit is unfinished many cabinets is not yet finished. And toilet dosent have flush.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Redeyed Jack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHqEaQpAS2qRrATnA4PkqUK6Caaf27MsbZBRIa2NxzQFFNEhc9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It is quite accomadating and the place is kinda decent and AC is good. No telephone. You need your smartphone to ask room service. It has free Wi-Fi. For the bathroom.  I do advice you check especially the water bucket it is kinda moldy. The place is somewhat inside the subdivision. So no stores here u need food delivery.  The price is good for 1 whole night.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Myraflor Valdez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9m4fJdnRMyfrzJdwKeNBceWMLRtU58zzL-S5iDooMFGoG43qn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When I arrived in the hotel from my trip they gave me a smaller room which wasn't what I booked,then there was no cups,nor spoon nor any utensil to use,they only trsnsferred me when I ask them,then the 2nd room they gave aircon was so noisy at night,always wake at midnight,then I turned positive with my test,manager told me just to book for the rest of my stay at least 9 days which I did since BOQ wasn't available,then BOQ came to fetch me,the girl on the front desk told me to go eventhough I told her I was already booked for 8 days but she was furious instead and told me I wasn't following the rule?Hello,they were the one(their manager) was the one who convinced me,then there I realize they are just after the money...I rate this hotel poor because of the staff's manner and also some of their ammenities,they aren't like the RedDoorz I usually book before in Makati area,they have a poor customer service!!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Time Travellers Hotel
address: 1184 A A. Mabini St, Ermita, Manila, 1000 Metro Manila
descriptions: Simple rooms in a straightforward hotel offering a restaurant & a spa with massage services.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Roselito III Angot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHcO_1QwWLcXzvPcXp6_2CKBbaxfTBKOHh8UqwMd-bBQzi3IXn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Location is great. Found in the heart of Malate and walking distance to Luneta Park and Robinsons Manila. You can request change sheets anytime (I do this around 9pm when I arrive). Overall pleasant experience.

The room is spacious and contains the basic necessities. The shower water pressure is a bit low. Would definitely comeback.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSzPnUinEPpp3tAbcrbHkyw2ViTIC3ZaAh1VzK"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Palthyavath Anil Chavan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUimDHEAS8zB8lYwaMV-4JUUW7LjN8CRa9brFi0LvuVwm80k_lh3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Water heater of the CR was not working and when asked they didn't do anything about it telling that it is holiday here in the Philippines so we don't have staff today. Employees at the reception desk were rude and were asking extra money than the decided rate and they were literally shouting at us.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mara Sophia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUob-Ot0QYfrKlpJ5RnzFGc7lRor8WDsO83ADfJeiakWHg2rnk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I stayed here cause it’s closer to my intended business for the week, chose their eco double room. At first i expected that i will just have a small ugly room because of how cheap it is, i was surprised at how big the room is and it has a small kitchenette and a dining table, it exceeded my expectation for its price, staffs were accommodating, only cons are rooms are not sound proof so u can hear loud motorcycles and beeping from outside, tiny tv but has cable, and room lights are too dim, but overall, i had a nice stay, plus 7 eleven is just below, which made it convenient for me. If i need to go back in the area i would surely stay here again. ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEBjOIYBctJescZoLH9yq0XyJVcOlwJl519kDR"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Mitchell Winter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ52f9beRzWg5vo095lEoiVxxbEraOMPogmAs_FGj_mBTsgzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great little place to stay. Very handy for the sports bar where I go to watch the football and across the road there's Cowboy grill. A nice place to eat and watch a show with free entrance.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Seeley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDr-7eWaQvsaJPNE2_nf47s7ghju6IdRjzJgKDBKID7Us-6Kvz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Been to Manila many times but this hotel is by far the absolute worst. cockaroaches all over the room dirt room had to rent water heater mini fridge did not work. They also made me rent an extra pillow for a double bed sheets smelled wifi was horrible. they also would not refund me my money and I left hotel. worst service ever go to the red planet amazing hotel. I give this hotel a Zero!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ruby Desu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNjj8nn0ftRvOTe70Cv33bzNNAm35lom-DLGND93tn8hAXG471=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The room was spacious, with a ref, water heater and heated showers. We got a good deal thanks to agoda, around 5k for 4N5D.

Location was excellent, 1 jeepney ride going to Binondo, Quiapo and Divisoria. Walk a block away and there's a jeep going to Baclaran and from Baclaran, you can ride a jeep going to SM MoA. You can walk to Robinsons or in Dolomite, also a walking distance from SLEC and the US Embassy. There's a bar right below the hotel, so some rooms might hear loud music, good thing our room had the quiet side.

The cons, they don't clean rooms. We stayed a bit longer so we wanted them to tidy our room a bit and take the trash since it was piling, but they would just agree to clean but not really do it. The staff were approachable though.
Wifi was close to nonexistent. They give you vouchers to use 500mb of data, they give a lot of these and you can ask for more. I tried using it but it was such a hassle so I just use my own mobile data.

It's a budget friendly hotel, might book again if I needed a quick visit around the vicinity.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMU1u8qXhdZHlUipM817Z5zcTbOUgd9qSNtWEJI"],"When":"2024-3-3"},{"Name":"Haydie Alvarez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzXiD5AHW9_Im2KgHA8wBYOvR2N7fDdfsy-ukkfUKWHd3qvsQm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The room is good and also the bathroom,a friendly budget prices.and the staff is nice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXJ13_yhrKG2tDoRkgJVozMCqnk6fR6vNFQDD2"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Ime Lara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7kqMqSrmMRy4NfvhAwYqLjDnaMg77rr8EsJuL1hB7u_qv915G=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"What I can say is that it's decent and affordable. Dont expect too much. If you're looking for a budget hotel, time travellers hotel is the best option. I paid 2,720 for 3 days and 2 nights of stay. The room is spacious. Faucets, Mini fridge, Water heater, television, aircon are all functional. The staff are friendly. The only problem was that they're not very responsive in the agoda app and no mobile number I can contact.  I tried to ask twice if they accept card, unfortunately they didnt respond. Luckily, I still have cash and the receptionist allowed me to pay (refundable upon check out) 1,000 pesos for the security deposit at a later time. There's a 7/11 just beside the hotel and there's an atm machine inside.

I saw two cockroaches, i did not bother to take a picture. And also I think it's best to include in the agoda app about their policy about the security deposit. It's my first time to check in solo, i didnt know security deposit is a common practice in the hotel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBuqEIkVaEvLTKBNs5qWVUvAsRhr0Ke1M9qYN3"],"When":"2023-10-17"}]

title: Stone House Hotel Pasay
address: Stone House, 2231 Aurora Blvd, Pasay, 1300 Metro Manila
descriptions: Straightforward hotel with humble rooms & mixed or female-only dorms, some with shared bathrooms.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Servatius Antonius","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVc__4FYnjuAiqkrb7tUo3nGl-wjwnrbmo6VQbyv7LCXSJg9-IP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The rooms were nice, shared bathrooms we're always squeaky clean and my stay was very good here.

The staff was what really made my stay. I got a nasty foot infection in which all the staff and the owner of the hotel got concerned with and tried everything to help me.

People in particular was Liza the secretary,  Primo (which I think was his name) in particular helped me in the stressful time. The security guard called Fernado told me where to go regarding my infection and even sorted out transport to the locations I had to go to! He kept me company and made sure everything was okay with me. He got someone to get me supplies from the pharmacy the following day as I couldn't walk far anymore.  Now I can travel back to Europe safely with clean medical supplies and I can't thank him enough!

Yes my stay was amazing but it was the staff that really made my stay at the hotel! Will definitely return!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Faisal Bousaidi (Fais)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLf87JpLgFp9yLiy46pUPOdJN65B-JHFHOwkcpdgOaHBczL39Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Be Alert all foreign tourists:

As a Canadian tourist I could say it is a budget hostel n I have no other complain but....

They don't allow any visitors here..if anybody come to see you...the security guard n receptionist lady give them too much trouble, ask them creepy questions...until they get bothered n go back...

They never give you a contact of their manager or boss whoever....I have already complain to philippine tourism department.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"chona rayco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWiFR44b42tzEq5eKaIZvbtblQqVZkby8yDCk0_S42SmwjHkD7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoy our stay. Free WiFi Available. With a Restaurant downstairs.

Would love to give a big shout to
Mr. Ding Fernando Ablao, who was our Room Attendant who gave us excellent service 5stars.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rey mark Sacedon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWR2kwjVahmHCgaNIusYNxXIEdua66yW9Jm575gAWbfsD_gBhXn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My experience was just okay.

I booked thru an app 2 single bed and they gave me 1 double bed and I asked for another blanket since they only provide 1 and when I ask the staff they said they cannot give me extra one because they only provide when you book 2 single bed. The whole experience was just okay because we had to check out early for our flight.

The check out is just like normal check out process

Plus you can order food outside","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoH5V-lLdKpbkGQX9KK-Zd4YKWSR4nG4KUFGyjic8raMWZel6F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The room was super small though the toilet was clean and nice. The location was also great, closed to the airport, public transport etc. Good choice if you dont have much time in Manila","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jeryl guineo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfzABFYZpR5CpER9jNupeKvUpn77cpip7q1t_2tNsLs18OGBM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"+ I would like to commend Kuya/uncle Security guard for being nice & helpful. 🙌
+ The hotel is convenient & is near the airport and bus terminals.
- The room is cramped & small cockroaches linger in the room & in the bathroom.
- The food at the restaurant is overpriced!

Note: There is a 500 pesos deposit upon checking in. Keep the receipt & DO NOT FORGET to remind the staff to get it back when you check out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxK3Qo361baTw3s9wTcJaVZVUqphl4kIPQLGPP"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Valred Olsim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzcj64gjGsmu68AMxoEovHJGaNmrGHxv7Lxph9fIysl2qDn_SZkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Rooms look bigger in pictures. Although they have very clean common toilets. Ideal when you want to spend a night before flight as it is 15 minute taxi to Airport Terminals.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi26s4mrQcZR0DOaOeGyElXdB8dIkyBwEyTYsw"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Vanessa Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpJ3li7ObsRBUTufSsuFxFQe_ajOmjm4iJl2zsSHHDsDaluA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The 2 star rating is based on the food we had

- The chicken and pork rice dish didn’t have any pork

- The omlette was decent but I was told there was no meat in it but it came with ham, not the staffs fault as I don’t speak the local language so I understand if there was a mix-up

- The french fries were anaemic and the portion was small

- Overall, quite pricey for the quality of food, if you walk down further, down the alley way to the left of this place there are many local eateries that are better and more reasonably priced","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Bay Prime Hotel
address: GXHV+45P Bay Prime Hotel, Roxas Blvd, Parañaque, Metro Manila
descriptions: Modern hotel offering an outdoor pool & breakfast, plus a chic restaurant with a global menu.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"GN M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9IWs_JlH0biExoXu42Bp30o7I9fbU5A49TzlK1ZIxlgOOfy6k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The moment you reach the hotel you're greeted by the bellman and security. The lobby stench was so foul that it always leaves a disgust on my face, it's the same when you step out of the lift lobby. Majority of simple requests were not met. It's appalling how you request for sets of cutleries and the staff has no clue what a cutlery is. The ceiling in front of my room was leaking, leaving a puddle on my front door. No service recovery offered or whatsoever. The front desk trainees are left alone not knowing what to do. Do not bother asking them for simple information within their vicinity- they also have no clue what's surrounding them. Staff has no sense of urgency at all. The pool and gym facilities are so badly lit and or not lit at all. They do not prioritize your safety around the property. The manager is nowhere to be found when you ask for one. There is obviously no communication amongst them or they're simply not updating their alerts or comments in their system. Good budget hotel if you're looking to stay a night but not any longer. I will never come back again. I'm pretty sure there are better hotels out there with the same price range and friendlier staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Esther Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpUlVanNqPteRA9epXi-ALwS4Ck3Y29kJSWGx4hjYrYzjOUBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Receptionists do not know how to be polite and to be behave. They don’t even deserve to be one. When you ask questions, they act like they did not hear or see anything, whispering to each other even if you’re a foreigner who understands Tagalog. Please improve and train your staff. The hotel is so close to the airport , which you may accept a lot of international guests. Other than the interior, it does not deserve 4 Star at all. Totally over ranked.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joven Rubilla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsSuFaPaIcDmna9sFs3r-lgPVsA8LrjOnhgxqRyJzceHS36oUV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bayprime Hotel is a solid choice for travelers seeking a comfortable and convenient stay in Manila. It's particularly well-suited for those looking to explore the nearby attractions and enjoy the amenities the hotel offers. They also offer sumptuous Chinese style foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtYkPa06dgStW3X_8FSP0qaJ-q02c5ZuapUsBa"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"E P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QcHdm0oAuHtzPwzcwUtTqUfPbZXmYnyyN78cO7_Z2aHVLpBkIuu0olTbSpOuQZcPV9sYQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Overall good value for money friendly staff, comfortable rooms. Good breakfast for cost of the motel. They were a bit tight with giving us water family of x4 2 adults x2 teenagers they would sometimes only give x2 bottles and we would have to pay for extra 2 !! Same with toilet paper only providing 1 roll at a time.|Great pool, gym didn’t have a lot of equipment but was okay.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Caleb Glover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmomAFMB_Te_D_pGSe3drQ11ZyAVFGZ1jvEQd9m7w1c-7TMA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The rooms are great. We have no complaints with those.

The food, is quite possibly the WORST restaurant I've ever been to in my life. Lemonade tasted like it had alcohol in it. A total of 3 sips were drank and they refused to remove them from the check. Chicken was horribly overcooked and barely edible. Fried rice was mostly green onion and gross. McDonalds makes better and more edible food than this place. Avoid it like the plague and go quite literally anywhere else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6p14ArZ1gnz75b_4rUNYN_Lg4FBve3iq4G-BWdSVhCYwc27pe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing and extremely affordable compared to American hotels.

This hotel is beautiful from top to bottom and the service from the moment you walk though the door blows away hotels I've paid 2 or 3x more for in the states. They greet you at the door with a smile, help you with your bags, the elevator and halls are clean and beautiful, the rooms are emaculate and high-tech with modern TVs, lights and international power outlets.

A lovely pool and gym, a CLEAN 24 hour convenience store is right outside the front door and the inhouse cafe is beautiful, clean, and the food is good.

Not only is this better than many USA hotels for the price but even better than the few other local hotels I stayed in and only a few pesos more.

If you are looking for a 1st class experience or wanting to feel like you've been transported to another word right here in the Philippines I strongly recommend the Bay Prime Hotel.

10/10 Value
8/10 Location
9.5/10 Cleanliness
9.5/10 Amenities (no microwave)
10/10 Service","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shasha Apolinario K.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoQsy75pOyQVu_GAkcKYsX8NSaU5E06_Pt05Fp0DzAmov4Zznf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In the future this hotel is very nice and recommended except for the very strong smell in our room it’s because it’s new but they should put air fresheners to go the very strong smell of the room over all the staff friendly especially the guards and bellman it’s just dessapointing that they only accept credit cards they have 3 security deposit so prepare your cash or credit card that’s the only thing they accept and if you have kids with you like 3 years old up better bring their pass with you because front disks will ask for it. I don’t know why but that’s it the pool is nice good food","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOf6ghqk_j_S3tRkL_sh0l94MQvT0ViBrsVTdcG"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Inemeng Kinantot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPpHbG8EdFHlDMWWWDgTIhyY3gZVZ3smGp58mJToumiZZ6xw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"WORST!!!!! THE RECEPTION IS VERY EMBARRASSING!!!!!!!!! Very strict on visitors unlike other hotel. We were charged immediately 20dollars per pax for our 2 visitors even just a few minutes after 10pm. Even though we said that we are on our process of the wedding for tomorrow. The receptionist made us feel we were trespassing even though we were guests. They always saying because it is the rule of the management. Even extra bottled water is 2 dollars per small bottle of water. Some hotels you can get it for free. Buffet breakfast is very common and fewer options. Better get Jollibee! For the price and location, better check other hotels. Very few ammenities! They have better services than here.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Cayco House by Hotel Durban
address: 6249 Cayco, Makati, Metro Manila
user_reviews:

Very quiet. Big reception area with a table pool.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzG0OtUN9x53wPOTHg5z9iYfXArTzalZI6Vcze"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Sheanna H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTWT3N_wasDJZXST9khzx1dWLjZ_yLoTncJQkrlkWVOKE5NVCV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lobby is truly unique, masculine like a bachelor’s pad.

Location was superb! In the heart of Poblacion, Makati known for popular pubs and restaurants.

Service was excellent. Front desk never ceased to give a warm welcome and full assistance.

Thank you, Cayco! Had a good stay in your place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBLwhU47tmahYFXK2chE4CZKcZR-7p5560Pq2L"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Fabricio B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOCicTZRzXM12247eUjL2DAp0oJ4tx7iUhQ_9zxE2Sl9Pr1NU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had a 20 hour layover in Manila. While we were looking at where to go, P. Burgos street popped up as an option. Interestingly enough, it was safer during the night there than most of the rest of Manila we walked through the next day.

Anyway, we checked in at around 4am. Front desk Niños was very helpful, welcoming, and had a great attitude. Check out time is 1200 noon, so good time to get a late nap.

The price was about 1500 pesos so not bad. You can get it for less than 1000 pesos if you book online.

There is a particular rooster (pictured), which drove us crazy from 4am until 1200 noon when we left. We found him down the street and it was the same tone and tempo we heard throughout the night. I would have turned him into soup if I could.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSrJ5Pm-fUMemGD3crcXNu_X4sSVHJUaWh2qtO"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Doane Visitacion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDrUaXeUQ-LyQYptK02wK2Q2YhZhta5MbpSbKF7wIdULT0NhB3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Property is lovely and for the introduction price it’s quite a good deal. But you get what you pay for.
Just be warned that internet is horrible. It warrants an expletive and their IT person needs to branded as a fraud.
Update: any negative review on this property will get you banned. So be forewarned.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpwOLHw84rBhcGRzvGgPnZvjo7xZ5iqHM7GkHL"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Emmanuel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2-OGUtVh3uU-jdEn3zTNAtTfSp_tG0qq5iULgfYKaBoUx70g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been there, great place and a big building. title: La Belle Residences
address: 7733 Saint Paul Road, village, Makati, 1203 Metro Manila
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"RR balmes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTT0eBDzZPf3VWPsvT0u34LvPJCVUq3TxDjz9fniteXiaOq8Ac=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Traumatic experience. We stayed here for 3 nights on Oct 5-8, 2024. We paid a late checkout fee upon booking but the staff mistakenly checked out our room around 1am. Around 7am in the morning thankfully we are already awaked and watching tv suddenly the housekeeping attempt to open our room. And then around 12:30pm, the receptionist is calling on my phone reminding us to checkout already even though I paid a fee to checkout at 3pm. They said they don't know and did not check the booking. Poor coordination and staff orientation. The staff apologized and they offer to talk to their HR but we don't want to talk about it anymore we just want to leave. There is a 2000 pesos security deposit upon check in but refundable so be prepared. Will never go back ever on this one.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eugene T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QcHdm0oAuHtzPwzcwUtTqUfPbZXmYnyyN78cO7_Z2aHVLpBkIuu0olTbSpOuQZcPV9sYQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Booking has free cancelation policy but it will immediately charge with no refund. Hence we decided to stay here & it wasn’t a pleasing experience.||During check in, security deposit was charged twice and they refused to refund us. And upon check out on a Sunday, they still yet to refund us. Being a backpacking holiday we didn’t have so much cash with us and it ruins our holiday and unable to purchase any gifts in Manila.||Upon check out and they decided to impose smoking fine when none of us smoke in the room. The smell was due to  I use a lighter to tear open the shampoo.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eugene Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzYAayAS23lo4dOhJHyZfzFHSxPdFur7tBgU88B2yi_5YVCw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"During booking there’s supposed to be a free cancellation but it was immediately debit hence we are unable to switch to another hotel.

At the check in, security deposit was charged twice and refuse to refund.

At check out, they impose smoking fine on us where we didn’t smoke in the room. I used a lighter to open up the shampoo package as being a tourist I don’t have cutting equipment. And they insist on charging us the smoking penalty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPQOvLmiqMFJxuvvq1aY051n2E_rarCRn93Wtv"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"mfyers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QftlnsLB8VReEIa8q3x-FUIWL9jAVnw9OiPzFml0xLx7k1DporKgZdMXGALflbNzntF3w=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I booked two nights here (as well as an additional 6 nights), and when my plans changed, I requested a cancellation waiver with 10 days' notice. I sent it via the booking app and they choose to start playing bizarre games. They ignored my request and told the agent that they were thinking about my request. This was a lie, they had no intention of replying because they only had one thing on their mind - to scam foreigners. I also put a message up on a FB forum and sure enough learnt they've done this before. While I can understand that if they replied no, then at least I would have an answer. They ignored me then on the day of the reservation sent me countless emails, followed the next day by a week-in-advance message telling me I was all set for next week. I have never NOT had a response from a hotel and to ignore the company that markets your hotel is morally wrong. They are in one of the most popular areas for tourists and as a cheap hotel, they could easily resell this during that period. I would understand if it were 24-72 hours' notice given that is a short time. I choose a refund period booking, and all I asked was for a response. Something felt wrong when they did reply in the first 24 hours, as all other hotels have done so. Do not risk being caught up in whatever elaborate scam they've got going. Book elsewhere and don't get intimidated by their odd behaviour. Because I can assure you when it comes time to pay, they won't hesitate to email you constantly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steve Annable","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXP8pz5Mlx9TVBKqEsnMi4Uzz0kFlTQa2RCd-pu3kgM_anJfWQNfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The room itself and the staff were great. The location is a little bit remote and away from the main road at night time it’s a little dark and it could be scary for first time travellers","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"CASPER mcguire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpMrHJ0wXXSmgrBsuA8pJpNhe1cceDnj3tStdLPmaUBbek8X_4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of staying at La Belle Residences and was blown away by the level of service and attention to detail. From the moment I walked in, I felt like I was in a luxury hotel - the facilities are stunning and the decor is impeccable. The staff were incredibly welcoming and attentive to all of my needs. My room was spacious, clean, and had all of the amenities I could ever need. The location is fantastic, with easy access to shopping, restaurants, and entertainment. Overall, I highly recommend La Belle Residences for a luxurious and comfortable stay in the heart of the city. 5 stars!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ma. Anna Patrisha Baldonado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzXxmjGYpEKiTlJgj4xx3Ns4OdIjvlOOAitGsglAD_K0gHICwj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice rooms for the price. They have mini ref and hot water kettle.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9GsV5ZVat0FIWC7DCE-iK2TlnBoRqnHgSlzUI"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"delfinjr pura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlYZA6jrglJEGiaUzwJZcPtaKj4A0rnZAnxaR3gWE2YQYJqju_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"*clean room

title: Privato Hotel Ortigas
address: 706 Shaw Blvd, Pasig, 1603 Metro Manila
descriptions: Streamlined rooms & suites in a relaxed hotel with a rooftop bar/restaurant & an outdoor pool.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Michelle Lorzano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0utnZKxo2Hna22VGRXeVSBp8K83SVh-KmaB94aASMeZEiMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good for its rate! title: RedDoorz near NAIA Terminal 1
address: 21 Verbena Street, Pasay, 1301 Metro Manila
descriptions: No-nonsense hotel featuring simply furnished rooms with minifridges, wet bars & balconies.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bob Pike","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFTy4Ekb_ptqRx8MTthEeXTz6UsNhajlODkvoyqKLgEZGJQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Room was large for 2. (Google Maps)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gemma B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXVdWujuHwTKE__Kekbnr8CjFRRGKJgfOyYsj7C0fuZrRaT1PgOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is a false advertising. The picture you see is a not even existing.
The place is so gross, dusty, very filthy and the people will try to scam you. The toilet looks like it was never cleaned and there's p***c hair on the floor behind the door.

We will have to wait for 12 hrs layover so we decided to get a room to have a nap and a shower before we go back to the airport.

Be careful if you are a foreigner. They will try scam you. Even the taxi drivers will scam you.
If you stay in this hotel, ask the staff to call the grab/Uber for you. It's way cheaper and the car is more decent and clean

The towels were old and have holes, there is no even soap unless you ask for it. The toilet paper is only a few rolls.

I do not recommend this place. Don't be fooled with the photos on their website.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2k-IQR7fa7GAdThs_WJq-4RKvOWj_7x8o6v4F"],"When":"2024-5-8"},{"Name":"Trip.com Member","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeCck1CfANpZm9bBk3PHtP97Kh9k25HZfvq9yAWlN3BaIyjSHUPEfWkhAJmuYiJsH-_6g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I usually book cheap hotels because I don’t need anything exclusive. Rubbish wasn’t emptied properly. No soap to wash at least my hands. Smelly room/ drains smelled like a dead animal was stuck in there. Staff quite uninterested. Be careful with taxi drivers!
They charged me 2000 Peso (53AUD) for 4.5k‘s from the airport to this place.
Absolute sickening! For local people it’d be around 250.

I usually book cheap hotels because I don’t need anything exclusive. But ! - I would out of all cheap hotels I’ve booked so far in Manila not recommend this one!

Bed sheets had stains .. blood?! Red and brown stains. A lot of hair everywhere. Mould !! Rubbish wasn’t emptied properly. No soap to wash at least my hands. Smelly room/ drains smelled like a dead animal was stuck in there. Staff quite uninterested. Best part was I woke up with bites all over my arms and back, belly and feet ( bed bugs ) Thanks for nothing. Won’t return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcIJ3JAJYPSXxzUnfaijAVyMR02Z08FR6S8-li"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Trip.com Member","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeCck1CfANpZm9bBk3PHtP97Kh9k25HZfvq9yAWlN3BaIyjSHUPEfWkhAJmuYiJsH-_6g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Would I stay here again? Yes. Does the facility need some TLC? Absolutely.It's a 5 minute walk to Terminal 1 of the airport, so if you are flying international, it's a perfect pitstop.It's not a 5 star hotel and they don't need to be or are they trying to be. The bathroom needed some attention. The shower head was filthy. No towels. No little bottles of soap or shampoo. For are case we didn't need it. But are last Reddoorz had those items. The TV turned on but the cable box was either broken or I was to dumb to figure it out. Probably both.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Richard Terrace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEFwDO7dPJ0D1nxwPpzQdFKMG63G464aL6-DR5l7ZOVElivA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ive stayed here four times.  The rooms are basic but have air conditioning, decent washroom, table and fridge.  Some rooms have views some dont.  Some rooms tend to be quieter (upper floor) others are noisy (lower floor).  The location is very close to NAIA 1 (10-15min walk) so great if you want to be close yo the airport.

Overall its hit or miss and there are much better places with more attentive staff.  However the location is convenient, the rooms are clean and comfortable enough.  Certainly not fancy though","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ara Macaraeg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlfA-Mjx99_32ATowDp3WA_1Q7ZMxTT-kBq2lD2YDfjs4ck7IZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY HERE!!!

The place is scary, the room is filthy, the service staff is not accommodating. The facilities is just worst. We encounter cockroaches too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vũ Huy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKnXnDsla6stkotA-NdJwfHAigPancRwMyK8URzjCDpGJAqYNcQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The location show on Google Map in front of terminal 1 is totally wrong. Maybe they intentionally fake the location to attract customers. It's an old house and the price is not worth it. Very old, smelly and dirty items. Air conditioner cannot adjust temperature. I think it's about 1 star hotel. Anyway the boy at the hotel was quite enthusiastic and helpful. title: Flair Towers

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Joann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTcNxKI75PTzuRSRcib_uhxlRanaS9nvGFOgSazglzHr754Uo6wg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The security guards and the tower location are just the asset of my experience but the host and its unit is the worst of all the bookings I have had abroad and locally. Additionally the rooms were pretty big with great living area, but the vetilation was horrid. Will I go back here? I would, only for its inexpensive price point.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Edward Ong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOXT8mlhHW_uzb4Ny-WxEo3yOXZzPmxaLrazB7qC1pESMNGg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"For those interested in buying or renting a residence at Flair Tower, please note that the elevators here are the most unique in all of Manila. What’s more interesting is that the elevator seems to stop on every floor, as if invisible ghost tenants are operating it, which is truly a special phenomenon. Therefore, if you believe you have plenty of time and don’t mind starting your day at 8 AM, waiting for the elevator at 9 AM to be at work by 10 AM, then Flair Tower is always ready to welcome you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"richard allen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILOm7RfFVQuetKcyJFlS4XtAWrSFiUk8XsZNrpH9BW6M7Z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"No desk person,a resident comes in underwear bring a key and roach spray..kills 6 roaches gives key charge deposit $300 peso has no change so takes$1000. I say Don't Go.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rob C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHG8Mio5PK0waDfpzBr96UxSrchnDMZBQ7V2sAelNCAk_Cn28=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Scammers stay clear. title: The Mini Suites Eton Tower Makati
address: 128 Dela Rosa Street, Legazpi Village, Makati, Metro Manila
descriptions: Laid-back hotel offering simple rooms & suites, plus complimentary parking & a gym.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Vedran Panic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwAzMC2LoSsZwN_9NeS0mgXu3Z9ei_oNSCVttkjC3z83xrSv8R=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rooms are good. Everything you need, shower and bed.

Great location, walking distance to Greenbelt. Easy access to highway by car.

Inside the hotel there is a small supermarket, coffee shop and some other shops that we didnt check.

Be careful if you are coming here by car. Inside the garage there is very low clearance, you may scrape your roof.

We will be coming here again because its a great value for money.

title: RedDoorz Plus @ Canley Residential
address: 331 Robinson's Cir, Pasig, 1600 Metro Manila
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"William T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVosCd9boqt69cC66oLr5r0FDzZ99FZT2GJbhcl_J3BH3zqPLAP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Perhaps the worst place I have ever stayed at the price I paid for. 3 roaches in just one night, no hot water, no TV (but a remote controller!) as advertised. The floors had dirt and debris and there were parts like door handles, toilet seat cover, and a random crutch in the corner. This place looked like a ransacked hotel.

At least the sheets and towels were clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-9vl8QI_2_In-Amr79XfzGqdj4Zk7oOGvH9hx"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"John Ivan Hurboda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-sWfnVBsyKyBbU6G7F_rD2L9nikkTHenDM2lU-f4ABXFyi_I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Based on my experience, I don't really recommend this place, especially when booking more than 24 hours stay. I had a really bad experience with this place.

The place is not sanitized, dusty, and the customer service is barely friendly. What scares us more is that there is no security, no convenient parking, no food service. The price itself? It is pricey based on the hotel quality.

It is not also safe, I can't take away the feeling of subtleness, we feel that we are being watched, and the place has a negative energy, I can't seem to shake what's the exact feeling we're having and we can't sleep.

We can't even stay about 3 hours with our 48 hour booking, jeez... No refund as well so better think twice before going to this place.

This is a true experience, no biased review, it's legit. If you want to book, Sogo would be better.

If you have family, I highly recommend not to book in this place, I feel I've been scammed, and don't fall by others review it's legitimately not a good idea to book in this place really.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ruth Alexandria Anne Luto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVb2BMbtNK3qkUN3rQcHfgLvtbYkvjRKW0WAX2cjGZox-ku8FA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you are someone born in the slums, I don’t think you’re gonna have a problem with this place. But if you have been living comfortably in a clean and healthy environment, I don’t suggest booking here. We booked for 3 days and 2 nights and we regret everything. The room smells. The floor is dusty. The comfort room will give you nausea no comfort at all. The airconditioner is moldy so it smells so bad. The bed is awfully used as well as the pillows. Everything in this unit smells. It’s so sad that RedDorz mission and vision is not even applied a little. Perks will be a fast internet connection and the customer service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"matt u.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtpFqzUuk3ROVXC_EplonXOd8J1XnIPt8SMR4bTWXoRYZBLuU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A LITERAL HORROR MOVIE EXPERIENCE

We booked for 3 days and 2 nights. Before checking in, they already had a problem with the reservation. I got emails that my slot got canceled literally hours before check-in. Good thing customer service was kind enough to confirm that it's just the system malfunctioning. Other customers also experience the same.

On the day of the check-in, my mom and younger sister were let in only by saying my name. No IDs. No confirmation from my end. Which is a big red flag! They might be letting in strangers!! I arrived a little late that day. Upon arriving, the place looks like a normal house in a residential subdivision. Entrance was barely lit. The hallways are reminiscent of dark alleys in horror movies; you wouldn't dare to walk alone. Upon entering the room, it's got a unique smell. There are two single beds as booked but only one has a mattress. The pillows are also stained. But what caught our attention is what seems like another sketchy door in the room with an empty bed in front of it. The bathroom also has a scary hole in the ceiling, atop the toilet bowl itself. What made us decide to leave that night was when we heard screeching noises and scratches. Also, the weird vacant room was really unsettling. We're tired but we went home instead. We don't wanna stress ourselves anymore!

As we leave the premises, people at front desk just took our keys. No questions. Didn't even check our room and just let us go. Totally a horrible experience. Can't forget the unlit hallways leading to the elevator. We're scared for life we thought we'd never get out of there alive. Would never book in any RedDoorz ever!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chona S Chuy Darm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVPuYXEYAIOSigTwQBSDJmAWAga9ZJmZB26kegGh-rBiglgJlK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not a very comfy room. Vet big space no proper ventilation. Smells like public c.r and I don't know where the smell coming from. All the smell from the kitchen, hallway (like smoke), and c.r packed in 1 room. Being in the room is suffocating and haunting.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christian Rico Mangaoil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVE04vM-_E4JdKs2iPpuR2dFHvUKtWoJv_K4UYQu1l4qKphisyTfg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The unit is unfinished many cabinets is not yet finished. And toilet dosent have flush.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Redeyed Jack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHqEaQpAS2qRrATnA4PkqUK6Caaf27MsbZBRIa2NxzQFFNEhc9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It is quite accomadating and the place is kinda decent and AC is good. No telephone. You need your smartphone to ask room service. It has free Wi-Fi. For the bathroom.  I do advice you check especially the water bucket it is kinda moldy. The place is somewhat inside the subdivision. So no stores here u need food delivery.  The price is good for 1 whole night.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Myraflor Valdez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9m4fJdnRMyfrzJdwKeNBceWMLRtU58zzL-S5iDooMFGoG43qn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When I arrived in the hotel from my trip they gave me a smaller room which wasn't what I booked,then there was no cups,nor spoon nor any utensil to use,they only trsnsferred me when I ask them,then the 2nd room they gave aircon was so noisy at night,always wake at midnight,then I turned positive with my test,manager told me just to book for the rest of my stay at least 9 days which I did since BOQ wasn't available,then BOQ came to fetch me,the girl on the front desk told me to go eventhough I told her I was already booked for 8 days but she was furious instead and told me I wasn't following the rule?Hello,they were the one(their manager) was the one who convinced me,then there I realize they are just after the money...I rate this hotel poor because of the staff's manner and also some of their ammenities,they aren't like the RedDoorz I usually book before in Makati area,they have a poor customer service!!!","Images":null,"When":""}]
