There is a divider for the shower and toilet area but no shower curtain and/or door, so my slippers are understandably wet after showering. I also noted ants crawling along the walls when i first arrived in the room. Some of them were even on the bed.

The staff are friendly and accommodating. But i do have a complaint on whoever is in charge of the luggage storage area.

We arrived early, around 9 am, so we decided to have our bag(Acer bag) and luggage stored while went out. Around 2-3pm when i got my bag back i noticed the  logo almost removed and slightly damaged. Someone tried to take it! I always take good care of my items and this is the second time i used my bag for trips.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF9Ie-ltJJtAL4Cc5se97N4wN3nHH4lMUwg1zg"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Chriz Dosel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtjdlABsLQHtVEtGr7f8acp8JC_JFNKmXbmSfEnP52vhedNlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently stayed at your hotel and found it comfortable and clean with friendly staff. However, I have a few suggestions for improvement.

It would be very convenient to have hygiene kits readily available in the room. Also, the air conditioning in my room didn’t cool effectively, impacting my comfort. Lastly, easier access to TV controls or clearer instructions would enhance the entertainment experience.

Thank you for considering this feedback. I look forward to seeing these improvements on my next visit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Annie Bunchie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILGleavCopogouLiLTilwMaiEOBAP-1BvOtvwqieV908bItA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you have an interview in the US Embassy be sure to get a room here in Red Planet Manila Bay. They're like literally a lucky hotel! Also, the place is neat and tidy. Staffs are accommodating as well!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Athena Alexi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUkI2O5L4p2pAoACh97ET_s1QSnpvEMGS2tJTlz4CM9KMxlg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Rooms and service are great. Friendly staff. Just really bad location. I wanted to walk to Starbucks to get coffee but couldn't because it was flooded. The only area that was flood was the front and sides of the hotel and it wasn't even raining anymore. Bad location if its rainy. Cars can pass, just need to book a taxi to 7/11 or starbucks which is like two minutes away.

Elevator is unavailable if the wind is strong so you have to walk in the fire exit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-5iuSPeEKXjV2_amm_gfASzeDZWOjrlH_RDHD"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Edward Magsino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWr4Un1k0HkTkRSwGHxe0OFj3ZxxfYoy36SDXkENaIhW0DgD_FY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stayed here for 2 nights during the JIL Church 46th Anniversary.

Location: 15 to 20 mins walk to Rizal Park. I have read that it easily gets flooded at the front. I think it has already improved since it rained during our stay and it did not become a problem to us.

Experience: the staff are very accommodating - from the guards, to the reception, to the staff.

Rooms: the room assigned to us is clean and comfortable.

Parking: first come first serve basis for their limited free parking. Otherwise, you will have to go with the pay parking along Roxas service road.

Issues: we can hear the noise outside our room and we can also hear other guest's rooms when passing by.

Overall: we really enjoyed our stay with minimal to no issues at all. Their facilities are modern and the staff are very helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfbG8sHuqDEZcj5rA435oreN_WISkjGRvb9tAy"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Johnny Johnny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX43N5bBBx7Pw94ojZIUxGpf930xWCPQPKnzV6RMZZAPbRmOb1dUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Arrived Red Planet Manila Bay on a midnight heavy rainy day and it was flooded on the street level.

It was nice of the staff to bring over an unbrella and shelter me while I jump off from the car seat to the sidewalk.

Check in was smooth, but late check out till 1pm was granted only upon request.

Previously when I book through a booking app, I got late checkout of 2pm without requesting. So I was rather disappointed since I booked through the hotel app directly this time.

Room size and condition was decent but window blinds is a little damaged.

Location is walkable to many food options, nightspots and attractions 👍🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzNuSrrAfszdC_n9S1R2zn8-Alzvzq-1oDdADs"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Inspire66528396088","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfsnvlNO8mgROWsxiGYBmc-FMApm47le01WrNgEyYNYqUPw1j7nx-COV-HLlhXF8VUXQQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Would recommend this hotel especially if you have an appointment in US Embassy, its like 10 minutes walk from the hotel. We had a great time and their room rates is quite reasonable. Thanks to Princess at the Front desk who patiently assisted us from booking our rooms online and to our needs throughout our stay. I love their room, very basic and clean. We will book the room with Bayview next time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jazzver King Capati","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVa2qHxX4fvyW253eqFZYst33-5zKp-etRcImRVtBYCjgl5hIcp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We booked here for our Visa Interview, and our visa is approved. Indeed, it is a lucky hotel for visa interviews. The hotel is clean and comfy. Staff are super friendly and approachable. Walking distance to the US embassy. I forgot my shoes in the room and they helped me retrieve it. Thanks to the staff of Red Planet Manila Bay!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Time Travellers Hotel
address: 1184 A A. Mabini St, Ermita, Manila, 1000 Metro Manila
descriptions: Simple rooms in a straightforward hotel offering a restaurant & a spa with massage services.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Roselito III Angot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHcO_1QwWLcXzvPcXp6_2CKBbaxfTBKOHh8UqwMd-bBQzi3IXn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Location is great. Found in the heart of Malate and walking distance to Luneta Park and Robinsons Manila. You can request change sheets anytime (I do this around 9pm when I arrive). Overall pleasant experience.

The room is spacious and contains the basic necessities. The shower water pressure is a bit low. Would definitely comeback.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSzPnUinEPpp3tAbcrbHkyw2ViTIC3ZaAh1VzK"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Palthyavath Anil Chavan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUimDHEAS8zB8lYwaMV-4JUUW7LjN8CRa9brFi0LvuVwm80k_lh3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Water heater of the CR was not working and when asked they didn't do anything about it telling that it is holiday here in the Philippines so we don't have staff today. Employees at the reception desk were rude and were asking extra money than the decided rate and they were literally shouting at us.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mara Sophia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUob-Ot0QYfrKlpJ5RnzFGc7lRor8WDsO83ADfJeiakWHg2rnk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I stayed here cause it’s closer to my intended business for the week, chose their eco double room. At first i expected that i will just have a small ugly room because of how cheap it is, i was surprised at how big the room is and it has a small kitchenette and a dining table, it exceeded my expectation for its price, staffs were accommodating, only cons are rooms are not sound proof so u can hear loud motorcycles and beeping from outside, tiny tv but has cable, and room lights are too dim, but overall, i had a nice stay, plus 7 eleven is just below, which made it convenient for me. If i need to go back in the area i would surely stay here again. ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEBjOIYBctJescZoLH9yq0XyJVcOlwJl519kDR"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Mitchell Winter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ52f9beRzWg5vo095lEoiVxxbEraOMPogmAs_FGj_mBTsgzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great little place to stay. Very handy for the sports bar where I go to watch the football and across the road there's Cowboy grill. A nice place to eat and watch a show with free entrance.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Seeley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDr-7eWaQvsaJPNE2_nf47s7ghju6IdRjzJgKDBKID7Us-6Kvz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Been to Manila many times but this hotel is by far the absolute worst. cockaroaches all over the room dirt room had to rent water heater mini fridge did not work. They also made me rent an extra pillow for a double bed sheets smelled wifi was horrible. they also would not refund me my money and I left hotel. worst service ever go to the red planet amazing hotel. I give this hotel a Zero!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ruby Desu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNjj8nn0ftRvOTe70Cv33bzNNAm35lom-DLGND93tn8hAXG471=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The room was spacious, with a ref, water heater and heated showers. We got a good deal thanks to agoda, around 5k for 4N5D.

Location was excellent, 1 jeepney ride going to Binondo, Quiapo and Divisoria. Walk a block away and there's a jeep going to Baclaran and from Baclaran, you can ride a jeep going to SM MoA. You can walk to Robinsons or in Dolomite, also a walking distance from SLEC and the US Embassy. There's a bar right below the hotel, so some rooms might hear loud music, good thing our room had the quiet side.

The cons, they don't clean rooms. We stayed a bit longer so we wanted them to tidy our room a bit and take the trash since it was piling, but they would just agree to clean but not really do it. The staff were approachable though.
Wifi was close to nonexistent. They give you vouchers to use 500mb of data, they give a lot of these and you can ask for more. I tried using it but it was such a hassle so I just use my own mobile data.

It's a budget friendly hotel, might book again if I needed a quick visit around the vicinity.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMU1u8qXhdZHlUipM817Z5zcTbOUgd9qSNtWEJI"],"When":"2024-3-3"},{"Name":"Haydie Alvarez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzXiD5AHW9_Im2KgHA8wBYOvR2N7fDdfsy-ukkfUKWHd3qvsQm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The room is good and also the bathroom,a friendly budget prices.and the staff is nice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXJ13_yhrKG2tDoRkgJVozMCqnk6fR6vNFQDD2"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Ime Lara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7kqMqSrmMRy4NfvhAwYqLjDnaMg77rr8EsJuL1hB7u_qv915G=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"What I can say is that it's decent and affordable. Dont expect too much. If you're looking for a budget hotel, time travellers hotel is the best option. I paid 2,720 for 3 days and 2 nights of stay. The room is spacious. Faucets, Mini fridge, Water heater, television, aircon are all functional. The staff are friendly. The only problem was that they're not very responsive in the agoda app and no mobile number I can contact.  I tried to ask twice if they accept card, unfortunately they didnt respond. Luckily, I still have cash and the receptionist allowed me to pay (refundable upon check out) 1,000 pesos for the security deposit at a later time. There's a 7/11 just beside the hotel and there's an atm machine inside.

I saw two cockroaches, i did not bother to take a picture. And also I think it's best to include in the agoda app about their policy about the security deposit. It's my first time to check in solo, i didnt know security deposit is a common practice in the hotel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBuqEIkVaEvLTKBNs5qWVUvAsRhr0Ke1M9qYN3"],"When":"2023-10-17"}]

title: Bay Prime Hotel
address: GXHV+45P Bay Prime Hotel, Roxas Blvd, Parañaque, Metro Manila
descriptions: Modern hotel offering an outdoor pool & breakfast, plus a chic restaurant with a global menu.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"GN M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9IWs_JlH0biExoXu42Bp30o7I9fbU5A49TzlK1ZIxlgOOfy6k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The moment you reach the hotel you're greeted by the bellman and security. The lobby stench was so foul that it always leaves a disgust on my face, it's the same when you step out of the lift lobby. Majority of simple requests were not met. It's appalling how you request for sets of cutleries and the staff has no clue what a cutlery is. The ceiling in front of my room was leaking, leaving a puddle on my front door. No service recovery offered or whatsoever. The front desk trainees are left alone not knowing what to do. Do not bother asking them for simple information within their vicinity- they also have no clue what's surrounding them. Staff has no sense of urgency at all. The pool and gym facilities are so badly lit and or not lit at all. They do not prioritize your safety around the property. The manager is nowhere to be found when you ask for one. There is obviously no communication amongst them or they're simply not updating their alerts or comments in their system. Good budget hotel if you're looking to stay a night but not any longer. I will never come back again. I'm pretty sure there are better hotels out there with the same price range and friendlier staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Esther Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpUlVanNqPteRA9epXi-ALwS4Ck3Y29kJSWGx4hjYrYzjOUBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Receptionists do not know how to be polite and to be behave. They don’t even deserve to be one. When you ask questions, they act like they did not hear or see anything, whispering to each other even if you’re a foreigner who understands Tagalog. Please improve and train your staff. The hotel is so close to the airport , which you may accept a lot of international guests. Other than the interior, it does not deserve 4 Star at all. Totally over ranked.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joven Rubilla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsSuFaPaIcDmna9sFs3r-lgPVsA8LrjOnhgxqRyJzceHS36oUV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bayprime Hotel is a solid choice for travelers seeking a comfortable and convenient stay in Manila. It's particularly well-suited for those looking to explore the nearby attractions and enjoy the amenities the hotel offers. They also offer sumptuous Chinese style foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtYkPa06dgStW3X_8FSP0qaJ-q02c5ZuapUsBa"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"E P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QcHdm0oAuHtzPwzcwUtTqUfPbZXmYnyyN78cO7_Z2aHVLpBkIuu0olTbSpOuQZcPV9sYQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Overall good value for money friendly staff, comfortable rooms. Good breakfast for cost of the motel. They were a bit tight with giving us water family of x4 2 adults x2 teenagers they would sometimes only give x2 bottles and we would have to pay for extra 2 !! Same with toilet paper only providing 1 roll at a time.|Great pool, gym didn’t have a lot of equipment but was okay.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Caleb Glover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmomAFMB_Te_D_pGSe3drQ11ZyAVFGZ1jvEQd9m7w1c-7TMA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The rooms are great. We have no complaints with those.

The food, is quite possibly the WORST restaurant I've ever been to in my life. Lemonade tasted like it had alcohol in it. A total of 3 sips were drank and they refused to remove them from the check. Chicken was horribly overcooked and barely edible. Fried rice was mostly green onion and gross. McDonalds makes better and more edible food than this place. Avoid it like the plague and go quite literally anywhere else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6p14ArZ1gnz75b_4rUNYN_Lg4FBve3iq4G-BWdSVhCYwc27pe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing and extremely affordable compared to American hotels.

This hotel is beautiful from top to bottom and the service from the moment you walk though the door blows away hotels I've paid 2 or 3x more for in the states. They greet you at the door with a smile, help you with your bags, the elevator and halls are clean and beautiful, the rooms are emaculate and high-tech with modern TVs, lights and international power outlets.

A lovely pool and gym, a CLEAN 24 hour convenience store is right outside the front door and the inhouse cafe is beautiful, clean, and the food is good.

Not only is this better than many USA hotels for the price but even better than the few other local hotels I stayed in and only a few pesos more.

If you are looking for a 1st class experience or wanting to feel like you've been transported to another word right here in the Philippines I strongly recommend the Bay Prime Hotel.

10/10 Value
8/10 Location
9.5/10 Cleanliness
9.5/10 Amenities (no microwave)
10/10 Service","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shasha Apolinario K.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoQsy75pOyQVu_GAkcKYsX8NSaU5E06_Pt05Fp0DzAmov4Zznf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In the future this hotel is very nice and recommended except for the very strong smell in our room it’s because it’s new but they should put air fresheners to go the very strong smell of the room over all the staff friendly especially the guards and bellman it’s just dessapointing that they only accept credit cards they have 3 security deposit so prepare your cash or credit card that’s the only thing they accept and if you have kids with you like 3 years old up better bring their pass with you because front disks will ask for it. I don’t know why but that’s it the pool is nice good food","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOf6ghqk_j_S3tRkL_sh0l94MQvT0ViBrsVTdcG"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Inemeng Kinantot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPpHbG8EdFHlDMWWWDgTIhyY3gZVZ3smGp58mJToumiZZ6xw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"WORST!!!!! THE RECEPTION IS VERY EMBARRASSING!!!!!!!!! Very strict on visitors unlike other hotel. We were charged immediately 20dollars per pax for our 2 visitors even just a few minutes after 10pm. Even though we said that we are on our process of the wedding for tomorrow. The receptionist made us feel we were trespassing even though we were guests. They always saying because it is the rule of the management. Even extra bottled water is 2 dollars per small bottle of water. Some hotels you can get it for free. Buffet breakfast is very common and fewer options. Better get Jollibee! For the price and location, better check other hotels. Very few ammenities! They have better services than here.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: G SQUARE RESIDENCES
address: G Square Residences, Julio Nakpil st, cor Taft Ave, Malate, Manila, 1004
complete_address: {"borough":"Malate","street":"G Square Residences, Julio Nakpil st, cor Taft Ave","city":"Manila","postal_code":"1004","state":"Metro Manila","country":"PH"}
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"POPBOX PH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGX2yPt9gTZSjExKcveRHyXGTA-VafULLhf5yGe1iQoW9YfA8d=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The room was decent, equipped with a separate shower and toilet, a sink, heater, and 2 bunk beds. However, we encountered some issues - the TV was nit working due to a missing remote, and the elevator seemed to require maintenance. Additionally, the reception was quite busy, leading to longer wait times. Furthermore, the scent used in the lobby was overpowering and not pleasant. Overall, our stay was satisfactory, but there were some aspects that could be improved for a better experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"NG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4OjyDouDcl-gAiuBbxn2rveokVMHq-ckt1QoN-LuFyc45LtzC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stayed there for 5 days and 4 nights. We also had a small private little drawer attached to the bed with another outlet and a small light for one's personal use. The room is good for students since it is a dormitory type place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gideon Brent Corpuz Juane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt3aTDqEvUslcd3hgOBuO07tQiF0BV0t0ZGdBbar-2ZuZEeJ9T=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an incredible 24-hour stay at this hotel. The attention to detail and high level of service truly made a difference, and I would highly recommend this hotel for anyone looking for a top-quality experience, even if just for a day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSkAdTYf_vRcMK5eivDU0l3yfZI5Jy9j7AW8_x"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Lord Dresdan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICKZnWwXW3j7mzzQJOGxf_q_g8aeLPfYqOFSFaiKtyMlzFRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Good spacious rooms that are affordable, unfortunately there some glaring defects on each room that i tried to book and it seems they still havent resolved the roach infestation on each room.

It seems whatever room i booked i can always see those little critters hiding under the crevices of cabinets and they especially come out in numbers during the night. Maybe they should thoroughly do a quality control on their rooms or it would greatly hurt their image.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Augusto Kalingking","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoF6zyzPzTsVBnX-RqWBGwj_FxmFSb1SLprqVZEnpoy4XOsUN2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Reception staff is very helpful but limited in actions due to overload of tasks in the reception. Perhaps of being alone to attend to the guests. No Manager is available to speak to respond to customer's complaints. I have to come back personally Two times at GSquare to follow up my lost & found item. Mr. Wilbert help me out to investigate who disposed my lost item. How much more if you left behind your valuables. Integrity is completely missing in this property. Contractual housekeeping attendant requires a refresher training on how to handle Lost & Found items of the residence. They promised me a compensation but as of to date nothing has been received. Other bad stay experience; No hot water in the shower room, no complimentary water upon check-in and OMG overcrowded in the reception due to group departure.
Date of stay: 03 - 04 Aug24
Room 6P","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cristina Temena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI99CFXl71t2rJuI-UIZYpxu5P_oyacgRPGZ-Evc4SBfRAYMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stayed at 1 room 4 beds. Room is nice. I can say its a good price and budget friendly compare to other accomodations arround the area.
Good location, very accessible to public transportations. But expect noise can be heard from train and vehicles.
Toilet is ok. Room it self looks clean at first but i accidentallly look under the bed and it seems not swept for long time. (You can ask for cleaner anyway). There is small cockroach visiting from time to time.
Staffs are friendly. There is boiler, cups and bottled water which is very good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ask Aiza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP-oeSY4DA72jRi4H_1D7oe0jwX2XrSQ4MPbpit2NWyN52dB0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is a very reasonably priced nice clean room in an OK area.
Just so long as you don't mind staying in a deathtrap.
As a multiday tour manager I am in the habit of actually checking fire escape routes are safe. I check the routes are uncluttered, unlittered, properly lit free from slippery slicks etc.
Both fire escapes failed in every single way possible. Garbage or trash trundlers dumped out-of sight out of mind just behind almost every fire escape exit  on every floor. Some floors not properly lit. At least one floor had a large liquid spill likely to result in people slipping in an emergency situation.
While staff were initially very unresponsive, they were moved by the video walkthrough I showed them.
So either it is still a deathtrap or with any luck they have improved and if so, you're welcome.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Felicidad Ngayawon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJS99KhpPWtnqmVbR9xF1Sg0cxP6RJ5dd7HJEtIpV_wMx0rZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Bunk Bed room. 8F
Advantage:
1. Very accessible to vehicles
2. Affordable/Cheaper than other condo/hotel
3. Rooms good for 4 persons. Time-in the same to time out.
4. 7-11 beside the Loby entrace area
5. Many cabinets and outlet
6. 4 drinking bottles and have kettle for hot water

My experience;
5. So noisy when ever trains and car are passing by
6. When i enter the room, lots of hair are in the corner near the door(seems not finish cleaning)
7. Floors are wet (so slippery) need to be careful when walking (seems floors have moist)
8. TV not working.(no remote)  i inform twice the frontdesk at the lobby but she always said she already inform the maintenance but till then  i check out no body came to check or assist.
9. No telephone used to connect the lobby
10. Poor wifi connection
11. Hot water on the shower is not much functioning, just room temparature. No free bath soap and shampoo
12. Frontdesk are not approachable/friendly and seems unwillingly to grant simple guest request about the problem of the room. (Not well assisted) they give the room without checking the room status
13. Over all..i was disappointed and just spent 1 night which i supposed to recommend to my friend because it's affordable and accesible but i change my mind base on my experience","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Cayco House by Hotel Durban
address: 6249 Cayco, Makati, Metro Manila
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sharon Mahlangu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuYVv7LDnj_N0M_CXZDD5DDeLraW_xAX8zO-Iamr5B198mJH30yg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best hotel in Manila, it is new, smells fresh, clean building and rooms, modern, clean bedding and comfortable bed and pillows. Highly recommend it. Good value for the money. Helpful and friendly staff, they go an extra mile. I feel safe. I've enjoyed it so much that I keep extending. Big rooms with windows. Good wifi. Very quiet. Big reception area with a table pool.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzG0OtUN9x53wPOTHg5z9iYfXArTzalZI6Vcze"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Sheanna H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTWT3N_wasDJZXST9khzx1dWLjZ_yLoTncJQkrlkWVOKE5NVCV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lobby is truly unique, masculine like a bachelor’s pad.

Room was clean and neat. Super basic though, needs hand towel, sink soap, hair dryer. Suggesting a drawer for people staying longer.

Location was superb! In the heart of Poblacion, Makati known for popular pubs and restaurants.

Service was excellent. Front desk never ceased to give a warm welcome and full assistance.

Thank you, Cayco! Had a good stay in your place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBLwhU47tmahYFXK2chE4CZKcZR-7p5560Pq2L"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Fabricio B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOCicTZRzXM12247eUjL2DAp0oJ4tx7iUhQ_9zxE2Sl9Pr1NU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had a 20 hour layover in Manila. While we were looking at where to go, P. Burgos street popped up as an option. Interestingly enough, it was safer during the night there than most of the rest of Manila we walked through the next day.

Anyway, we checked in at around 4am. Front desk Niños was very helpful, welcoming, and had a great attitude. Check out time is 1200 noon, so good time to get a late nap.

The price was about 1500 pesos so not bad. You can get it for less than 1000 pesos if you book online.

There is a particular rooster (pictured), which drove us crazy from 4am until 1200 noon when we left. We found him down the street and it was the same tone and tempo we heard throughout the night. I would have turned him into soup if I could.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSrJ5Pm-fUMemGD3crcXNu_X4sSVHJUaWh2qtO"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Doane Visitacion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDrUaXeUQ-LyQYptK02wK2Q2YhZhta5MbpSbKF7wIdULT0NhB3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Property is lovely and for the introduction price it’s quite a good deal. But you get what you pay for.
Just be warned that internet is horrible. It warrants an expletive and their IT person needs to branded as a fraud.
Update: any negative review on this property will get you banned. So be forewarned.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpwOLHw84rBhcGRzvGgPnZvjo7xZ5iqHM7GkHL"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Emmanuel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2-OGUtVh3uU-jdEn3zTNAtTfSp_tG0qq5iULgfYKaBoUx70g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been there, great place and a big building. Nice staff and clean rooms. Would recommend it and would really try to check-in again, soon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jean-Michel Gratton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDEW9jrPg6tQ8wvQlm8N4x7ItbusQEuVtGHG6qvQp_88OpeA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Brand new property! Super nice place with very friendly staff. The room was super clean and comfortable. I highly recommend! The location is great, near a lot of good restaurants. (Early Feb. 2024)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A - Catherine Sinsuat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDlvGQMrCAE9FXWbcH-nO9M4ALRZAkfKjEm-xH1333kiVmsH8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What I like about Cayco is the unique and full of art but minimalist style of the hotel. title: Stone House Hotel Pasay
address: Stone House, 2231 Aurora Blvd, Pasay, 1300 Metro Manila
descriptions: Straightforward hotel with humble rooms & mixed or female-only dorms, some with shared bathrooms.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Servatius Antonius","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVc__4FYnjuAiqkrb7tUo3nGl-wjwnrbmo6VQbyv7LCXSJg9-IP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The rooms were nice, shared bathrooms we're always squeaky clean and my stay was very good here.

The staff was what really made my stay. I got a nasty foot infection in which all the staff and the owner of the hotel got concerned with and tried everything to help me.

People in particular was Liza the secretary,  Primo (which I think was his name) in particular helped me in the stressful time. The security guard called Fernado told me where to go regarding my infection and even sorted out transport to the locations I had to go to! He kept me company and made sure everything was okay with me. He got someone to get me supplies from the pharmacy the following day as I couldn't walk far anymore.  Now I can travel back to Europe safely with clean medical supplies and I can't thank him enough!

Yes my stay was amazing but it was the staff that really made my stay at the hotel! Will definitely return!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Faisal Bousaidi (Fais)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLf87JpLgFp9yLiy46pUPOdJN65B-JHFHOwkcpdgOaHBczL39Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Be Alert all foreign tourists:

As a Canadian tourist I could say it is a budget hostel n I have no other complain but....

They don't allow any visitors here..if anybody come to see you...the security guard n receptionist lady give them too much trouble, ask them creepy questions...until they get bothered n go back...

They never give you a contact of their manager or boss whoever....I have already complain to philippine tourism department.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"chona rayco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWiFR44b42tzEq5eKaIZvbtblQqVZkby8yDCk0_S42SmwjHkD7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoy our stay. Free WiFi Available. With a Restaurant downstairs.

Would love to give a big shout to
Mr. Ding Fernando Ablao, who was our Room Attendant who gave us excellent service 5stars.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rey mark Sacedon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWR2kwjVahmHCgaNIusYNxXIEdua66yW9Jm575gAWbfsD_gBhXn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My experience was just okay.

I booked thru an app 2 single bed and they gave me 1 double bed and I asked for another blanket since they only provide 1 and when I ask the staff they said they cannot give me extra one because they only provide when you book 2 single bed. The whole experience was just okay because we had to check out early for our flight.

The check out is just like normal check out process

Plus you can order food outside","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoH5V-lLdKpbkGQX9KK-Zd4YKWSR4nG4KUFGyjic8raMWZel6F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The room was super small though the toilet was clean and nice. The location was also great, closed to the airport, public transport etc. Good choice if you dont have much time in Manila","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jeryl guineo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfzABFYZpR5CpER9jNupeKvUpn77cpip7q1t_2tNsLs18OGBM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"+ I would like to commend Kuya/uncle Security guard for being nice & helpful. 🙌
+ The hotel is convenient & is near the airport and bus terminals.
- The room is cramped & small cockroaches linger in the room & in the bathroom.
- The food at the restaurant is overpriced!

Note: There is a 500 pesos deposit upon checking in. Keep the receipt & DO NOT FORGET to remind the staff to get it back when you check out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxK3Qo361baTw3s9wTcJaVZVUqphl4kIPQLGPP"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Valred Olsim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzcj64gjGsmu68AMxoEovHJGaNmrGHxv7Lxph9fIysl2qDn_SZkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Rooms look bigger in pictures. Although they have very clean common toilets. Ideal when you want to spend a night before flight as it is 15 minute taxi to Airport Terminals.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi26s4mrQcZR0DOaOeGyElXdB8dIkyBwEyTYsw"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Vanessa Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpJ3li7ObsRBUTufSsuFxFQe_ajOmjm4iJl2zsSHHDsDaluA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The 2 star rating is based on the food we had

- The chicken and pork rice dish didn’t have any pork

- The omlette was decent but I was told there was no meat in it but it came with ham, not the staffs fault as I don’t speak the local language so I understand if there was a mix-up

- The french fries were anaemic and the portion was small

- Overall, quite pricey for the quality of food, if you walk down further, down the alley way to the left of this place there are many local eateries that are better and more reasonably priced","Images":null,"When":""}]

If you are looking for a simple place to stay, come visit this place!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kolleen Galeza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmrcEMyCyQP6vQlDrV67iaFYfuzjpMkUmDumR2ef16BHh4-H9JvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The building overall is nice. 5 stars for the security service. The room where we stayed in is great but the room service needs improvement. They provided free soap, shampoo, and bath towels plus the free use of the refrigerator yet they do not have mats once you enter the room nor on the front door of the washroom that's why you will use the toilet tissue paper to dry off your shoes when it's soaking wet especially when it's raining outside and when you have to go out wet from the washroom. ❤️Free hot water for your coffee/noodles, too! You just have to go down and ask the receptionist for it. How I wish they could provide a water heater inside the room next time without additional fees so that we could enjoy the stay more.\n\nThe location of the condormitory is a bit off because the most accessible gate to get in and out of the area is being closed from 6PM to 6AM. So, you have to ask for the alternative route.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHrypGQm_itzaMaZVaxx8EK_-Qv_NJPIRDWTre"],"When":"2022-7-26"},{"Name":"J M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2hLwd2SwuzEeI256WKslKX-pYoKjb5yQoT8gr7JNalrcRrQmDKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Booked a studio unit thru Agoda. Stayed at 505 for a quick rest and to work a bit. The common areas, the room, and the bathroom are all clean. AC works fine and is not too noisy. The study/work desk could be larger and WiFi is a bit weak. The security guard was helpful in parking and in confirming my booking. Will come back here when I'm in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMX9Q0riMc0DaM52eQHB0tE81tsrA3iwRs2pQ21"],"When":"2022-9-17"},{"Name":"Emma Araceli Dario","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVotae_gt4rPt70xhGJBajOBQyhUtUqVPR3CtVIn4S2bz8zEwVW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice place ,safe area since it is inside the Malacanang compound. You can walk at night safely.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carolina Lim-Gamban","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKjgiYZUluhMWaEwfzmWs3s44twBKnc4t6UEaq-CuFgwfPHrI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Value for money. It’s a good place to rest since the surroundings are quiet and near Malacañang. Though there is no TV, it is alright. There’s free parking outside but if you want a safer place to park, you can park inside, ground floor, for a fee. The staff are also friendly.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Red Planet Manila Aseana City
address: Lot 38, Red Planet Manila Aseana City, Block 2 Bradco Ave, Aseana City, Parañaque, 1700 Metro Manila
descriptions: Streamlined property featuring snug rooms & a lobby lounge, plus complimentary Wi-Fi.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"PurpleAnkh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qd0Gzx7-o-W0qn7F-oHhorx-ann6UFYRniBmE7Ar1MhRFtO-x6vY7U2LNCPC1lcQidkpw=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"The hotel is very minimalist in nature but was good for the one night I was there. Very comfy bed and pillows. No restaurant but convenience stores nearby. Room safe included, but no refrigerator. Table folded down from wall but there was no desk chair and bed was not quite close enough to make using table comfortable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tim Frazer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-I64xYSzxiA1EIH9Jt7BrCpodv2poloz4WbCGwXSj1RkeHF432g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The rooms are austere, devoid of any amenities. Thank goodness there are towels, otherwise there's nothing. No telephone, no bottled water, no bars of soap, no slippers, no disposable toothbrush. The aircons are cold but cannot be adjusted to higher than 17°C, so you stay really cold. The rooms are very quiet. There are no restaurants or any food or drinking establishments inside the hotel. There is a 7-11 near the front entrance and a few restaurants nearby. Remember to bring your own; water, toothbrush/paste, trash can for near the bed, and food/snacks/drinks. Parking is in an attached garage - single floor - with about 20 slots. There is a smoking area located at the back of the garage (level two). If you drive, be cautious, the area is policed by ASEANA, and they are very strict, violations are non-negotiable. If you feel like walking there is an S&R store within 5 min walk.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bryan T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfHhPp0vyvo1Wo3WY4NH1G5QOPAHGBMv_XiebXLZtHzVwVa3wkRhb3dykyKrUCZPlawDA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I’m the exception unfortunately to everyone else’s good reviews. Staff is very polite but room service was atrocious. For the price we paid we could have been in a better hotel with more amenities. We were charged 30 dollars to gain access to our room early, 9th floor and no phone in the room to call front desk. Our shower flooded the bathroom because the shower stall doesn’t close. Several children and adults and only 2 towels. Half  used toilet paper roll and no extra , and no soap. The key to the room controls all the power. My family went shopping and I stayed in the room. The key controls the elevators too. Once the key is removed from the hotel room it shuts off all power and I was left in the dark with no lights, AC and power to charge my phone. No complimentary breakfast. I ordered two big beds for the family and children and we were given two small individual beds that hold 1 person each. Smallest room around 10x10. We expected more from this hotel but sadly this was our worst experience so far. There are better hotels to choose from for the price. Taxes were nearly 40% of the room rate so we spent about 5000 pesos for the 1 night that included 1500 pesos early check in. Ridiculous. Save your money and go elsewhere.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gluttony","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrC_izclm3xOzMhr7d03KovwbKVFvxZBNIIG5PjdaDcsZ3rVS1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stayed here earlier this month. The rooms were clean and tidy. The staff were kind and friendly. The location was conveniently near Ayala Mall, and a 7/11 was just outside of the building as well as several other restaurants.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thed Weeks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQlIKQRNAtJxrOs6xrIHF61Jmfzbzj9-nwfeoatYuj3t_GRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been staying at Red Planet hotels now exclusively when in The Philippines. Staff is always super friendly. Whenever I have a problem, they address it quickly. This is not a fancy premium hotel. They do not charge fancy premium prices. But if you want a well priced, clean, and safe place to stay, Red Planet is what I compare other hotels to.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shangrila","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFEvRY8-yLmpnnQPisfkBoL0tfstOqDwaKQHkPSHn-k26XWsaV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a very pleasant stay in this hotel. It was my second time. I like that it's near the airport and to MOA. There are restaurants near the area. Convenience stores are present, too. The room was clean, the bed was comfy and the AC got me feeling really cold. I love that they have strong water pressure for shower. The service was great, they helped me with my luggages and even booked a ride for me to the airport. Red Planet was my go-to hotel even in Cagayan De Oro.

It's hard to find rides for commute in this area, though. You could try ride booking apps or taxi cabs, if you're not familair with the place.
You can also hear noises from outside corridor from people talking or passing by and the sounds from airplanes.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trip.com Member","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeCck1CfANpZm9bBk3PHtP97Kh9k25HZfvq9yAWlN3BaIyjSHUPEfWkhAJmuYiJsH-_6g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"The hotel provided a comfortable stay with clean rooms and friendly staff. The location was convenient, and the amenities were satisfactory. Overall, it was a pleasant experience for the price paid. It was my second time to stay here and would definitely stay for a 3rd, 4th and more. 😊","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex Fidel Diaz II","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfUxhW6kVzlO6-kKe5TipfR7Pi8HzkIPDupK6QUjL1jCsc7hPStA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our stay is so relaxing and enjoyable because the service is great and all the staff are very accommodating. The location is good because it is near to Baclaran Church and 5mins drive to Mall of Asia.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Hop Inn Hotel Ortigas Center Manila
address: Lot 9 Blk 5 San Miguel Avenue Ortigas Center, Pasig, 1605 Metro Manila
descriptions: No-nonsense rooms, some with minifridges, in a down-to-earth hotel offering Wi-Fi & parking.
complete_address: {"borough":"Ortigas Center","street":"Lot 9 Blk 5 San Miguel Avenue Ortigas Center","city":"Pasig","postal_code":"1605","state":"Metro Manila","country":"PH"}
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marlon Marasigan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX40fHlRJhiA5Kd1_wq9j8AhgpoZrrxaY_yfUsgv0Kdp8mL6_fTIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Actually expected more with the price. It does look like the basics of the basic. This is the first hotel I tried that gives just two glasses and you have to take water from the public dispenser outside the room. Might as well buy my own jug

The room. Clean. Simple. Nothing extra.

The location. Near most of the places you need to go to Ortigas.

Hopefully they improve or this is the last time I book there since there are rather many other options.

The place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORTjKh-Z6A17jjDJPALhDb4Mez-p1oew8hmSIY"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Noah R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeNj0UTN0yIrCGyJ0JhWwDODOg5QjAH0gdfB9Ji-oFl0zWFI-YVmhNAr-FGLycdpIjFmw=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"i love how clean the place is. it's so comfy and straight to the point. It was my first time to stay here and would probably go back on my next trip. i've stayed in many hotels in the area and i would say it is pretty much accessible. this place is recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZ7UOdEc9AQCYhCN-BV2TyKCJ3BNo0fKnGSVO7_XPGkb4YibA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Greatplace, easily accessible, theres not a lot of traffic going to and out of the hotel, But theres still a lot of taxis passing by. Theres no easily accessible public transportation, the closest is the Ortigas MRT station a 15-20 minute walk away from the hotel.

Hotel is great as is what you would expect of a good Inn, very clean, very private, walls are thick and noise wouldnt leak out into the corridors.

But theres only 1 rack for clothes inside the room and the instructions for getting room service is quite confusing and they do take a while to get there to help. The elevator is also very busy and sometimes can take 5-10 minutes before it arrives and it gets quite hot waiting for it. Theres not really a view and it is just a very good room for you to sleep or do your business in.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trip.com Member","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeCck1CfANpZm9bBk3PHtP97Kh9k25HZfvq9yAWlN3BaIyjSHUPEfWkhAJmuYiJsH-_6g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"asy check-in. Walking distance to Megamall. Room itself was large enough with clean comfortable beds.7-Eleven downstairs next to hotel if you need coffee or snacks. Overall excellent place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trip.com Member","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeCck1CfANpZm9bBk3PHtP97Kh9k25HZfvq9yAWlN3BaIyjSHUPEfWkhAJmuYiJsH-_6g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Would have been better if hotel is located close to an MRT within 300m.Rooms are just as expected for a no frills hotel. Clean and bright. Would have preferred to have some clothes hooks either on the toilet door or in the room to hang clothes and stuff. Overall it was a satisfactory stay.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anna May Villaluz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUh5hbj4u9Qlphj-6SncSXZ3Jvsd2wcBaoHYxW_nF24N18HVe1MQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Basic but Very Comfortable. Located in a central area close to many restaurants and convenience stores. Staff are efficient and friendly. One thing I am impressed with is how spacious Hop Inn is. The lobby was inviting and wide, the room and bathroom space were similar to what I can get at a luxury hotel.

Bring your own toiletries as only some form of shampoo / body wash is provided. There are glasses in the room, and water dispensers  by the elevator. No electric kettle, but the water dispensers also have hot water. The elevator can also be really slow (two small elevators operating the entire hotel), so make some accommodations for that in your schedule.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJFI-qNKVmwGkgLXdpZ7jZy7y9QWkaJVgKvdq8"],"When":"2024-1-16"},{"Name":"explore_with_may","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QdDVsOCeofRZJ7E-5_OmGTopxhKLKgrRyRiBqSVIkkG6ZY8A0xH5cj33o1mJn3HSwPBIA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Affordable, clean, and convenient place to stay in the heart of Ortigas that has the basic amenities -- towels, soap (eco-friendly and refillable), and drinking water (you can refill your bottles from a water dispenser near the elevator of your floor), with a comfortable bed, reliable wifi connection, quiet airconditioning, and cable TV. I requested for a quiet room on a quiet floor, and except for some guests who were shouting at each other at the hallway (the noise of which could be heard through the door), it was a quiet stay and the walls seem to be soundproof. Check in and check out was fast, which I appreciated. Enjoyed my first time staying in this hotel.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JaeLo *","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWnklDv6fAEOovcm6O1_p1N4uiEDrJmR8zunSxi7Dw726_x_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a convenient stay because it's very near our office. It has basic room amenities except for a dental kit that is an essential item for some spontaneous guests. The only liquid soap available is at the shower area. I brought my own dental kit and bedroom slippers.

You can find another hotel with complete amenities plus a decent breakfast at "almost" the same price but depends on the day or if you book weeks in advance. I checked in here because “that” other hotel is already fullybooked. 😅

Hop inn is good for short staying guests. There is no cabinet for clothes. If your room is near the elevator, there's a hot and cold water dispenser there. You’ll find 2 drinking glasses in your room.

I was not disturbed by the elevator noise during my sleep. I think I read other reviews that they were. It probably depends on how considerate other guests are. I stayed on a Wednesday night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIGwET0Ip31vyL1b9LMgidbldFPfrvNB1kQRXM"],"When":"2023-11-25"}]

title: Ortigas Budget Hotel
address: 16 United St, Pasig, 1600 Metro Manila
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Franz Thomas Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSzh-O4X7mesrVilfUfss8FsSIUD00ZJp958N35hZ4z_7z72o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ortigas Budget Hotel is an amazing option for budget travelers and can cater to couples up to big groups. Most notable would be their kind and accommodating staff. From our stay, they cater to both local and foreign clients. Do consider staying here for an affordable option to stay within the metro. Most especially since the place is accessible to many major malls and establishments including Podium, Edsa Shangrila, SM Megamall and is walking distance to Estancia.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maryann Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICjDRY00RsDwnJnZIlSEwA7jwOuJ43WQXRWWy3mnqN3y8z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We booked for two private rooms, but were given dormitory rooms on the first day.. All of the front desk employees, Jason in the front desk night shift, and the other two front desk employees in the AM shift were rude, arrogant and unprofessional.
Jason in the night shift said earlier on, "Pwede mag iwan ng gamit. Sandali lang pag nag check out." But upon checking out at around 12 PM last January 23, 2024, Tuesday, when I asked them, Pwede ho ba mag iwan ng isang bag pero babalikan kagad?" All the three employees said in the most rude, arrogant, offensive manner that it's against their company policy. If these people were intelligent, they should know what the job entails in order to keep their jobs because they obviously can't do more challenging jobs.
Jason from the night shift was also there. He kept on shouting at me, "Ano ba iyan!!! Bawal mag iwan! Under approval pa dapat iyan ng Head of Security!" He kept on shouting, "At siyempre, yung time dapat sandali lang! Kelan! Anong oras mo babalikan!" He said the opposite of what he said earlier. They should have explained nicely.
They don't deserve to work as frontliners because they don't know how to treat their customers properly, which would reflect very badly on your company.  I don't think the company will condone this kind of behavior.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ariel Orapa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsxTMPMiSSvm5pdhNKAAhPrSiqUUycxpVtaxyX_q_Mc9uK0X9i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I don't usually leave bad reviews, but unfortunately there is nothing positive I can say about this hotel other than their staffs are nice and the room is huge. That's the only reason why I gave it a 2 stars.

Other than that, it is true to its name that it is a budget hotel. Although, you can definitely find a hotel that are cheaper than this and maybe even better and cleaner.

I think my main issue with this hotel is that it is not well kept. There are little cockroaches in the rooms, and other crawling things. And then when I open the blanket there were hairs on it. Which is not mine because the strands were long. I'm not only talking about a few strands of hair, it is a bunch. I don't know how they missed that. Also there is a chair that has a lot of stain in it.

Probably not gonna go here again if there is no improvement will happen.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBQW4VfnIrt1dCuFBQw0tpiSf8NZog98RZoXyN"],"When":"2022-1-18"},{"Name":"Liza F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QdVsxDWqDDLG62Q3M3dmLlHORJs5jz0NWRJO3cP21KtRNPfosO7RpofjnbUgpyNjOTDew=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Firstly, the location is excellent. I got the room from Agoda thus came at a discount and it was very well worth it. They don';t have a restaurant but it's ok coz there's plenty of choice in the area. The room was spacious and could easily accommodate 5 or 6 persons and u pay like 2500 for that lang! Aircon worked fine, I like that they have an electric kettle and cups, only problema was the aparador didn't close properly and they could fix the shower curtain a bit, but really, no hassle. Am definitely staying here everytime I"m in the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leo C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QdVsxDWqDDLG62Q3M3dmLlHORJs5jz0NWRJO3cP21KtRNPfosO7RpofjnbUgpyNjOTDew=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I stayed here for one night for less than USD 20. Parking slot is available, the room was bigger than I expected, but it's relatively bare bones. I had two towels, no free water, no toothbrush or combs or lotions, not even soap in the shower. There was hot water and AC which is pretty good. Small flatscreen TV with cable available.  The mirror in the bathroom had the silver highly corroded. Other than that, the room was clean and the hallway and lobby were quite decent. Easy check in and check out.||||Oh, location wise, this is pretty good. In the heart of Kapitolyo which is a nice neighborhood commercial and residential area. Right at the outskirts of the Ortigas Central Business District. |||| If you want an inexpensive budget room with no frills this was a decent stay.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ma. Isabel Kathleen Orias","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKRmtXplgB4FQ1fhZnonoTmlqbDk9u4V6QxaaG_N_ZRiJkgkLd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It is what the name of the hotel is.

Pros

The room is huge. But it is mostly just bed and cabinets. No chair.
The aircondition is good, no problem with it.
Staff is accomodating

The staff will just give you the keys and you could go to your room.

Cons

What to expect:

Does not have shampoo, soap, and toothpaste. I mean, yes, we could totally just go to convenient stores to buy these, but with the hotel's location, and under some circumstances its not easy.

Always check the sliding window, on the room that we got, one window would not lock. It would make you feel unsafe.

There is no renovation at all. Does not seem managed. No TV. The bathroom is very old fashioned - no hot/cold option.

I dont think they regularly check and clean the beddings, and towels. Hairs everywhere and stains looks fresh.

Its two star because I dont hate it, I just disliked it.

I just hope they would do some upgrade.

Forgot to take a pic, as we got there almost midnight, really too tired, and has to get up early.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dean Edward Dimaguila","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUz0tombMP_qSuRSpoHH6yJeyliJQl2bffWNOs4Z-HHNiwooQdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The place is very accessible, value for money. Has no elevator. Rooms are spacious even the restrooms. Beddings are clean and new. Has a not so big TV with decent channels. Highly recommended if you are on a limited budget and wants to experience the different food stalls around Ortigas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeffric Pisueña (JP)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvxMFTe_fo6xWEgNlMFI6TT-7G5XncmnG853EVhCcSJMoohwaZqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Good for short and "budget" sleep, the room does not have (at least) complimentary soap and shampoo. Our room was spacious but no double lock inside. Shower (with hot) is very good. No elevator.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Holiday Inn Express Manila Newport City, an IHG Hotel

descriptions: Modern rooms in a relaxed hotel offering free airport shuttles & breakfast, plus a gym.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"kiwi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrzIg7A87ViCZp5dpdrD-OYlKCnEBbibeQcCGpxkPH5043EU1M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stayed here one night with my sister and we were allowed to check in early. However the room is as spacious and well designed as the others. The quality of service and facilities are also very good.  ||Breakfsst selection is simpler but good enough. What makes it ''express'' is the take away breakfast service for the guests with no timebin the morning.  ||Receptionist, housekeeping staff and restaurant staff were all attentive and friendly.  There are always queue atvthe receotion but having thought of the great number of the guest rooms, it is understandable and there is an express check out service as well. ||Only one terrible thing was the way the security lady ask the gusts for cooperation to open the bag or to have a bag checked thriugh the xray. |She was always so rude and distroying the welcoming atmosphere of the hotel. ||Everything else was excellent and i will be back when in Manila. ||Thank you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"doctorfoxtrot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QchZeuqqdsc2mxTzAL46o1Zp-eQpx0fXItgIlFx_-eADsDQzpyjY9GuirM6XH9EgCdepg=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"When staying at a Holiday Inn Express , lower your expectations. In that way , you can avoid disappointment. Rooms are typically on the small side . Lobby looks spacious but doesn’t have an identity . Don’t expect bell personnel to help you with the luggages , get your own pull cart . Breakfast buffet was as basic as basic was. But hey , that is still food . Also don’t assume the staff will secure you the table for dining . Other observations, erratic WiFi , AC doesn’t consistently cool considering the smallish rooms. But Tv has good choices of Hd channels . Location is the bomb, just a stones throw away to the Newport Mall , and besides the hotel is a 24/7 McDonald fast food and 7-11 convenience store . Lastly the charming FD Thea gave a nice checkout time . She is just wonderful.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nora Gonzales","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtv1ssbnvVBhb_keB1h5bbVepiD6fWqx_5qlqacLJ4JR2PfIbb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the place, the service and the staff. We always have a goodnight sleep whenever we are at Holiday Inn. Strong internet access, cold air conditioning. This time we celebrated my son's birthday and everything is perfect it's near Newport city mall a walking distance from the hotel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfICqsPeQy68koPWgPoaDGetIL9MVb5ql-xUw3"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Edu L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QcHdm0oAuHtzPwzcwUtTqUfPbZXmYnyyN78cO7_Z2aHVLpBkIuu0olTbSpOuQZcPV9sYQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"The hotel is accessible by car, walking distance from NAIA Termial 3 and within a row of shops and restaurants. Free breakfast is served to guests. Service is great and is easy to book online and the price is reasonable. The room is clean and provided with basic amenities.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stanley K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeFH6dzZjd_ZFLhXHZKibEzXEy8hWzFB4Qa7PutLe3CnO2G7yVfjd4VSabiCQwQYo5W-g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"This is basically an airport hotel. Everything is good and efficient - but i didnt find it very enjoyable. Not quite sure how to describe- Its basically a large hotel so not very personal- it has all the facilities and room was fine. What i am sayimg is that I readily stay a night when i am transfering or want to be near the airport but i wouldnt stay for a few days.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"aadi parashar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxzw7ACxsrgtrwwOV3V96B2Sn0xRHFm0pxNbqMGzs4YdIbsftg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am a doctor who is celebrating the birthday of a dear friend. Cleanliness is something I am very particular about, and this hotel has set their standards high. This hotel is really impressive to me. The check-in process was smooth and I was assisted by Duty Manager Angel and receptionist Samantha. It's no surprise that many people are staying here because of the friendly people. Keep up the good work. We'll be staying here again.

Stevene & Dr. Adi
Room 708","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"suzanne f","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeSe9ibNVY65MpgeQh70I370foM0-7tEPyVc9CIfSq5Ekli093sZJVPBoLD5d5qPK_2rw=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Never considered the hotel brand during my US travels but this hotel surprised me during my forced 3-day stay due to a flight cancellation. The rooms are on the smaller side and what you expect at this price point but it’s clean and satisfies the requirement. The front desk staff are friendly and helpful especially with my airport transfer fiasco with PAL. The restaurant wait staff are polite, friendly and attentive and let me lounge at my leisure at my table. I’d stay at this hotel again even with great choice in the Resort World City :)","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Armada Hotel Manila
address: 2108 Marcelo H. del Pilar, Malate, Manila, 1004 Metro Manila
descriptions: Laid-back rooms in a polished property with 2 restaurants, a rooftop pool & a poolside bar.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Donnah Wasti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFLeMW0n_0u9YzaYp7fIAPiILAAYxq66VfD45wG6IeQ2qwBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family and I enjoyed our stay in this hotel. It was small from outside but big enough space for the rooms. The receptionist & all the people working were all good. Very helpful & caring. The best was the breakfast buffet. They served different dishes varieties every day. That's why I'm giving all 5 stars ratings, but that was 10 years ago. I happened to see the reviews this time & I felt sad because we wanted to come back, but having second thoughts now.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kimberly F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiN98XALNyliR3AP-M4RF6U4qpwKiJXIbpMrbInJfLtopALQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had somewhat of a lovely stay at this hotel. The workers were very nice, the location was close by to Intramurus, Ocean Park, Rizal Park, and many more. The downside that I had staying here was that there was no warm/hot shower. You will be showering in cold water. Also, wifi was kind of tricky. The connection was on and off. The room was nice and spacious. Older style hotel so the floors do creek when you walk. Breakfast buffet was great as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jordi Ictech","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKuU2Q9q804l2--13a3N4qDKdTH-mTNebf13jmKEyszCsthJCC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"TERRIBLE everything. There was always something wrong with every facility in the hotel. There was no hot water in the showers, no internet for half the day most days, the gym had half the machines “under maintenance”, the pool was dirtier than your local sewage and even though we were moved rooms they all had dirty sheets. I don’t know who they had to bribe to get a 4 star hotel rating but this hotel is definitely not worth the price. The receptionists were useless whenever a problem came up and knew nothing at all. Actually could be replaced by a self check out kiosk, they bring nothing to this garbage dump.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bruce Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI22qFFF8gIMGDRCQc_lT5hqTjnvppQLUutzMEy3f-OfTV2Iw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I booked the hotel under my name because my friends and I had nowhere to rest until our late evening flight. I clearly asked the reception if my friends could receive the deposit since I had to leave an hour earlier than them. They told me that my friends must bring the deposit paperwork. I gave the paperwork to my friends and left, but the hotel refused to return the money to my friends, citing various excuses and saying I should have provided a transfer document.

There were two documents: one was the deposit document, and the other was the luggage storage document. It's logically inconsistent that they returned the luggage without a transfer document but wouldn't return the deposit.

I plan to visit the Philippines next month or the month after, and I hope to get the deposit back as I have the documents.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Alldredge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3pcuvJ_6SrLQpkXSc3zzB8Tep-0t27J6TQe-vqc7J5N4Ct7Hi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The wife and kid beat me here by about 7 hours, I had a delayed flight , even though the reservation was paid for in advance, and non refundable the girl at the front desk refused to check them in , they sat in a chair in the lobby until I showed up after midnight! The mattress in the room was very comfortable, easy to sleep here, the breakfast was 599 pesos each and not very good, the McDonalds around the corner has better food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wheng LaGuardia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiBU3CxUsFFbp5aP4ijpo1ZVw0gKmCzXnbYLovKV-x0aL_H_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"First and last on this hotel. Parking is too small and looks like a bodega. One key door is only allowed so if one of your companions is not around you need to call the receptionist for assistance to open the door. No complimentary tea and complimentary coffee taste not good. Upon check-in the double lock was broken and called engineering staff to fix it. Wifi/internet is too slow and on and off. The TV is too small and reception is not clear. Pool is not good also because the chairs and tables are too old and if you are going to swim there's a lot of men on the construction site surrounding the hotel. No TV at the Gym and some equipment is not working. It was too dark at night to walk and a lot of people were on the street close to the hotel. A lot of dogs are also on the street. Features of the hotel online are very different from the actual features of the hotel. Lastly, they have a father's day promo on their website inclusive of breakfast, but ours they said is not included but our room rate is based on the promo. Receptionist did not respond or called me, I am waiting for their explanation but no response. I wanted to check out and transfer to another hotel but we are so tired and we have a lot of luggage. Hand sanitizer at the elevator has been empty since day 1   This hotel is not recommended and NEVER AGAIN!!!!

This should not be a 4 star hotel but rather a 2 STAR only","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mark P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qf66pF81jsVXBxevYxxL5FsdlDsKAngAUpJVE-hAwai1rl8J0QnYqktKV3UGdpbmNlc_A=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I recently stayed at the Armada Hotel Malate, and it was a huge letdown. My last visit was over 8 years ago when the hotel was in great condition, but it’s clear the current owners haven’t invested any money into it since then. The neglect is evident everywhere: the floors creak, cracks are visible throughout, and the curtains are old and shabby. The bathrooms are even worse, with mold on the ceiling, and the TVs are outdated.||The buffet breakfast is a joke, lacking variety and quality. To make matters worse, the first room I checked into, 1208, had such a terrible smell that I had to request a transfer. Unfortunately, the new room, 1108, wasn’t much better. ||The owners of Armada Hotel Malate should be ashamed. This place is in such poor condition it should be featured on Gordon Ramsay’s Hotel Hell. I wouldn’t even board my dog here. Avoid this hotel at all costs.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jim Dees","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_HhEIBohKahbnLqugJqPX88xsOcYTuvjUSrpNS8g39sRqVoFtuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The staff and the rooms are amazingly accommodating. The low star count is based on the restaurant entirely. The hotel itself is great, comfortable and at a good price point.

The restaurant? I've had the breakfast buffet 3 times, and each time I claim will be my last. They serve cold food, all the items on the buffet line are at room temperature and not warm. There are 7 staff members standing around watching me eat. Not a single person has offered to serve water, juice or coffee as it's part of the buffet. (Buffet here means cold food, serve yourself, and no effort to allow the staff to assist with anything). They literally have 2 girls stationed at the doors for the purpose of welcoming guests. When I entered they couldn't decide which one would open the door..😂 😂. They aren't allowed to help guests, only open the door 🤷‍♂️.

I've eaten dinner here on 3 occasions. The food was good and hot, the dessert was yummy and when I've ordered to the room, all was excellent yet over priced.

If you stay here, avoid the breakfast buffet. Perhaps ordering from the menu would allow the servers to serve? I don't have any compliments for this restaurant. The buffet is 550 Pesos. I will be ordering Grab food for the room as I'm here another 2 weeks, yet may change hotels just for a better dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOodUkzAZ4rSIE114CWggHONY_tlOvcCqTMeEjm"],"When":"2024-4-6"}]

title: Mirasol Budget Rooms
address: Mirasol, Taguig, Metro Manila
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"John Arhel Fernando","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrMnzEQLASyhey4SwWO6ymjLOQdmInqgTCy-anxi49WK2y0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"NOT WORTH IT

The booking/checkout transaction is smooth, the price is cheap, and  the employees are very courteous. However, if you're looking for clean, quiet, and pleasant room, then this is not the place.
When I arrived, I can already smell the dried sweat like I'm in a prison cell. It stinks like hell in there, but the airconditioned room doesn't smell like that. The room is still humid, not cool enough for it to be called "Airconditioned".
They have a common bathroom, filthy despite being maintained. The water smells like rust.
The worst of them all is the noise.
I came there to sleep, but I think other tenants don't. Slamming doors, people yawning and laughing loudly as if they are the only person in the room.
They're policy states that check-in time is not later than 9 PM, but I can still hear people coming in at 3 AM.
The room is not really secured, no lock so you could not go out even if hou needes to. They just told me that my things "will not be touched" even if I go out.
The location is near my workplace (Uptown), but if you're planning to walk, I suggest you prepare your knees as the place is located in a low land and there are many steep roads.
Overall, I could say that the price is cheap, but it's not worth staying there again as you will never be able to sleep well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rosso Johnny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7nh02R5HprvzAg9l8wW64hyHXHJniTXI3vOwncmljBdiaRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Is actually good for it's price and is a very good location (in my opinion). If you don't mind dormitory style hostel, this is a really good deal for money and they are all capsule rooms, everyone was friendly and willing to help, felt like a community. The bathroom is a bit old but I can see they clean it daily. It felt like camping to me (because of the mosquitoes), but it was a fun experience and I could rest well (depends on where you get the capsule). Anyways if you are on a budget and don't mind shared bathroom, is definitely a good option!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rodel Mercado Jr (Rodel'screations)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXY26g09jR3ymrdxW7cwVO7EvbTS-CI_Bl2ydEZjT9hWhq6r1WrOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Place is very Near to everything almost like the Place that It's walkable most of the fast food chain around...

Place is good we stayed in non aircon Capsul, be aware they don't accept Cash they prefer paying it via Dragon pay or Gcash / or online booking..

The bathroom are not really that good, small spaces but it was clean time to time.

The place is very cheap and affordable for small budget traveler like me.

Only you will heard lot's of noises from reception during sleep so yeah if you have earplug bring it with you :)

Definitely will comeback when I am around..

Sari sari store are very near, canteen and laundry shop..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"RP Imjada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhUgsovagk4zSJ1rSoVIeVitMqiwF-2ABZI7iuiH8XdheKIzQHuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Noisy as the room is right beside a busy street. Common toilet and bath are filthy though maintained. Difficult to locate based on google map given in Agoda. Overall I felt tired after a night there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tessie Monillas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKo-BuE-VrAEqXZq0l-Kx8PdXJVEo1Pe61yyfFkC_VTZIHaFw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Walking distance only in my House,,","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Raziel Emmanuel Kane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSJJsXiCbNxNvU1mK5Q3tjq1-BNXFiv8UK_SPao4KyEGppnKZBpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good value for the price.
