title: Arzo Hotel Manila
address: 1032-34 Belen, Paco, Manila, 1007 Metro Manila
descriptions: Low-key rooms in an informal hotel offering breakfast, plus an outdoor pool, a bar & a coffee shop.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shermela H.noor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJW0OPFnv3CBXQLhJSrZUpz2J34I0ZuXlBJEjUqXfhJe-1ehw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently had the pleasure of staying again at this cozy and affordable hotel in Arzo Manila to celebrate my daughter's 15th birthday. It always exceeded my expectations in every way! The rooms were clean and comfortable. We even booked Family and Queen Rooms. The staff was courteous and welcoming, and the hotel's facilities, including a swimming pool and free wifi, were great. The atmosphere of peace and tranquility was what really caught my attention, even if you're in the heart of Manila. The hotel has its own Diner and Cafe (Kusina) that offered a wide range of Filipino cuisine at a very reasonable price, they can even host an event like birthdays, a wedding, group meetings, christening etc..If you're looking for a relaxing and affordable vacation, or if you're searching for an event venue, this hotel is a must-see!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"D X Nihon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdbfF5Ggvjy01kGJGjO9R9HWAM7wY0rZ5tIT5WlAo7IOfDkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Booked form agoda, Twin bed, after viwing room pic.

- Cockroaches here & there, (lots of)
- door lock was below average, not working properly.
- TV channel not working
- window view was blocked by tree leaf.
- hot shower not working properly
- need to walk like 3/5 minutes for good restaurant. Hotel restaurant was too pricey.

Pros:
- Clean room
- Bed was comfortable for me
- clean toilets
- good air-con
- friendly & helpful staff,
- not bad for budget room.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trip.com Member","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeCck1CfANpZm9bBk3PHtP97Kh9k25HZfvq9yAWlN3BaIyjSHUPEfWkhAJmuYiJsH-_6g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of staying at Arzo Hotel Manila and I can confidently say that my experience was nothing short of excellent. I would rate my overall experience a solid 9 out of 10. The cleanliness of the hotel and my room was remarkable. Everything was very neat and well-maintained, which made my stay even more comfortable. I encountered no issues during my stay, and any potential concerns were swiftly addressed by the efficient and friendly hotel staff. The amenities provided by the hotel were satisfactory and added value to my stay. Everything I needed was readily available and in good condition. The location of the hotel was convenient for my needs. It was easy to get to and from the hotel, and I found it to be a good base for exploring Manila. I had no negative experiences during my stay, and I would highly recommend Arzo Hotel Manila to anyone seeking comfortable and hassle-free accommodation in the city. The high level of service, cleanliness, and convenience it offers truly sets it apart. Overall, my stay at Arzo Hotel Manila was a delightful experience and I look forward to returning in the future.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mark aldrin Laplano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKon8ItXvdDUgUBIxpWZvNK72QV01pK5YgezQ9UZafmELfIOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The bright spot of staying in Arzo are the crew, thier sweet smiles and greetings from the guard to the front desk to the house keeping. They are always very responsive eso0cially Miss Madel. Kudos to the Arzo team.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ian Dave Custodio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkm9QXgc7fAciPAHyhUEVkieNQfBco8b-6qywkp_a4U41zDwBI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good location, peaceful and quiet. They have their own pool and resto. Foods are very delicious and service is good. We only had problems with their room, especially with the AC because it's quite old, took some time to cool the room and very noisy. The room were also not provided with door mats at first, till such time we requested for it. No side table inside, just a fixed table at the center tho there was a comfy chair. The room is also quite audible from the outside.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trip.com Member","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeCck1CfANpZm9bBk3PHtP97Kh9k25HZfvq9yAWlN3BaIyjSHUPEfWkhAJmuYiJsH-_6g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"The place was good and very near to Robinson's Place manila. Only problem is the cleanliness of room. Because the time we stay there the floor is dusty. When you go to the bathroom you can see your foo**ark. But overall it was a nice place","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trip.com Member","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeCck1CfANpZm9bBk3PHtP97Kh9k25HZfvq9yAWlN3BaIyjSHUPEfWkhAJmuYiJsH-_6g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Ok for a few nights. Friendly staff, enough space. But very old and dark room. Not made for spend a lot of time there. Unfortunately you can not leave your luggage at the reception for a while…But just 5 min walk to the Main Street were you can find LRT and Jeepneys.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephen Clay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIql4_7C3AaZg4ma845GVQ8ImiumMR2bjOspHkAe9PpzDFziA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stayed 1 night at end of June. Had a Queen sized room, comfy bed, great ensuite and aircon. For what I paid it was a bargain.
Used to love this hotel when it was Park Oasis, went off it when new owners were more interested in selling pannini than running a hotel.
Hopefully getting back to previous condition.
Everything was clean and tidy.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Admiral Hotel Manila - MGallery
address: 2138 Roxas Blvd, Malate, Manila, 1004 Metro Manila
descriptions: Polished accommodations in a refined high-rise hotel with a restaurant, a pool, a gym & bay views.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mary Hedwig Bomediano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwPRnpAnrQfwXFJSjIi3OTnYsK4VkWt_hqTtCIxc6nUEMjug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Beautiful hotel by the bay area. Wonderful views of the sunset.  The buffer breakfast area (Admiral Club) is very cozy and not overwhelming. The croissants were perfect! Food selection was good enough. There was just a few staff though so service may be a little slow… But they are all courteous and pleasant.  The hotel spa is something to try too. The club lounge is at the lobby area and is wanting of privacy. But all in all, we had quite an enjoyable stay :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSxUcKItj0P62l-RXon0L8doTHvDNbGak8KbTg"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Chelsea Bondoc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAHTytq8tGbAXuu-pEmVNfmD8Fwi5joRS1PP_WGaHe6W-cJOI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The beds are superb. Interior is beautiful. The staff was indeed 5-star. They took our order for lunch and did not forget a single order despite not having a pen and paper and we ordered 9 items. Dinner was always great. It’s pet friendly and great for an infant as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joel Concepcion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJaEDKpaUDt21ZZEmTCOjWsgmfCtoW0qE3-dvxG9j93ETSEqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a very relaxing 2-night stay at Admiral Hotel. From the moment I arrived, the staff was warm and welcoming. My room was beautifully appointed, and I especially loved the interior design, which was both elegant and cozy, creating a serene atmosphere perfect for unwinding. The soothing colors, stylish furnishings, and thoughtful touches made it feel like a luxurious retreat. The breakfast spread at the Admiral Club was another highlight of my stay— there was variety of delicious options that catered to every taste, making mornings a delight. We indulged in cocktails at Ruby Wong, which were absolutely perfect—expertly crafted and the ideal way to end the day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBWzw2oIhsKKNSzx_ALl0acdVsVh9uXIg8OWCL"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Eilish D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QcHdm0oAuHtzPwzcwUtTqUfPbZXmYnyyN78cO7_Z2aHVLpBkIuu0olTbSpOuQZcPV9sYQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Ruby Wong Godown was such a unique concept. A traditional Chinese speakeasy bar. Love their own signature cocktails. The live band was also awesome. Miss Jessica was so accommodating and friendly. Highly recommended and definitely will come back again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yvonne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qc_hSEOVyYt90T8jEI1lbdGPaVqSrwdtGLOma43xF2tT-AGCQEDWJCQ3qq81gsm_HjiWg=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I had a one-night stay at the Admiral Hotel transiting through Manila.  The hotel was only a 20-minute drive from the airport and was the perfect place to stay for a day or a week.  The staff at the hotel were excellent, both prior to my stay and during my stay.  Nothing was too much - so very obliging.  The bed was fabulously comfortable and all of the amenities were first-class.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Span A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeFH6dzZjd_ZFLhXHZKibEzXEy8hWzFB4Qa7PutLe3CnO2G7yVfjd4VSabiCQwQYo5W-g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I love the place. The room is so clean and the staff are very accommodating.|It's a very memorable experience in our life celebrating our silver wedding in this hotel. Thank you Mr. Ivan Conde who is very accommodating and hands on to all our requests . Keep up the good work.|I will surely recommend your hotel to our friends and family.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Garry Louie S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QdHDxxyBDO6igPA51sqxYAI1TTeuGvapT1sWSCJfPSgzOZltNlMhWmUDpj2A3v7zAw89g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"We recently visited Ruby Wong Godown, and it was an incredible experience from start to finish. The atmosphere was warm and inviting, with dim lighting and cozy seating perfect for a relaxing evening. The cocktail selection was extensive, offering something for every palate, from rich reds to crisp whites and even unique blends.||The staff like Miss Jessica was knowledgeable and passionate about the bar list, offering excellent recommendations based on my preferences. They didn’t just push the most expensive options but genuinely took the time to understand what I was looking for. I also loved the fact that they offered tasting flights, which allowed me to explore new drinks without committing to a full glass.||The food was just as impressive, with perfect pairings to complement the cocktails. The dumplings and beef brisket were standout, featuring a curated selection of local and imported ingredients that enhanced the entire experience.||Overall, Ruby Wong Godown is a gem. Whether you’re a wine connoisseur or just someone looking to enjoy a nice glass of wine in a cozy atmosphere, this place has something for everyone. I’ll definitely be returning!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ferdinand Go","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7CMYtpBnnH99DAap-V34XAcQUE8Ct-eamYTljLOOCw_GcS1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good location. Not centrally located but it's within close proximity to the places I needed to be.

The service was great. The staff are friendly and helpful.

The room was great. It was spacious and have good amenities in it. The only downside was keeping the temperature down, even if I put it on the coldest temperature, it always goes back to being warm.

The restaurants were fantastic! We tried both the Admiral and Ruby Wong and both served great food. They were delicious and serving size were enough for 2 people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5Ot_HbhjtJxjqqKCNati2Xjj7QxnPoG8HquVW"],"When":"2024-8-7"}]

title: Avant Serviced Suites - Personal Concierge
address: 26th Street corner 3rd Avenue Crescent Park West, 3rd Ave, Taguig, Metro Manila
descriptions: Streamlined apartments in a sleek high-rise offering a gym, an outdoor pool & breakfast.
complete_address: {"borough":"","street":"26th Street corner 3rd Avenue Crescent Park West, 3rd Ave","city":"Taguig","postal_code":"","state":"Metro Manila","country":"PH"}
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Linsey Dang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbc4XVjo6m6lyObs-fRqhM0OaZiLS87UJfLcpVjCxjTMILWrbw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"1 star for the most nightmarish night at a hotel!!!

- Upon checking in at 10pm I figured the internet was not working and I needed to work as I was on a business trip. I was made to reset the internet modem to no success. No attempt made to apologize properly and not even a gesture to make the situation better.
- At 11.30pm I figured there was no hot water. I attempted to contact the conceirge but nobody answered. I called the building maintenance by myself and when the maintenance guy found out the heater broke down and wanted to speak to the conceirge, they did not even pick up. I was instructed to check out the next day and offerred refund.
- There is proof of Agoda booking as per attached
- There was absolutely no attempt to apologize at any point.
- The hotel did not attempt to contact me again to process the refund: I had to reach out to Agoda to initiate refund and the hotel still has the audacity to tell Agoda to charge me for the first night.

I PAID ~100USD PER NIGHT TO THIS HORRENDOUS EXPERIENCE SO YOU DONT HAVE TO.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0ElFzNDKj-wc1dWBhCZA2-Lb6q5LQ3DmMUgNI"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Joanne Teh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnwfjM8E6RbzpSVIgaoYUGgCCQbIvPHDZSwuiSSSNzkZhLALZu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's strategically located at BGC. Location has many eateries and markets. Walking distance to many major hotels around BGC.
The unit I lived in is double storey. Upstairs are 2 bedrooms - 1 queen size, 1 single bed. Upstairs only 1 bathroom with toilet. Downstairs has only 1 toilet and with washing machine. I was given level 29. It feels like a Airbnb as it doesn't provide housekeeping everyday and only 4 bottles of 500ml water provided. So if u need more drinking water, you'll gotta buy yourself.
It provides basic toiletries and bath towel.
Overall it's a comfortable and quiet place to stay in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPH2wbliDgHmMVgdeR5zrA3z58Bk289eh15cBQ"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Marlon Marasigan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX40fHlRJhiA5Kd1_wq9j8AhgpoZrrxaY_yfUsgv0Kdp8mL6_fTIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We did not expect the room to be spacious. The room. I actually expected a hotel setup but was surprised with a fully furnished condominium type of staycation. title: La Belle Residences
address: 7733 Saint Paul Road, village, Makati, 1203 Metro Manila
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"RR balmes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTT0eBDzZPf3VWPsvT0u34LvPJCVUq3TxDjz9fniteXiaOq8Ac=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Traumatic experience. We stayed here for 3 nights on Oct 5-8, 2024. We paid a late checkout fee upon booking but the staff mistakenly checked out our room around 1am. Around 7am in the morning thankfully we are already awaked and watching tv suddenly the housekeeping attempt to open our room. And then around 12:30pm, the receptionist is calling on my phone reminding us to checkout already even though I paid a fee to checkout at 3pm. They said they don't know and did not check the booking. Poor coordination and staff orientation. The staff apologized and they offer to talk to their HR but we don't want to talk about it anymore we just want to leave. There is a 2000 pesos security deposit upon check in but refundable so be prepared. Will never go back ever on this one.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eugene T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QcHdm0oAuHtzPwzcwUtTqUfPbZXmYnyyN78cO7_Z2aHVLpBkIuu0olTbSpOuQZcPV9sYQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Booking has free cancelation policy but it will immediately charge with no refund. Hence we decided to stay here & it wasn’t a pleasing experience.||During check in, security deposit was charged twice and they refused to refund us. And upon check out on a Sunday, they still yet to refund us. Being a backpacking holiday we didn’t have so much cash with us and it ruins our holiday and unable to purchase any gifts in Manila.||Upon check out and they decided to impose smoking fine when none of us smoke in the room. The smell was due to  I use a lighter to tear open the shampoo.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eugene Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzYAayAS23lo4dOhJHyZfzFHSxPdFur7tBgU88B2yi_5YVCw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"During booking there’s supposed to be a free cancellation but it was immediately debit hence we are unable to switch to another hotel.

At the check in, security deposit was charged twice and refuse to refund.

At check out, they impose smoking fine on us where we didn’t smoke in the room. I used a lighter to open up the shampoo package as being a tourist I don’t have cutting equipment. And they insist on charging us the smoking penalty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPQOvLmiqMFJxuvvq1aY051n2E_rarCRn93Wtv"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"mfyers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QftlnsLB8VReEIa8q3x-FUIWL9jAVnw9OiPzFml0xLx7k1DporKgZdMXGALflbNzntF3w=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I booked two nights here (as well as an additional 6 nights), and when my plans changed, I requested a cancellation waiver with 10 days' notice. I sent it via the booking app and they choose to start playing bizarre games. They ignored my request and told the agent that they were thinking about my request. This was a lie, they had no intention of replying because they only had one thing on their mind - to scam foreigners. I also put a message up on a FB forum and sure enough learnt they've done this before. While I can understand that if they replied no, then at least I would have an answer. They ignored me then on the day of the reservation sent me countless emails, followed the next day by a week-in-advance message telling me I was all set for next week. I have never NOT had a response from a hotel and to ignore the company that markets your hotel is morally wrong. They are in one of the most popular areas for tourists and as a cheap hotel, they could easily resell this during that period. I would understand if it were 24-72 hours' notice given that is a short time. I choose a refund period booking, and all I asked was for a response. Something felt wrong when they did reply in the first 24 hours, as all other hotels have done so. Do not risk being caught up in whatever elaborate scam they've got going. Book elsewhere and don't get intimidated by their odd behaviour. Because I can assure you when it comes time to pay, they won't hesitate to email you constantly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steve Annable","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXP8pz5Mlx9TVBKqEsnMi4Uzz0kFlTQa2RCd-pu3kgM_anJfWQNfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The room itself and the staff were great. The location is a little bit remote and away from the main road at night time it’s a little dark and it could be scary for first time travellers","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"CASPER mcguire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpMrHJ0wXXSmgrBsuA8pJpNhe1cceDnj3tStdLPmaUBbek8X_4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of staying at La Belle Residences and was blown away by the level of service and attention to detail. From the moment I walked in, I felt like I was in a luxury hotel - the facilities are stunning and the decor is impeccable. The staff were incredibly welcoming and attentive to all of my needs. My room was spacious, clean, and had all of the amenities I could ever need. The location is fantastic, with easy access to shopping, restaurants, and entertainment. Overall, I highly recommend La Belle Residences for a luxurious and comfortable stay in the heart of the city. 5 stars!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ma. Anna Patrisha Baldonado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzXxmjGYpEKiTlJgj4xx3Ns4OdIjvlOOAitGsglAD_K0gHICwj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice rooms for the price. They have mini ref and hot water kettle.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9GsV5ZVat0FIWC7DCE-iK2TlnBoRqnHgSlzUI"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"delfinjr pura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlYZA6jrglJEGiaUzwJZcPtaKj4A0rnZAnxaR3gWE2YQYJqju_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"*clean room

title: Red Planet BGC The Fort
address: 10th Avenue corner, 12-10 40th Street, Taguig, 1630 Metro Manila
descriptions: Streamlined rooms with Wi-Fi & smart TVs in an unpretentious hotel offering parking.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"lex y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qc1kNGO8LfCIUkNiXrsfeYG3onj8HWsGiBwC71th43hKBnE5GlvQyCYmZ1-b-eE7ReWRw=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Great location, clean, and no frills. The wifi here was fast. It’s a great hotel if you want to spend a couple of days in BGC. The rooms are small but clean. I wish there was a proper seating area in the lobby instead of benches. The rooms are so small that you really only want to sleep there. The seating area in the lobby would allow guests to unwind outside of the tiny rooms. The laundry service used by the hotel is also great - same or next day delivery for a reasonable price. Will definitely come back. title: Green Sun Hotel
address: 2285 Chino Roces Ave, Makati, 1232 Metro Manila
descriptions: Unfussy rooms in a modern hotel featuring restaurants, breakfast & a fitness room.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Forever a Radish","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmNld4hTUzd7ltgGqxurFsX2MAh5ASJ1jEbmg9e7gBvt5UT_oi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Totally DO NOT RECOMMEND this hotel! They unreasonably asked us to pay more for “damage” to property. The damage in question: a small period stain on the bed sheet which was not intentionally done. I even explained to them that nobody told us about this “damage fee” beforehand, and asking us to pay a night’s worth of room is unreasonably as we did not even did it on purpose. Buying a new bed sheet would be cheaper than their so called “damage fee”. The staff were inflexible of our concerns so we just ended up paying to not escalate the situation further. This hotel does not accommodate the valid concerns of the consumers and the staffs were incompetent in terms of not letting us know about the “damage fee” beforehand.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Todd L. Sales","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVISozl5ZISnGyzoyfDN7TFb9iYCxfCKU4N5-ZTB_BfF2zzxqBj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Location was nice, the staff extremely helpful and friendly. A little mix up in the instructions I gave about having my room cleaned but they made up for it later. Price is also affordable. And it's pretty accessible.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Everton Malanche","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbp8MjkDfSxiLxoNWyrZQK8CVyVvIkdQZtm87TcCJD1SHoz6E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The rooms are very clean and comfortable but what I love most was the receptionist "Diane" she was so helpful and kind really recommend 👌","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anna May V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfjHmZg8gr7jpDgKhrh5KsR_Mq7L6pkVedvpKQz-f3LMiOd3OjI90CK4uLtF3wE59zZgA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Went here on holiday - and realized soon enough that almost all nearby commercial establishments, save for a takeaway BBQ place (Vito's) and a convenience store, everything else was closed. It certainly caused me a lot of stress trying to figure out where to take my daughters as we were all spending the holiday together.||The hotel is a bit old-fashioned, the electrical sockets are few, and loose for the most part (I booked 2 rooms, we couldn't plug chargers in almost all the empty sockets). ||Breakfast is standard silog, served cold if you're unlucky. ||Still ok, just don't come here on a national holiday, I guess.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Faye Chris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGIiJA4m-Mf2uzeG1ra0sc1UFBw5H2JdOGJOFJ9BDv5TwJNeSb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"-The front desk staff chit-chats with the other staff while I was checking in. Throughout the process, she didn’t accommodate me formally at all.
-As I went inside the room, the unpleasant smell of the room was so strong, I tried to disregard it but then it gave me headache after 30 minutes of trying. You will not be able to stand it especially if you want to have a good rest and be in a good condition the next day. The hall way also smells the same. I guess it's because of the dirty old rugs.
-  I asked the front desk to change my room. And the other room smells better than the first one so I settled. BUT
- The next day, I had a lot of BED BUG bites all over my body. It made me extremely uncomfortable as I have an appointment the next day. It's a very bad experience.
- Food was delicious and the housekeeping staffs were polite.

AVOID this hotel","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"V A N E S S A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViV4ewbevCz77NsCIcHHOh6UxdyypnNtQBk0C8sGql0NrrsblzFg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Huge room, comfy bed with complimentary bottled water and coffee. The check in process was very smooth.

This hotel is highly recommended for people who have appointment at VFS Global (10 - 15 walking distance from this hotel), whether for visa application or for biometric collection.

Rooms are affordable and all the staff are friendly, too.

I will definitely stay in this hotel again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nina C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvH2FSGdAX3JyXkE_6GAfbmNenjUAPl9nCJHurbvZGX2h5V9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice hotel. It was quite fancy for Manila. The cost, I believe, was 2500 for a night. The staff were nice and helpful. I'm from America and this was the first hotel I stayed at after arriving. It was close to the airport and very nice to come to after a long flight.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gene Tech","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ_2r5WyJSfSltStS-TfLTfQbjg8LvhbumupFXmN9aWbZO5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My got worst experience in this hotel. Noisy, dirty, and the room key was not working at all and every time when I enter the room, housekeeper open my room door.
I do not recommend this hotel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUTos-Wtcxrq3zTpWYm5qICtKGwidtzqRvDt0w"],"When":"2024-4-16"}]

title: The Mini Suites Eton Tower Makati
address: 128 Dela Rosa Street, Legazpi Village, Makati, Metro Manila
descriptions: Laid-back hotel offering simple rooms & suites, plus complimentary parking & a gym.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Vedran Panic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwAzMC2LoSsZwN_9NeS0mgXu3Z9ei_oNSCVttkjC3z83xrSv8R=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rooms are good. Everything you need, shower and bed.

Great location, walking distance to Greenbelt. Easy access to highway by car.

Inside the hotel there is a small supermarket, coffee shop and some other shops that we didnt check.

Be careful if you are coming here by car. Inside the garage there is very low clearance, you may scrape your roof.

We will be coming here again because its a great value for money.

Thank you for reading","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Azisah Domado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUG5XJGlXMedQQ9BfeBdoXcvtmnEMb9-KJzB-vg4E5jyqAovF5U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have been to a hotel cheaper than the mini single room here in The Mini Suites Eton. Thus did not expect the room to be too small. I was fine with it since I only needed to sleep BUT the thing is I could not even sleep being able to hear the noise in the next room. What material do they even used to the room, seriously?? Will probably not going to book here again.

They have fairly fast check-in/check-out so I’ll give them that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsB5tBswSG3qPS54EkMdh1C50W_TNjKpWURXxu"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"joy santos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJqsPM0mjm0MM26O9bqU7p1P-Y819N88cosmw16TB7yO742w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stayed here on 2 different occasions for a total of 5 days. My husband and I felt safe walking around as late at 9pm to different restaurants and fruit drink establishments. Female receptionist (ate Jean V) was very accommodating to our requests. House keepers were very attentive. I was in makati for medical purposes and I’m so glad they made our stay so much better 🥰","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Norman Arcangel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUFgzTZ08ne-ZI8-NYzBn_fFJozFKF_jZPv1sQj0u3MLKtvnCfoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Room is basic and quite small. Comfort room is divided from the bedroom with just a semi- frosted glass. Elevators to the basement parking need maintenance since only 1 of 2 is working. This place is for individuals looking for an inexpensive place to sleep and be out most of the time. It's highlight is the close proximity from Makati Medical hospital and Ayala Makati Business district.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jean Van As","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7mA-LRbQnsGwUnY6zeEATyhcUFvQJ3nGL3sPZRwfSWNWoGuvT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Couldn't have had a better experience during my stay, the daily rate was excellent, the room was very clean, well kept and maintained. The location is ideal as everything you need is found right on your doorstep. This will definitely be my go to for each trip I take to Makati.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pie B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qd0Gzx7-o-W0qn7F-oHhorx-ann6UFYRniBmE7Ar1MhRFtO-x6vY7U2LNCPC1lcQidkpw=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Clean beddings and comfortable bed. Lighting was ok. I loved the spacious gym and the large pool. There's a nearby Jolibee,Chowking etc. Room was too small for my liking though. Staff not smiling but they're doing their jobs alright. Generally, the experience was acceptable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Reah Derige","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGARxp8_87plcr2HtM9VgE9z3hotG4be8e6HvYMJ6MBM7hYhLp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The room sizes are different from one another.  But the view outside of the window was good. You can see the city lights.  And the fast food chains and restaurants are just around the corner of the building.

We just don't like the comfort room inside the room. It is made of glass and it is too awkward to take a bath or dump even if you can just see the feet of the people inside . hahahaha.

The pool is big and children can swim here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEPmsL2paeWX-o1OBG8UAQWgDdeWPbK4s5Q7zm"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Culture61978688187","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeYuXGoFc9HnT35lAJ46cKDIsHY7nNIKUKz_f8yINNlqyrU48jCx-4ctPzihRKgde030w=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"We had a good time staying at rhe Minis Suites Eton Tower. We chose the Family classic room. But since we are 3 adults and 1 kid we had to request another bed for extra.. it could have been good if the room could accommodate maximum 4 persons. In any case, the room is clean and the aircon is a plus.. The area is close to landmark, greenbelt and other shopping malls. You can find all kinds of foods within and outside the hotel…","Images":null,"When":""}]

So I had to call the reception and complain.\nFor service, I give them 5 stars. They responded immediately to my concern and gave me a new room. The rooms are nice actually. All your needs like clean toilets, tv, AC and comfy chairs are present.\nFor the location, I rate 1 star due to the noise pollution from outside. It's also near a mall, Robinsons Manila.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trip.com Member","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeCck1CfANpZm9bBk3PHtP97Kh9k25HZfvq9yAWlN3BaIyjSHUPEfWkhAJmuYiJsH-_6g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I like the place.very near to all tourist spot.and the best is , the office of my husband is near left beside the hotel..room is very nice .we can cook","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"EthanWallace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QcHdm0oAuHtzPwzcwUtTqUfPbZXmYnyyN78cO7_Z2aHVLpBkIuu0olTbSpOuQZcPV9sYQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"From arrival, the warm welcome was indeed great from the concierge and the reception staff. Room was awesome, clean and spacious. The Bathroom was clean. towels and nice amenities,||||The Room ambience was really nice and i mostly I loved the view of Manila Bay. The morning breakfast is wow with ample selection ||||The staff were really welcoming and smiling, very helpful in giving information. ||The place is really perfect for a family or a couple. It is so spacious and cool.||||The only thing might be replaced is the towels. everything else is just great.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karoline C.K.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVddQdVdB0JExJIXwvS-CZebBJtx0pbmW3o1aGCyNDiWKeR4jMPog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Big renovations are needed for this place! The room was very spacious and the WLAN worked perfectly fine, I'll give you that. But this place is outdated, the room had a weird smell to it, smelled like cigarettes. The bathroom looks dirty, just because of the old tiles and the interior. I'm sure the cleaning staff is doing their best job, but everything just looks so old and used, that it stills somehow looks dirty.

The bed however was comfortable, we didn't have any issues with bugs and the staff was very nice! Because of that, I'll rate this place ***","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ron Leif Escandelor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsHUCwToPZRzcwjfkStCLU3AYM8HfhB2gIsusvnYZjZV7ztMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We rented a standard room for the night. The place feels like a house, since it has a kitchen and living room space. Staff are accommodating and pleasant.
Added bonus is its proximity to the the US embassy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pete B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qd0Gzx7-o-W0qn7F-oHhorx-ann6UFYRniBmE7Ar1MhRFtO-x6vY7U2LNCPC1lcQidkpw=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I have traveled extensively throughout Asia but this was my first trip to Philippines. Hotel was booked by a friend. Great size room but that's where the positives ended. Beds were 2 singles and very very soft. The bathroom was dirty and toilet blocked when we used it. Extremely old lounge chairs with no support. We checked out early so didnt try the breakfast. Apon checkout we were charged the equivalent of $80 Aus for a bed sheet they claimed had a stain on it. 2 of us slept in the single bed for only 2 hours. I check everything prior to leaving the room and definately no stains. Sadly this hotel I would not recommend to anyone","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Neil P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeNj0UTN0yIrCGyJ0JhWwDODOg5QjAH0gdfB9Ji-oFl0zWFI-YVmhNAr-FGLycdpIjFmw=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Me and my cousin stayed last August 2018.||||The lobby is clean and pleasant but the room is dirty besides of its oldness. ||||The bed is not comfortable. Everything is weird and scary about the room.||||We escorted by a bellman that didn’t explain the room amenities and hotel facilities. So we have no informations about the room.||||The attendants are so slow if we call for any||assitance. And they are not happy to serve you. Even the staff are not happy with their duties, so as a guest just expect also not to be happy during your stay. ||||It is very scary to stay in the hotel especially if you are alone since the guest floor seems so quiet and the room is a very old antique concept like in the 80s or 90s filipino movies. ||||I am sorry I cannot recommed this hotel for a group stay or solo stay.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Golden Phoenix Hotel Manila
address: Oceanaire Bldg., CBP D. Macapagal, Sunrise Dr, Pasay, 1300 Metro Manila
descriptions: Modern hotel offering airy rooms & an outdoor pool, plus free breakfast & an airport shuttle.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jezer Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4JouTL051eKJKEVajl72y5QyU4X3yoV0DbtYwrpfEd6a4byvs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The room we booked was really amazing. Executive Suite - we really felt why it was rated 4 stars. Cozy, broad, and quiet.

Lobby: 10/10 (Accomodating staffs)
Room: 10/10 (Love the vibe but the TV is still not a smart TV)
CR: 10/10 (Clean and complete toilet set)
Breakfast Buffet: 8/10 (Too much processed food)
Swimming Pool: 5/10 (Needs renovation)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdt2-ACrWr1q9YnHyZdSoEbf06GVvw3qvOd0Bd"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"E O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgd14TEQRPTjDBt8-1OtmEOyFHxzQqzKCUJr2howuUJAtJiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"While this hotel’s location is great and highly convenient, the staff makes this hotel truly special. Everyone is accommodating, courteous and offers high calibre service.

The breakfast buffet is different everyday. Not only do they have a wide selection, the food and drinks are delectable, fresh and carefully prepared each time.

From the guards to reception desk to dining team, our experience has only been fun and easy. The Food and Beverage team is friendly. A special shoutout to Louie C who has been a great lead for the team and who has gone above and beyond our expectations.

Shoutout to other F&B staff such as Ned, Franco, Clark and the others I failed to get the names of; they do not get tired attending to all guests.

Thank you for the wonderful stay, Golden Phoenix! We’ll for sure rebook when we come back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doc B Lapa (skysenshi)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWF3S42T7n1rnlVP4avindqf2VuL8n-9AuSrj1s5vlZb11zdbjD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Needed to meet my physical therapist halfway, so my husband and I booked this hotel, which was surprisingly inexpensive if you consider what they have to offer.

Just to get it out of the way: the rooms are dated. You can see that the corners of the doors, furnishings, and wallpapers are on the verge of peeling off. The hallway carpet can use some changing, too.

The things we really liked:
- Location, there's a 7-11 and an Alfamart if you forgot to bring your toothbrush/toothpaste
- Their cafe. We were surprised that we only spent about ₱700+ for our meal when we were so full by the end of dinner. The vegetarian pizza is pretty good.
- Complete facilities inside the room. Coffee kit, soap and shampoo, hairdryer, bidet, lots of charging stations, and even a small round mirror for makeup needs (because the main bathroom mirror is too far from your face).
- Buffet is ok, but I like the ramen station (it's more like chicken and kikiam mami, but I really enjoyed this)

Parking is coordinated with the guards, because there's a slot assigned to each room. I wonder how it's going to be for events, though. Like, if we wanted to celebrate a party.

Overall, we're satisfied with the service, considering what a deal we got this for. We would like to go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4r1jaqrwbs_W-sXZq37lBL2NYsfAZvQIF5312"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"IREDAROG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfsnvlNO8mgROWsxiGYBmc-FMApm47le01WrNgEyYNYqUPw1j7nx-COV-HLlhXF8VUXQQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"This hotel was excellent.  We had two nights but the attention to detail  and the very attentiveness of all staff were a credit to the hotel.  The room was very clean  and the bed comfortable.  The location next to the Mall of Asia was also excellent.  Would I stay at this hotel again ? YES I WOULD","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"rizzi creative","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIydklcEK0y7e8QhEwQ7FO3ssoA3MXIW_7Mp0bMoy0SrAbOdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stayed here overnight I had no issues in this hotel. The staffs were nice and helpful with our luggages although I wish that they will be willing to help you with no exchange of monetary(tips) the staff didn’t ask for it verbally but I can tell the body language was sending signal. Our room was decent it was clean, the location was good it’s close to the airport, close to a mall which is pretty convenient.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONbDdG_IHHxA0NEksCuzgrRxl0VjH8dwr6Ptcc"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Giovanni Cipriani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4tlk8n2YOjkai684nyqDl6gtVaWNDr2eTeoHbIpZ12y_vho-7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Only place i stay when I need to go to Manila to the U.S. Embassy or VA.  They treat you like family from the time you step out of the taxi from Airport till you leave.  It's only 3.9 kilometers to Airport and you have a short walk to Mall of Asia.  The 3 restaurant's in the hotel are amazing and prices are very reasonable.  There are 7/11 around the corner and across the street is like a Circle K store both open 24 hours.  Plus their are 3 banks right next to the hotel BDO,  East West Bank and i forget the other ones name.  I'm telling you all now very clean and updated they keep this hotel.  Rooms are amazing and so is the swimming pool on 7th floor.  So please go their you won't be disappointed we are going back again in January.  Plus I did a YouTube video on our channel JenGioPhilippineJourney","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPy0hzYXsqKB4mfepwsd77XA_wkOzSHO9Uv52yr"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Jerson D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0Qdx0CtChWdL4amzhVtedU6JgNzs3A9KzPS8K998c7-u-mDeTb-7WQwuTD-PPX6BcVA5wg=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Has gone to this hotel a few times. It's the best value for money, world class amenities at a budget friendly rate. Special mention to Jun who helped with our luggages brought to the room. He was courteous attentive and friendly. The free breakfast is awesome by the way!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rene Thöne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAjjT0cHv8W2dElCo9_aypix6Mo89pJ812erChUOlSLxc7M1ok=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You get more than you pay for! The first Hotel in Manila with a good (very good) Price/Quality ratio. I read some comments here and in Agoda, and check them...
Smell in the aisle? No. We visit 3 storey, all clean, all carpets are clean.
30 Minutes for hot Water? No. First warm water after 5 seconds or more early, becomes hot after maybe 10 seconds. The Warm and Cold water is pumping, so the temperature pumps between OK and very warm or between "Little bit cold" and OK, but no problem to take a nice and good shower with good water pressure.
The Rooms are very spacious. We are upgraded because our booked room class was under renovation, and the room was great. OK, the style was 60th in germany, the wallpapers needs to be fixed, but thats all. Aircon: Clean. You smell, when a Aircon is not cleaned for long time. No smell here. Split type Aircon, very silent, good for sleep. Real Window, so you can get in fresh ocean air (in the morning, it is Manila...).
Location: Sea side of Makati, in front of the Mall of Asia. A lot of shops and restaurants (and Laundry shops, and massage, and...) around the corner or just in front of the hotel, 10 Minutes Walk to the MOA. In the night nice view to the lights of the MOA. You have a nice small rooftop pool, BBQ at the roof, a "more than good enough" Restaurant (Golden Spices) in the Hotel, a spacious Bar/Bistro (Amore) at the 2nd floor.
A little bit funny: You need to take the escalators (or elevator) to get to the 2nd floor and then walk to the guest Elevators, maybe not the first choice if you can not/hardly walk.
We would always book this Hotel again, the Service is so friendly, rooms are high and spacious, Price is affordable, environment is great... Fast check in: The registration form was already pre-filled, so the whole check in process needs something like 2 Minutes, that's very fast for the Philippines.
Room and shower (good for 2) are absolute clean, the bathroom mirror are 95% brilliant clean, the room mirror is 100% brilliant clean. to compare: In average, also in good hotels, the mirrors look like a child played on it with ice cream and a nutella bread...
Towels are fluffy, and the bedding and linen are super soft and smooth and silky. In a rainy season you can easy spend 2 Days only at the hotel because everything is wide and bright. I can not understand other complains here, but i am happy to become curious and test it for ourself.
Internet could have a bigger capacity, but Ping is very good (191 ms to denic/germany). One of the fastest possible pin gin the Philippines. Download is not that amazing, i think their Bandwidth is short for a lot of customers. But good enough for Video Calls!
6 elevators, but only 2 for the guest, means Apartment renter use their own elevators. Both guest elevators working, short waiting times, access only by keycard.
Breakfast is Asian style, no continental breakfast. But good enough for 2 or more days. Skip the "German Frank" or "German Sausage", they are horrible. Everything else was good and eatable, also a good Price/Quality (750 Pesos).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7Fzf286WUJVha45Qp-gQsa8gAertUdRpGyJbF"],"When":"2024-10-12"}]

title: Red Planet Manila Bay
address: Arquiza St. Corner, 0930 Alhambra St, Ermita, Manila, 1000 Metro Manila
descriptions: Straightforward rooms with free Wi-Fi in a contemporary budget hotel featuring bay views.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"darkloid 03","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFvJCPLF-Dmsn1vJL1qtoXbRxvriapqfU2qCYbNyyB_2OFM48=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The location is near the US embassy, which is convenient. Around 5 minutes walk to  the overpass leading to it.

The room is new and clean. I feel like the kit should be included in the room for convenience. There is a divider for the shower and toilet area but no shower curtain and/or door, so my slippers are understandably wet after showering. I also noted ants crawling along the walls when i first arrived in the room. Some of them were even on the bed.

The staff are friendly and accommodating. But i do have a complaint on whoever is in charge of the luggage storage area.

We arrived early, around 9 am, so we decided to have our bag(Acer bag) and luggage stored while went out. Around 2-3pm when i got my bag back i noticed the  logo almost removed and slightly damaged. Someone tried to take it! I always take good care of my items and this is the second time i used my bag for trips.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF9Ie-ltJJtAL4Cc5se97N4wN3nHH4lMUwg1zg"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Chriz Dosel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtjdlABsLQHtVEtGr7f8acp8JC_JFNKmXbmSfEnP52vhedNlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently stayed at your hotel and found it comfortable and clean with friendly staff. However, I have a few suggestions for improvement.

It would be very convenient to have hygiene kits readily available in the room. Also, the air conditioning in my room didn’t cool effectively, impacting my comfort. Lastly, easier access to TV controls or clearer instructions would enhance the entertainment experience.

Thank you for considering this feedback. I look forward to seeing these improvements on my next visit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Annie Bunchie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILGleavCopogouLiLTilwMaiEOBAP-1BvOtvwqieV908bItA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you have an interview in the US Embassy be sure to get a room here in Red Planet Manila Bay. They're like literally a lucky hotel! Also, the place is neat and tidy. Staffs are accommodating as well!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Athena Alexi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUkI2O5L4p2pAoACh97ET_s1QSnpvEMGS2tJTlz4CM9KMxlg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Rooms and service are great. Friendly staff. Just really bad location. I wanted to walk to Starbucks to get coffee but couldn't because it was flooded. The only area that was flood was the front and sides of the hotel and it wasn't even raining anymore. Bad location if its rainy. Cars can pass, just need to book a taxi to 7/11 or starbucks which is like two minutes away.

Elevator is unavailable if the wind is strong so you have to walk in the fire exit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-5iuSPeEKXjV2_amm_gfASzeDZWOjrlH_RDHD"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Edward Magsino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWr4Un1k0HkTkRSwGHxe0OFj3ZxxfYoy36SDXkENaIhW0DgD_FY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stayed here for 2 nights during the JIL Church 46th Anniversary.

Location: 15 to 20 mins walk to Rizal Park. I have read that it easily gets flooded at the front. I think it has already improved since it rained during our stay and it did not become a problem to us.

Experience: the staff are very accommodating - from the guards, to the reception, to the staff.

Rooms: the room assigned to us is clean and comfortable.

Parking: first come first serve basis for their limited free parking. Otherwise, you will have to go with the pay parking along Roxas service road.

Issues: we can hear the noise outside our room and we can also hear other guest's rooms when passing by.

Overall: we really enjoyed our stay with minimal to no issues at all. Their facilities are modern and the staff are very helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfbG8sHuqDEZcj5rA435oreN_WISkjGRvb9tAy"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Johnny Johnny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX43N5bBBx7Pw94ojZIUxGpf930xWCPQPKnzV6RMZZAPbRmOb1dUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Arrived Red Planet Manila Bay on a midnight heavy rainy day and it was flooded on the street level.

It was nice of the staff to bring over an unbrella and shelter me while I jump off from the car seat to the sidewalk.

Check in was smooth, but late check out till 1pm was granted only upon request.

Previously when I book through a booking app, I got late checkout of 2pm without requesting. So I was rather disappointed since I booked through the hotel app directly this time.

Room size and condition was decent but window blinds is a little damaged.

Location is walkable to many food options, nightspots and attractions 👍🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzNuSrrAfszdC_n9S1R2zn8-Alzvzq-1oDdADs"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Inspire66528396088","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfsnvlNO8mgROWsxiGYBmc-FMApm47le01WrNgEyYNYqUPw1j7nx-COV-HLlhXF8VUXQQ=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Would recommend this hotel especially if you have an appointment in US Embassy, its like 10 minutes walk from the hotel. We had a great time and their room rates is quite reasonable. Thanks to Princess at the Front desk who patiently assisted us from booking our rooms online and to our needs throughout our stay. I love their room, very basic and clean. We will book the room with Bayview next time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jazzver King Capati","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVa2qHxX4fvyW253eqFZYst33-5zKp-etRcImRVtBYCjgl5hIcp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We booked here for our Visa Interview, and our visa is approved. Indeed, it is a lucky hotel for visa interviews. The hotel is clean and comfy. Staff are super friendly and approachable. Walking distance to the US embassy. I forgot my shoes in the room and they helped me retrieve it. Thanks to the staff of Red Planet Manila Bay!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: RedDoorz near NAIA Terminal 1
address: 21 Verbena Street, Pasay, 1301 Metro Manila
descriptions: No-nonsense hotel featuring simply furnished rooms with minifridges, wet bars & balconies.
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bob Pike","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFTy4Ekb_ptqRx8MTthEeXTz6UsNhajlODkvoyqKLgEZGJQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Room was large for 2. Clean, comfortable, felt at home. Staff was polite and helpful. Bought meals and cost of night was affordable. It was tough for the taxi driver to find because he didn't trust the GPS on phone. (Google Maps)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gemma B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXVdWujuHwTKE__Kekbnr8CjFRRGKJgfOyYsj7C0fuZrRaT1PgOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is a false advertising. The picture you see is a not even existing.
The place is so gross, dusty, very filthy and the people will try to scam you. The toilet looks like it was never cleaned and there's p***c hair on the floor behind the door.

We will have to wait for 12 hrs layover so we decided to get a room to have a nap and a shower before we go back to the airport.

Be careful if you are a foreigner. They will try scam you. Even the taxi drivers will scam you.
If you stay in this hotel, ask the staff to call the grab/Uber for you. It's way cheaper and the car is more decent and clean

The towels were old and have holes, there is no even soap unless you ask for it. The toilet paper is only a few rolls.

I do not recommend this place. Don't be fooled with the photos on their website.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2k-IQR7fa7GAdThs_WJq-4RKvOWj_7x8o6v4F"],"When":"2024-5-8"},{"Name":"Trip.com Member","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeCck1CfANpZm9bBk3PHtP97Kh9k25HZfvq9yAWlN3BaIyjSHUPEfWkhAJmuYiJsH-_6g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"I usually book cheap hotels because I don’t need anything exclusive. But ! - I would out of all cheap hotels I’ve booked so far in Manila not recommend this one!Bed sheets had stains .. blood?! Red and brown stains. A lot of hair everywhere. Mould !! Rubbish wasn’t emptied properly. No soap to wash at least my hands. Smelly room/ drains smelled like a dead animal was stuck in there. Staff quite uninterested. Best part was I woke up with a plenty of bites on my arms and back, belly and feet ( bed bugs ) Thanks for nothing. Unhygienic as f. Won’t return.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bella Wi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAAdaDidNWFtveeged38Y0duP_cqdcYjryoc7bQ36JOZC1sA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Where to start.

Be careful with taxi drivers!
They charged me 2000 Peso (53AUD) for 4.5k‘s from the airport to this place.
Absolute sickening! For local people it’d be around 250.

I usually book cheap hotels because I don’t need anything exclusive. But ! - I would out of all cheap hotels I’ve booked so far in Manila not recommend this one!

Bed sheets had stains .. blood?! Red and brown stains. A lot of hair everywhere. Mould !! Rubbish wasn’t emptied properly. No soap to wash at least my hands. Smelly room/ drains smelled like a dead animal was stuck in there. Staff quite uninterested. Best part was I woke up with bites all over my arms and back, belly and feet ( bed bugs ) Thanks for nothing. Won’t return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcIJ3JAJYPSXxzUnfaijAVyMR02Z08FR6S8-li"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Trip.com Member","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QeCck1CfANpZm9bBk3PHtP97Kh9k25HZfvq9yAWlN3BaIyjSHUPEfWkhAJmuYiJsH-_6g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"Would I stay here again? Yes. Does the facility need some TLC? Absolutely.It's a 5 minute walk to Terminal 1 of the airport, so if you are flying international, it's a perfect pitstop.It's not a 5 star hotel and they don't need to be or are they trying to be. The bathroom needed some attention. The shower head was filthy. No towels. No little bottles of soap or shampoo. For are case we didn't need it. But are last Reddoorz had those items. The TV turned on but the cable box was either broken or I was to dumb to figure it out. Probably both.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Richard Terrace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEFwDO7dPJ0D1nxwPpzQdFKMG63G464aL6-DR5l7ZOVElivA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ive stayed here four times.  The rooms are basic but have air conditioning, decent washroom, table and fridge.  Some rooms have views some dont.  Some rooms tend to be quieter (upper floor) others are noisy (lower floor).  The location is very close to NAIA 1 (10-15min walk) so great if you want to be close yo the airport.

Overall its hit or miss and there are much better places with more attentive staff.  However the location is convenient, the rooms are clean and comfortable enough.  Certainly not fancy though","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ara Macaraeg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlfA-Mjx99_32ATowDp3WA_1Q7ZMxTT-kBq2lD2YDfjs4ck7IZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY HERE!!!

The place is scary, the room is filthy, the service staff is not accommodating. The facilities is just worst. We encounter cockroaches too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vũ Huy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKnXnDsla6stkotA-NdJwfHAigPancRwMyK8URzjCDpGJAqYNcQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The location show on Google Map in front of terminal 1 is totally wrong. You have to walk around one side of the airport, climb the overpass and walk to the other side of the road. walk to a small alley and the hotel is in it. Maybe they intentionally fake the location to attract customers. It's an old house and the price is not worth it. Very old, smelly and dirty items. Air conditioner cannot adjust temperature. I think it's about 1 star hotel. Anyway the boy at the hotel was quite enthusiastic and helpful. They accept visa which is also a good point","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxLpDrEAR8rW209DPy6FzS6ANWVPLPePQrcaf4"],"When":"2023-12-16"}]

We were pleasantly surprised to find that the price for our stay at 8Hostel was budget-friendly (I booked via Agoda), and the establishment itself was clean and well-maintained. Our experience was further improved by the warm hospitality of Ate Marissa, who went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and comfortable during our stay. Being someone who also works in the hotel industry, I could truly appreciate her hard work and dedication. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Roy Lucman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-S_Pf3SJP3clyW9KRBrn15ovZJ0inDnaX3uxl-70wE0QebMLX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It's a good hotel, however, I had an issue with the customer service, I tried to check in 12:00 noon, but the front desk told me I should check in 5:00 pm then I checked in 5:00 pm, I stayed in two days then before my checkout date I told the front desk I will extend 3 hours just to wait for my scheduled flight and I will pay the extended hours, however, the front desk call me in my mobile phone and said I should check out 12:00 pm.

The front desk requested to me "if is it fine to bring my belongings outside the room" then I was shocked.

Very bad experienced.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chanel Ruiz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINHiWIIa-VfO2MFpkjG9KIG2mgSFo-B6N8Qy0M5TRXucFXEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The room was nice and well maintained. However, we had an issue the night we checked in. I think less than 2 hours after we checked in someone suddenly tried to go inside our room. Good thing we had the secondary lock locked, When I asked who was that and why they tried to barge in, I just hear them arguing why our room number was given to them. I think they were housekeepers? They closed the door again and left which alarmed us as to why that happened. We got worried because it's like they don't keep records on rooms that were occupied.

After that happened, we quickly fixed ourselves to check out because what happened felt off. When we went down to the lobby I informed the front desk agent that someone tried to go in our room. To my surprise and disappointment she just laughed and said "Oo nga po eh". Didn't apologize or explain why that happened too.

That being said, I don't think we'll check in again here anytime soon. But, I do see the management respond to reviews here promptly. I hope this can be looked into. This is alarming for guests. You guys have a keycard system. Kindly have the front desk agents check which rooms are occupied and double check everything. This may be an isolated case, but still.

Also, check on the assigned front desk agents and properly educate them on what to do or tell guests when these things happen. I also worked as a front desk agent before for many well known hotels so I know how an agent should have handled matters like this, that includes not laughing at the guest when stuff like this is being brought up. But: clean towels, bed sheets, friendly staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kurt Vincent Señoran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXsBQLRCC87BNuTHZowZZljNC_Ol1x__R00e3SH9d7iddoDgnh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Website has pictures of the room so you get to see what you're getting when you choose, it also provides their number and email for communication and inquiries. I booked mine directly through their website but I called to make it easier for me to reserve a room, prices vary depending on how you book, which room you pick and if it includes breakfast (get the breakfast, it's good.) Location is easy to access since it's beside the main road of Dr Acadio Santos Ave, and it's easy to see since you also have a picture of the front of the hotel and a map to use from their website. I paid 1000 php for a downpayment since that option was cheaper instead of paying their standard rate for walk-ins. You get an email when you reserve and another email to confirm your deposit. The one who answered my call was kind to answer my questions and clarifications without any fuss. When I arrived there, their entrance is on the side of the bldg beside the entrance to the subdivision nearby. The security guard was kind enough to assist us with parking and even suggested where to park my motorcycle for better safety, they have parking in front of the bldg and behind it. The receptionist was kind and gave a nice greeting and was pleasant to talk to. I paid the balance for the room and shown my valid ID for security reasons, and then the ID card was given afterwards. You'd think it might be noisy inside the rooms being the hotel is beside the main road, but they actually have options for quieter rooms which was facing the subdivision instead of the main road (That's what I picked since I work remotely at night).
The AC was good, TV screen quality was good, but I plugged in my laptop and didn't use their modem for channels (I prefer Netflix hehe). It was also spacious like the bathroom. They provided toiletries like towels, soap toothbrush and toothpaste, and even a cotton pad for make up I think, as well as a few cotton swabs. Body wash and shampoo was in a dispenser in the shower, their sink is big enough to be comfortable using without spilling any water on your feet and the toilet flushes nicely. The bed is soft and they provided a blanket and 2 pillows. They also have some hangers for your clothes and a blow dryer for your hair. At night it was quiet and the lighting in the room was good, they even have a night light beside the bed that we used since we didn't want it too bright. Outside food was allowed, we had pizza delivered directly our room, courtesy of hotel staff picking up the food up and the change as well. Early in the morning we still had leftover pizza that the hotel staff gladly reheated for us, and they also have an electric kettle upon request. Two 350ml water bottles were provided upon our arrival and 2 more the following day, for free (when we asked our pizza to be reheated, we also ordered some beverages, you pay for it as you get in your room). In the morning, breakfast is served at 7am to 10am. If you took this option, which I hope you did, you will be treated to a hearty meal with free coffee or water to flush it down. We called prior going down so the meals arrived at our table rather quickly. Our options were Lumpiang Shanghai and Pork Tocino, both had an additional fried egg, We tried both and we loved both. The first extra rice you get is FREE, for me who loves extra rice this was a blessing hahaha. Afterwards we enjoyed our free coffee and Milo, they even prepared it for us. We checked out around 30 mins before time and it was simply and easy, I just handed our card they checked the room, and then they returned my security deposit. It was raining that time so we chilled in the lobby for the meantime. Overall the experience was great, the room was great, the staff was pleasant, and the food was delicious. 10/10 will book here again.","Images":null,"When":""}]
